description.hltext_display: La prima de riesgo de la deuda española abre en 257 puntos básicos
description.content: Madrid, 22 dic (EFE).- La prima de riesgo de la deuda soberana española -que depende de la diferencia entre la rentabilidad del bono español a diez años y la del alemán del mismo plazo- inició hoy la jornada en el mercado secundario de deuda en 257 puntos básicos, sin cambios respecto al cierre de ayer.

description.hltext_display: FOTO: Građani podržali akciju 'Želim život' s više od 450.000 kuna
description.content: Tijekom koncerta u izravnom prijenosu HTV-a, na kojem su nastupile brojne estradne zvijezde, bio je organiziran i call centar, gdje su se na pozive građana javljali novinari i poznate osobe iz političkog, gospodarskog, zabavnog i sportskog života.

description.hltext_display: Торги на межбанке открылись в диапазоне 7,977-7,988 за доллар
description.content:
Сегодня на межбанковском валютном рынке Украины торги по доллару США открылись падение котировок – 7,9770/7,9880, цены на российскую валюту составили – 0,2597/0,2601, котировки по евро-гривне ушли вниз – 10,4840/10,5010.
На международном валютном рынке цены на валютную пару евро-доллар скорректировались – 1,3143/45 (вторник - 1,3138/40).
Во вторник Нацбанк вышел на рынок с интервенцией по валютной паре USD/UAH – 7,9600/7,9700, сообщает ИнтерБизнесКонсалтинг.
Теги: экономика, Украина, евро, доллар, рубль, межбанковский валютный рынок, курсы валют

description.hltext_display: I'm a better bowler when I'm sledging, says Peter Siddle
description.content:
Australia paceman Peter Siddle was unapologetic for his tirade at Matt Prior after dismissing the England wicketkeeper in the third test in Perth and described sledging as "good fun" enjoyed by both the Ashes rivals.
Siddle sprayed invective at Prior after bowling him for 12, prompting the wicketkeeper to fire back a few choice words of his own before trudging off the field.
Prior vented his anger in a British newspaper column on Tuesday: "There are not many boxing matches when a guy knockssomeone out and then kicks him when him while he's on thefloor," he wrote. But Siddle described the episode as "part of the game". "It's always going to be there, we fight hard in the field and the emotions come out. It's always around and no doubt going to be around in the future as well," he told reporters at a luxury hotel in Melbourne on Wednesday. "I think that's part of my game anyway. When I play mybest that's what I'm doing anyway. Sometimes it comes off and sometimes it doesn'', in this case it has. "It's just both teams going hard at it. It's good fun out there -- they're at us, we're at them and it makes the game abit more lively and no doubt the spectators like to see it." Australia's pacemen skittled England for 187 and 123 in astunning turnaround in form to clinch a series-levelling victory at Perth after managing only six wickets for 1,137 runs in their previous two innings in Adelaide and Brisbane.
The five-test series is tied at 1-1 but Australia have allthe momentum as they head into the fourth test in Melbourne, which starts on December 26.
The 26-year-old Siddle, a fiery red-head from countryVictoria, managed only one wicket in Perth, where MitchellJohnson and fellow quick Ryan Harris took 18, but said he washappy enough scoring the verbal points over England. "I enjoy having some fun with the batters and it's just the way I like to play my cricket, so if it helps the other boys get the job done, I'm happy to do it," he said. Australia's selectors are likely to persist with thefour-pronged pace attack at the Melbourne Cricket Ground,where the wicket is expected to favour their seamers.
Only captain Ricky Ponting remains a doubt after breaking his little finger in a catch attempt during Jonathon Trott's dismissal in the second innings at Perth.
Siddle was bullish about Ponting's recovery and said the Tasmanian should be fit for selection. "It's looking good, he's come over here confident, and he said he's holding the bat fine and all that type of thing. "It doesn't matter how sore you are or how injured you areI don't think you ever want to miss a Boxing Day test, so I think everyone will definitely be 100 percent fit for this one."

description.hltext_display: Larry David "praises" tax cuts for rich in NY Times
description.content:
LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - "Festivus" has come early for Larry David, the multimillionaire brains behind "Seinfeld" and "Curb Your Enthusiasm."
The liberal television icon took to the editorial pages of the New York Times on Tuesday to declare -- sarcastically -- that his life was finally getting better now that the Obama administration has extended Bush-era tax cuts for two years.
"There is a God! It passed! The Bush tax cuts have been extended two years for the upper bracketeers, of which I am a proud member, thank you very much ... This is a life changer," David wrote in a missive headlined "Thanks for the Tax Cut!"
Forbes magazine in 1998 estimated that David, now 63, was worth $242 million, second among entertainers behind his "Seinfeld" cohort Jerry Seinfeld. David subsequently created and starred in "Curb Your Enthusiasm," but he also got divorced from his wife of 14 years in 2007.
In his op-ed column, David joked that he was planning a Christmas vacation in the Mexican resort of Cabo San Lucas with his daughters.
"We were going to fly coach, but now with the money I'm saving in taxes, I'm going to splurge and bump myself up to first class. First class! Somebody told me they serve warm nuts up there, and call you 'mister.' I might not get off the plane!" he said.
The noted curmudgeon said he would finally be able to splurge on a flat-screen television and blueberries.
"Did you know they have a lot of antioxidants, which prevent cancer? Cancer!" he wrote. "This tax cut just might save my life."
David's seven-paragraph tract contained 10 exclamation points, which would surely appeal to one of his "Seinfeld" characters. Elaine Benes, played by Julia Louis-Dreyfus, once broke up with a boyfriend because he was averse to using the punctuation mark. In another episode, the characters celebrated "Festivus" as a noncommercial alternative to Christmas.
In a compromise deal with Republicans, U.S. President Barack Obama last week signed off on an $858 billion package that prevented an increase in the top two income tax rates, lessened estate taxes, and held in place certain deductions and the current rate a tax on gifts, which is usually paid by the wealthy. The administration has said it will try to end the tax breaks when they expire again in two years.
(Reporting by Dean Goodman; Editing by Bob Tourtellotte)
(c) Copyright Thomson Reuters 2010. Check for restrictions at: http://about.reuters.com/fulllegal.asp

description.hltext_display: Carbondale market a success
description.author: Staff Writer
description.content: Dear Editor:During the weekend of Dec. 10-12, Carbondale was part of the inaugural Airstream Village Holiday Market. This event brought in more than 20 local vendors selling art, glass, jewelry and pottery.Musicians donated their time and energy to play to folks sitting around the blazing bonfire. Food was served up fresh and hot from Smoke Modern BBQ and Nicky's Quickie. Roaring Fork Leadership raised money for their scholarship fund running the busy beverage booth. Kids enjoyed making s'mores by the fire while Santa and his reindeer welcomed families on Sunday.On behalf of everyone at Land+Shelter Inc. and the Studio for Arts and Works (SAW), I would like to express my gratitude to so many individuals and businesses in making the Airstream Village Holiday Market a success. Rainy Day Designs created our brand, MRI donated financially and then again with all the restrooms and trash bins. Sunsense Solar, Alpine Bank, the Village Smithy restaurant, RFTA, Ecos, IRMW and Aloha Mtn. Cyclery all contributed to the positive and heartwarming weekend.I especially feel honored to have collaborated with so many in putting on this party for Carbondale! Locals through their businesses like Mike Shook with Alta Properties, Ants Cullwick through Koru Limited, Lindsey at Lulubelle, Mike Suhrbier with Efficiency In Mind Inc. and The Wilderness Land Trust all gave willingly and generously to an event with no track record. We have a unique and rewarding community that shares in the burden of a struggling economy and also shares in its successes. Therefore, I need to also thank many individuals for jumping in at just the right moment for helping give this event such a positive vibe. Rosie at Main Street Spirits, Amy Kimberly through KDNK, Tom Corson, George Stranahan, Russ Criswell, Gale Holfert, Erin Rigney, Tom Boas with MRI, Cari Theron, Lynn Burton with the Sopris Sun, John Stroud with the Post Independent, Terry Kirk and Dave Taylor all had a part in the 2010 Airstream Village Holiday Market.Happy Holidays and have a prosperous new year.Andrea Chacoscoordinator, 2010 Airstream Village Holiday Market

description.hltext_display: 《QQ自由幻想》暖冬恋曲23日华丽上演
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
《QQ自由幻想》将在明日为玩家们带来了全新版本《暖冬恋曲》。家族钓鱼、家族八宝斋、圣诞活动、充值活动、新区开放，一系列全新的喜讯陆续揭幕。家族钓鱼在经过了更加完善的测试后，家族钓鱼终于和玩家们见面了。每周日全天，家族族长或者长老可以在任意线和任意时间选择开启钓鱼。家族成员在装备了鱼竿、渔夫装，带上鱼饵之后就可以进入家族渔场开始你的钓鱼之旅。丰厚的经验、大量的资材、可爱的小鱼，还有更多的神秘事务、神秘事件、神秘称号，都等待你去发掘。家族八宝斋八宝斋里有什么宝贝呢？人物、宠物补给药品，适合于低等级玩家的超强装备，强大的领地、无双补给符，神奇的天魔、保卫加速符，只要八宝斋到达一定等级，只要家族族长或者长老研究了该物品，只要你要足够的资材、活跃，那么就可以在八宝斋获得许多珍贵的宝物哦。圣诞活动又是一年圣诞来临，今年的圣诞，《QQ自由幻想》为玩家们准备了丰盛的大礼。除了雪人之心可以在龙城NPC圣诞老人处兑换和抽取各种礼品外，还有新年礼物。如果是一男一女组队开启新年礼物时，那么组队双方都将获得神秘的新年礼物哦。并且在元旦当天，还准备了异常丰盛的新年抢奖活动。充值活动暖冬充值活动将于2011年1月1日开启，以前一样，分为充值积分抽奖和充值彩玉数额排名两部分。此次活动将全新推出4套新变装（爱之恋曲礼包开出的三套魔法斗篷以及黄金圣衣），2种全新的幻神神位卡，超眩的冰舞神天麟，以及《QQ自由幻想》世界的第2只双人坐骑??真君战车。新区开放2011年1月1号，《QQ自由幻想》又将开启一个新的电信区。实物大奖、5万Q币、新人王称号又一次在新区等待新老玩家去拼搏。
在冬天的雪花飘落之际，《QQ自由幻想》响起了暖冬的恋曲，为这个冬日带来稳馨的阳光。

description.hltext_display: Another Evolution Callaway RAZR X Irons Review
description.content:
Edit Article | Posted: Dec 22, 2010 |Comments: 0 |
Share
In developing the new Callaway RAZR X irons, Callaway engineers have once again take iron performance to a new level by introducing revolutionary new RAZR technology to create an iron with maximum power and extreme forgiveness. This technology will lead the industry into the next generation of iron design by delivering the distance and forgiveness of a wide sole iron while retaining the playability and turf interaction of a thin sole iron. It is a very good chance to find discount for golf online around the Christmas.
RAZR X irons feature a lower, deeper center of gravity and a consistently hot face for distance and accuracy. In head-to-head tests, the new Callaway RAZR X irons are 56% more accurate than a competitor's iron that chases distance at the cost of accuracy. Tighter Shots, Shorter Putts, Lower Scores.
RAZR Technology shifts the center of gravity 12% lower and 15% deeper by redistributing 30 grams of weight in the back cavity; providing the power and forgiveness of a wide-sole iron with the precision and playability of a thin-sole iron.
A refined VFT Face and High-Definition Undercut cavity are tailored to each individual iron. The result is more consistent ball speeds across the face for more distance and accuracy, even on miss-hits.
All in all, these new Callaway RAZR X irons line looks to offer something for everybody as they have employed the RAZR technology for better distance, forgiveness and feel without sacrificing other performance. This Technology leads the industry into the next generation of iron design by delivering the distance and forgiveness of a wide-sole iron while retaining the playability and turf interaction advantages of a thin-sole iron.

description.hltext_display: Kel olmayayım derken iktidarsız olma!
description.content:
7 okunma 0 yorum Sağlık Yazdır Bazı doktorlara göre, yaygın olarak kullanılan kellik ilacı Propecia genç erkeklerde iktidarsızlığa neden olabilir. İngiltere'de ve Türkiye'de yaygın olarak kullanılan bu ilaç için uzmanlar uyardı. İngiltere'de ve Trkiye'de Propecia adıyla satılan finasteridin ciddi yan etkileri olduğu ve bu yan etkilerin ilacın etiketinde uygun şekilde belirtilmediği ifade ediliyor.
İngiltere'de 20'li yaşlarında kısmi kellikten etkilenen erkeklerin sayısı 6,5 milyon. Edinburgh'tan 26 yaşındaki James, sa kaybettiğini fark etmesi zerine paniğe kapıldığını ve internette yaptığı araştırma sonucunda Propecia adlı bir ila bulup aldığını sylyor. Kelliğe karşı olduka etkili olduğu klinik deneylerce de onaylanan ila James zerinde de sonu vermiş. Araştırmalar, ilacı kullanmaya başlayan 10 erkekten dokuzunun beş yıl boyunca sa kaybı yaşamadığını ortaya koyuyor.
YAN ETKİLERİ Propeica'yı reten Merck adlı firma, internet sayfasında, ilacın erkeklerin yzde ikisinin cinsel gcyle ilgili yan etkileri olabileceğini kabul ediyor. İlacın ereksiyon olma kabiliyetini zayıflattığı ancak sorunun ilacı kullanmaya başlayınca ortadan kalktığı da belirtiliyor.
Ancak James, cinsel gle ilgili yan etkilerini fark ettiğinde ilacı kullanmayı bırakmasına rağmen işler daha da ktye gitmiş. hafta sonra 'kıyametin koptuğunu' ve neredeyse tmyle iktidarsız hale geldiğini sylyor. Ardından gittiği bir doktor, ona testosteron terapisi uygulamış. Bu tedavi ynteminin hayat boyu srmesi gerekiyor. İrlanda ve Amerika Birleşik Devletleri'nde James'in başına gelenlerin mnferit bir olay olmadığını, birok kişinin başına geldiğini syleyen doktorlar var. Propecia'yı reten Merck firması ise ilacın gvenli olup olmadığını srekli kontrol ettiklerini ve cinsel gte azalma yan etkilerinin grlmesi zerine bunu ilacın etiketinde ifade ettiklerini sylyor. Firma ayrıca, bu durumların olduka nadir olduğunu ve Propecia dışında başka bir şeyden de kaynaklanabileceğini savunuyor. Uye Misafir Diğer sağlık haberleri Sosyal Ağlarda Paylaş Rasgele Bilgiler

description.hltext_display: Süper Lig'de ilk yarının 'en'leri
description.content:
Ligde, Trabzonspor'un gerisinde, 37 puanla Bursaspor, 33 puanla Fenerbahe ve 32 puanla Kayserispor sıralandı. Bu sezon ilk yarıyı Konyaspor 14, Bucaspor 12 ve Kasımpaşa da 8 puanla tehlikeli blgede bitirdiler. 17 hafta boyunca yapılan 153 mata, toplam 395 gol atılırken, ma başına dşen gol sayısı 2,58, hafta başına dşen gol sayısı da 23,23 olarak gerekleşti. 40 golle 8. haftasında bu yarının en yksek gol rakamına ulaşılan ligde, devrenin en farklı skorlu galibiyetini 7. haftada Trabzonspor, deplasmanda Kasımpaşa'yı 7-0 yenerek elde etti. Ligin 12. haftasında ise futbolseverler yalnızca 15 gol izleyebildiler. Ligin 6. haftasındaki Kasımpaşa-Fenerbahe (2-6) maı ilk yarıda en ok gol atılan karşılaşma oldu.
Bu yarıda en fazla liderlik koltuğunda oturan takımlar Trabzonspor ve Bursaspor oldu. Bu takımlar toplamda 8'er kez liderlik koltuğunda otururken, Fenerbahe de sadece 1 kez bu sevinci yaşayabildi.
Gol krallığı yarışmasında 12'şer golle Fenerbaheli Alex ve Kardemir Karabksporlu Emenike ilk yarıyı zirvede tamamladı. 9'ar golle de Trabzonsporlu Burak ve Fenerbaheli Niang bu iki oyuncuyu izledi.
-KIRMIZI VE SARI KARTLAR-
Toplam 33 (hafta başına 1,94 ortalama) kırmızı ve 681 de (ma başına 4,45, hafta başına 40,05 ortalama) sarı kartın gsterildiği ilk yarının en centilmen takımları Ankaragc oldu. Başkentin sarı-lacivertli ekibi sadece 25 sarı kartla cezalandırıldı.
İlk yarıda futbolcularına 4 kırmızı kart gsterilen Gaziantepspor ile 3 kırmızı kartla cezalandırılan Konyaspor ligin en hırın takımı oldular. Medical Park Antalyaspor ise toplamda grdğ 48 sarı kartla bu alanda ilk sırada yer aldı.
-PENALTI GOLLERİ- 153 mata hakemler, 1., 9. ve 10. haftalar dışında her hafta penaltı noktasını gsterirlerken, bu yarıda verilen penaltı 29 penaltıdan, 23' golle sonulandı. Bu yarıda, Bucaspor, Bursaspor, Eskişehirspor, İstanbul Bykşehir Belediyespor, Kasımpaşa, ve Ankaragc hi penaltı atışı kullanmadı. Konyaspor, Manisaspor ve Sivasspor da sadece birer kez penaltı atışı kullanabildi.
8. hafta 5 penaltıyla hakemlerin en ok beyaz yuvarlağı gsterdiği haftaydı. Beşiktaş ilk yarı boyunca 5 ile en fazla penaltı atışı kullanan ekip oldu. Siyah-beyazlıların penaltılarından 4' gol oldu. Beşiktaş'ın İspanyol yıldızı Guti 4 ile en fazla penaltı gol kazandıran futbolcu olmayı başardı. Guti'nin ardından Fenerbaheli Alex, Genlerbirliği'nden Billy Mehmet, Kardemir Karabkspor'dan Cernat, Trabzonspor'dan Burak 2'şer penaltı atışını gole evirdi. İlk yarıda, Mehmet Topuz (Fenerbahe), Volkan (Eskişehirspor), Santos ve Tolga (Kasımpaşa), Aykut (Genlerbirliği), Diallo (Sivasspor), Kere (Konyaspor), Tum (İstanbul Bykşehir Belediyespor), Emre (Gaziantepspor), Kahe (Manisaspor), Engin (Kardemir Karabkspor) kendi kalelerine gol atarak byk şanssızlık yaşadılar.
-İLK YARININ KARNESİ-
En sakin hafta: 13. hafta (32 sarı kart), 15. hafta (28 sarı, 3 kırmızı)
En hareketli hafta: 8. hafta (47 sarı, 7 kırmızı), 4. hafta (48 sarı, 1 kırmızı), 14. hafta (45 sarı, 3 kırmızı) Kırmızı kart gsterilmeyen haftalar: 2., 12., ve 13.
En fazla sarı kart gsterilen hafta: 4. hafta (48) En az sarı kart gsterilen hafta: 15. hafta (28)
Futbolcuları kırmızı kart grmeyen takım: Kardemir Karabkspor, Kayserispor ve Ankaragc Futbolcuları en fazla kırmızı kart gren takım: Gaziantep (4)
Futbolcuları en az sarı kart gren takım: Ankaragc (25) Futbolcuları en fazla sarı kart gren takım: Medical Park Antalyaspor (48)
Bir haftada futbolcuları en fazla sarı kart gren takım: Sivasspor (2. haftada 6) ve Konyaspor (3. haftada 6)
Skorların tasnifi: 153 maın, 69'unu evsahibi ve 40 maı da deplasman takımları kazanırken, 44 karşılaşma da beraberlikle sona erdi. En ok grlen skor: 2-0 (26), 17 ayrı skor grld. description.hltext_display: El aeropuerto de Bruselas vuelve a la normalidad tras reponer el anticongelante
description.content: Bruselas, 22 dic (EFE).- El aeropuerto de Bruselas puede volver a operar con normalidad esta mañana tras reponer sus reservas de líquido anticongelante, aunque persisten algunos retrasos y anulaciones en vuelos hacia al centro y norte de Europa por las condiciones meteorológicas en estos destinos.

description.hltext_display: Analysis: A political rebound, but can it hold?
Eskişehirspor'un ilk yarı karnesi
description.content:
AA muhabirinin derlediği bilgilere gre, Eskişehirspor'un Hırvat kalecesi Vanja Ivesa, Sper Toto Sper Ligde takımının formasını 13 mata terletti. Ivesa, bu sezonun ilk yarısında 1170 dakika forma şansı buldu. Eskişehirspor'un diğer kalecisi Atilla Koca da 4 mata 360 dakika oynadı.
Kırmızı-siyahlı takımın Hırvat defans oyuncusu Luka Vucko da 5 mata 360 dakika forma giyip 1 gol attı. Safet Nadarevi 15 mata 1350 dakika, Sezgin Coşkun 15 mata 1350 dakika forma giyip 1 gol attı. Veysel Sarı da 3 mata 227 dakika grev aldı. Sarı, rakip fileleri 1 kez de havalandırdı. Eskişehirspor'da defansın solunda grev yapan Volkan Yaman ise 14 mata 1203 dakika oynadı. Reşad Sadıgov 4 mata 360 dakika, Diego da 8 mata 546 dakika forma giydi, 1 gol attı.
-ORTA SAHADA EN FAZLA SEZER VE ERKAN FORMA GİYDİ-
Eskişehirspor altyapısında yetişen gen futbolcu Alper Potuk ıktığı 10 mata 544 dakika takımının formasını terletti. Takımın tecrbeli isimlerinden Blent Ertuğrul da 14 mata 1185 dakika sahada grev yaptı. Blent Kocabey ise 2 mata 105 dakika forma şansı buldu. Kırmızı-siyahlı formayı Doğa Kaya 12 mata 737 dakika, Erkan Zengin 16 mata 1172 dakika, Koray Arslan da 12 mata 945 dakika terletti. Sezer ztrk de 15 mata 1143 dakika forma giyip 3 gol atarak takımın en skorer isimleri arasındaki yerini aldı. Sezon başında transfer edilen Pele de 11 mata 676 dakika forma giyip 1 gol attı.
Eskişehirspor'un Şilili futbolcusu Rodrigo Tello da 9 mata 363 dakika oynama şans buldu. Burhan Eşer 9 mata 504 dakika forma giyip rakip filelere 2 kez gol attı. Sezon başında takıma katılan Agim İbraimi de 1 mata sadece 16 dakika forma giyebildi. -EN GOLC BATUHAN- Adem Sarı, 10 mata 428 dakika forma giyip 1 de gol attı. Jaycee ise 8 mata 476 dakika form şansı bulabildi. Serdar zbayraktar 10 mata 555 dakika forma giyip 1 gol atarken, Kaptan mit Karan da sadece 2 mata 34 dakika forma giydi, rakip fileleri 1 kez havalandırdı.
Batuhan Karadeniz ise 13 mata 999 dakika forma giyip 4 gol attı. Gen yıldız bylece takımının en golc ismi oldu. te yandan lige verilen ara nedeniyle izinli olan futbolcular, 27 Aralık'ta Antalya'nın Serik ilesine bağlı Belek beldesindeki Calista Luxory Resort'da kampa başlayacak.
AA

description.hltext_display: Okulun kaloriferi yanmayınca valiliğe yürüdüler
description.content:
Bağlar ilesindeki Fatih Lisesinde ğrenim gren oğunluğunu son sınıf ğrencilerinin oluşturduğu grup ğrenci, sıkıntının giderilmesi iin Yenişehir ilesindeki Diyarbakır Valiliğine doğru yryşe geti. Valilik binası karşısında yer alan Anıt Parkı nne kadar gelen ğrenciler, yetkililere Vali Mustafa Toprak ile grşmek istediklerini bildirdi. Bunun zerine ğrenciler arasından temsilci olarak seilen 2 ğrenci, Vali Mustafa Toprak'a sıkıntıyı iletmek zere valilik binasına alındı. Protestocu ğrencilerden Fatih Menteş, 12. sınıf ğrencisi olduğunu ve 2 hafta nce okulda doğalgaz dnşm alışmalarının başlamasının ardından kaloriferin yanmadığını, havanın soğuk olması nedeniyle byk sıkıntı yaşadıklarını belirterek, ''Biz ve ğretmenlerimiz soğuk nedeniyle byk sıkıntı yaşıyoruz. Bu sorunumuzun giderilmesi iin okul ynetimiyle defalarca grştk. Sıkıntı giderilmeyince, valiliğe geldik. nk biz son sınıf ğrencileriyiz ve niversite sınavına hazırlanıyoruz. Ancak 2 haftadır soğuktan ders yapamıyoruz, okulda adeta donuyoruz'' dedi. Kader Burak adlı ğrenci de okulda kaloriferin yanmaması nedeniyle sınıfta kabanla oturmak zorunda kaldıklarını ifade etti. ğrencilerle grşen Bağlar İle Milli Eğitim Mdr Abdurrahman Sevgili, sıkıntının giderilmesi iin alışmaların başlatıldığını belirterek, ğrencilerden okula geri dnmelerini istedi. Grşmenin ardından ikna olan ğrenciler, okula dnd. Milli Eğitim Mdr Sevgili, gazetecilere yaptığı aıklamada, doğalgaz dnşm alışmaları nedeniyle okulda ısınma sorunun yaşandığını ifade ederek, ''Doğalgaz dnşm gerekli kontrollerin ardından yapılıyor. Bu nedenle sıkıntı oluştu. Bugn veya yarın okuldaki ısınma sorunu zlr. Herhangi bir ihmal sz konusu değil'' diye konuştu.
AA

description.hltext_display: Japan sees bleak export conditions
description.author: IBTimes Staff Reporter
description.content:
to get the day's most relevant news, data and anlaysis . Sample
Japans's economy recovery has been struggling since October when much of benefits and positive factors seen earlier in the year evened out or stopped. Exports have been flat, housing investment has leveled out and corporate profits have begun to grow at a slower pace. "As for private consumption, demand for some goods has suffered a reverse after the sharp increase seen previously," the report added.
Reflecting these developments in demand both at home and abroad, production has recently declined slightly and business sentiment has also been somewhat weak, particularly in the manufacturing sector, the report said. Japan's economy has been fighting deflation since 1998. Though there was slight inflation seen in October for the first time in 24 months, most economists believe that this would not be sustainable. The economy has actually seen inflation turn positive on several occasions in the past, mainly due to food or energy price increases.
The central bank announced on Tuesday that it continued to keep interest rates between zero and 0.1 percent, as the recovery seems to be faltering and the Japanese yen grows weaker against the dollar.
Japan continues to bank on the global economic recovery for demand to improve and relies less on domestic demand.
The BoJ said exports are likely to remain "more or less flat for the time being," but expects a moderate increase, reflecting the improvement in overseas economic conditions.
The yen has remained weak against the dollar and the euro for the past month. The currency fell against 9 or its 16 major counterparts on Wednesday morning.
While business investment will become more pronounced as corporate profits improve, the pace will remain moderate with the firms' persistent sense of excessive capital stock, the bank said.
"In these circumstances, production is expected to increase, after showing temporary weakness primarily in durable consumer goods," the bank added.
Domestic demand, meanwhile, remains shaky even as consumer prices, including fresh food, fall on a year-on-year basis due to a slack in the economy. A rise in international commodity prices is expected to drive up corporate goods prices moderately.

description.hltext_display: Японцы научили мышей... петь
description.content:
Животное, получившееся в результате опытов генных инженеров, способно издавать звуки, похожие на птичье пение.
Результат был достигнут совершенно случайно, при реализации проекта Evolved Mouse. Исследователи из Высшей школы экспериментальных биотехнологий при Осакском университете изначально намеревались получить мышей с мутациями тела.
Для этого они скрестили друг с другом генетически модифицированных грызунов, которые были предрасположены к ошибкам в репликации ДНК, то есть к мутациям. При проверке обнаружилось, что среди мышей с укороченными конечностями или видоизменённым хвостом имеется и «певец».
Последний уже дал потомство, и теперь в распоряжении учёных целый «хор» — более сотни «поющих» созданий. Генетики надеются с их помощью подробно изучить механизмы появления и передачи человеческой речи. Сейчас аналогичные опыты проводятся на птицах, однако мыши, будучи млекопитающими, стоят ближе к человеку на эволюционной лестнице. Они обладают схожим строением головного мозга и другими общими биологическими чертами.
Одним из направлений дальнейшей работы является изучение влияния «певцов» на обычных мышей — в частности способности передать новоприобретённые коммуникативные навыки. Уже удалось установить, что простые мыши издают гораздо меньше присущих им писклявых звуков в компании своих мутировавших сородичей.
Кроме того, мышиные трели меняются в зависимости от ситуации — а значит, служат той же цели, что и обычный писк, выражая эмоции или сообщая о самочувствии.
По материалам: www.compulenta.ru
Теги: Япония, генетика, животное, мышь, генная инженерия, открытие, мутация, мутант

description.hltext_display: European CE Market to End 2010 with a Positive Performance
description.content:
Finding of GfK Retail and Technology
Nuremberg, December 21 - By the end of 2010, the European Consumer Electronics market will have recorded positive growth of +2%, signalling the end of the impact of the financial crisis on this sector.
What has become very apparent is the stark contrast between Western and Eastern Europe. The Western European Markets, as expected, benefited significantly from the FIFA World Cup in South Africa. In the first half of 2010, market development was stimulated by consumer demand for a new, bigger, Flat-TV. In June 2010, expenditure for Flat TV was a third higher than the previous year as consumers sought the larger screens and improved picture quality available for the World Cup. Fast forward one quarter and the interest in buying a new TV waned, leading to an overall decline in the sector during Q3 2010.
Nevertheless, the Flat-TV market continues to be driven by the latest innovations; Web TV is becoming increasingly popular as consumers demand internet content. They are also interested in 3D; in 2010 we expect around 800,000 3D TV-sets to have been sold in Europe. 3D content however remains scarce; 3D Blu Ray and 3D programs are as yet unavailable on any significant scale.
While Eastern European countries also enjoyed success during the World Cup in the TV markets, these regions started very poorly at the start of 2010. The impact of the financial crisis was harshly felt until the second quarter, before recovering in June and continuing to do so throughout the second half of the year.
The ‘Digital Switch Over’ is also influencing the market. Consumers are investing in new set top boxes as, country by country, analogue programs are gradually switched off and replaced by digital. Hi-Fi was a product area to enjoy a positive development in Q3 2010. Sales still benefit from the fact that once consumers have invested in the quality of visuals, the next step in many cases is to improve audio. HiFi devices, Home Theatre Systems along with HiFi-Receivers and Loudspeakers all performed well.
The CE sector benefited from development in other sectors. The success of Smartphones and tablet PCs is influencing the development of headphones. All over Western Europe headphones developed extremely positively. More than 80% of this market is accounted for by in-ear or mini headphones, dedicated to portable media players, for Smartphones or tablet PCs, but traditional headphones are now even seen commonly as an outdoor device, thanks to their fashionable style.
Further information: Jürgen Boyny, +49 911 395 2520, juergen.boyny@gfk.com, www.gfkrt.com
Visit GfK Retail and Technology at 2011 International CES
The GfK Group
The GfK Group offers the fundamental knowledge that industry, retailers, services companies and the media need to make market decisions. It delivers a comprehensive range of information and consultancy services in the three business sectors Custom Research, Retail and Technology and Media. The No. 4 market research organization worldwide operates in more than 100 countries and employs over 10,000 staff. In 2009, the GfK Group’s sales amounted to EUR 1.16 billion. For further information, visit our website: www.gfk.com. Follow us on twitter: www.twitter.com/gfk_group.

description.hltext_display: 圣诞老人V5归来 圣诞派发感恩豪礼
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
经过了《QQ炫舞》小镇上下齐心协力的努力，在圣诞前夕我们终于抓获到了黑胡子，拯救出了圣诞老人！可是好事多磨，圣诞老人本来打算将自己包裹中收藏的超多礼物送给大家，却发现包裹已经被黑胡子藏了起来……
镇长决定，将于圣诞节当晚全面搜索小镇寻找礼物。凡是找到礼物者，都将获得小镇政府提供的豪华大奖，而且找到的越多，得到的奖励就越多哦！
活动详情：http://x5.qq.com/act/a20101201xmas/
最给力的圣诞夜，就在12月25日晚20点至22点。到时候，QQ炫舞GM将登录除广东专区、北城之恋、鹊舞江南、蝶恋北风、邂逅南国的所有大区，为全体小镇居民开启活动。
活动开启后，GM将建立一个规则活动房间，在留言版中公布活动规则，以及圣诞老人丢失的宝物大概描述。而大家要根据留言版中的描述猜测宝物后用该宝物装饰房间或佩戴在身上。
想要参与活动的玩家，需要建立一个等待中的房间，房间内坑下玩家最多5名，需给圣诞老人留一个位置，并将房名更改为“宝物大集会”。20点10分，圣诞老人宣布寻宝开始，然后随机登录玩家建立的活动房间，寻找房间内的宝物。根据玩家找到宝物的不同，则获得的奖励也不同，寻宝房间中的玩家均可获奖。
圣诞老人为了对热心帮忙的居民们表示感谢，还为大家准备了神秘的礼物哦！12月25日晚9点游戏在线的玩家，将得到GM赠送的永久称号“袜子圣手”。
最给力的圣诞夜，少不了最V5的小镇居民。圣诞老人已经平安归来，接下来需要大家做的事，就是尽快寻找圣诞老人的包裹啦！12月25日，就来《QQ炫舞》寻找圣诞包裹，勇夺圣诞好礼吧！《QQ炫舞》??最浪漫的舞蹈游戏 《QQ炫舞》官方网站：http://x5.qq.com

description.hltext_display: "Spider-Man" stuntman injured during show
description.content:
NEW YORK (Reuters) - A leading stuntman in the Broadway musical "Spider-Man" was recovering in hospital on Tuesday after falling from a high platform during a preview performance in yet another setback for the troubled musical.
An aerialist and stunt double for the title character in the show, Christopher Tierney, was taken to a nearby hospital after he fell about seven minutes before the end of the performance on Monday night, the show's spokesman Rick Miramontez said in a statement.
The show has temporarily stopped production and will return to its normal schedule from Wednesday night, Miramontez added.
Show producers agreed to new safety protocols on Tuesday after meeting with the labor union Actors' Equity, as well as several government work and safety bodies.
Specifics of the new safety measures were not given.
Another show spokesman declined to comment on Tierney's condition or reveal how the actor, who was performing as a stunt double for the masked "Spider-Man" character, plunged off the platform during a tense moment in the show.
After the performance, audience member Charlie Bernard told television station NY1 that he saw the cord or cable that was supposed to hold the actor was either not attached properly or snapped in a scene with Spider-Man's love interest, Mary Jane.
"You just hear a bang. And then you hear the actress who plays Mary Jane, she was screaming and crying. The audience was a little disturbed and then everybody was quiet," he said.
The fall is the latest mishap for the $65 million musical. Tierney is the fourth actor to be injured. Two others were hurt during hi-tech flying sequences and actress Natalie Mendoza suffered a concussion earlier this month when she was hit by a rope while offstage.
During the show's first preview performance, actors including Reeve Carney, who plays the title character, were stuck suspended in mid-air, forcing it to stop several times.
The musical written by U2 rockers Bono and The Edge is the most expensive Broadway show ever produced. The two musicians are due to return to New York and work on the musical early in January.
Last week the opening of the musical was officially delayed again until February 7 for changes. It already had been delayed several times after running out of financing and experiencing technical problems.
While previews generally are a time for shows to fix problems, the number of injuries and technical glitches in the musical, whose full title is "Spider-Man: Turn Off the Dark," has suffered is unusual on Broadway.
(Editing by Patricia Reaney and Bob Tourtellotte)
(c) Copyright Thomson Reuters 2010. Check for restrictions at: http://about.reuters.com/fulllegal.asp

description.hltext_display: Европа возобновляет авиасообщение
description.content:
Аэропорты Европы постепенно возобновляют свою работу, которую прервали сильные снегопады. Уже открыла свое воздушное пространство Великобритания. Заработал лондонский аэропорт "Хитроу", хотя пока не на полную мощность.
Британский МИД призывает иностранцев не беспокоиться о визах, просроченных в связи с задержками вылетов. Но пассажирам следует покинуть страну первым же предложенным рейсом. Аэропорт Франкфурта принимает и отправляет пока лишь некоторые рейсы. Переполнены и залы ожидания в парижском аэропорту Шарля де Голля.
За сутки в странах ЕС отменили около тысячи рейсов.
По материалам: www.regnum.ru
Теги: аэропорт, Великобритания, Германия, Европа, снегопад, авиация, Франкфурт

description.content:

Botrányt idézett elõ kedden az ukrán állami tévé egyik munkatársa, aki nyuszinak öltözve jelent meg a parlamentben.
Hírlevél feliratkozás
Értesülni szeretnék a napi friss helyi hírekrõl! E-mailemre levél érkezik, amelyben megerõsítem a feliratkozást.
Roman Vintoniv azt állította, hogy így akar tiltakozni a képviselõk idõnként"nevetséges viselkedése" ellen.
Az újságíró tetõtõl talpig fehér nyuszinak öltözött, stílszerûen még hatalmas fülei is voltak. Vintoniv nagyon komoly arcot vágott, amikor odalépett nyusziként a megdöbbent képviselõkhöz, hogy interjúkat készítsen velük. Elmondása szerint gúnyos akciójához az adta a végsõ lökést, hogy a múlt héten összeverekedtek képviselõk az ülésteremben, és többen meg is sérültek.
"Ha a Verkhovna Rada (ukrán parlament) cirkusszá válik, akkor ezt hivatalosan is be kell jelenteni, és ennek megfelelõen kell öltözködni"- nyilatkozta a zsurnaliszta az Ukrajnszka Pravda nevû hírportálnak. A portál szerint a parlament sajtószolgálatának emberei megpróbálták kivezetni Vintonivot arra hivatkozva, hogy kinézete nem felel meg a házszabálynak.
Ekkor kollegájuk védelmére keltek más újságírók közölve, hogy a parlamentnek nincs öltözködési kódex, és Vintoniv el tudja látni így is a munkáját, és interjúkat képes készíteni. Ezt jól mutatja az internetre feltett videó, amelynek tanúsága szerint több képviselõ nem volt hajlandó szóba állni a nyuszinak öltözött újságíróval.
A Vintoniv által említett verekedés a múlt csütörtökön történt, Több parlamenti képviselõt is hordágyon szállítottak el a mentõk, miután kormánypárti képviselõk csütörtök este megostromolták az ukrán parlament ellenzék által megszállt elnöki pulpitusát. Az ellenzék a volt kormányfõ, Julia Timosenko elleni eljárás miatt tiltakozott.
Egy képviselõt súlyos fejsérülésekkel vittek kórházba, egy másiknak az állkapcsát törték el egy székkel. A kijevi ügyészség kedden azt közölte, hogy büntetõ eljárást indítottak az ügyben.

description.hltext_display: Population surge gives Texas 4 new US House seats
Met 'faces toughest period yet'
description.content: The Metropolitan Police is facing its most challenging period since Commissioner Sir Paul Stephenson took over, he has said. Sir Paul, who was deputy commissioner five years ago and took the top post last year, said a combination of violent disorder on the streets, budget cuts, and the forthcoming Olympics were stretching his force.And he acknowledged the student tuition fees protests were being driven by "a real passion about a cause".Sir Paul, interviewed on BBC Radio 4's Today programme, was asked how far the protests, cuts, and other events, were stretching his force.He replied: "When you put all the various challenges that face me and my colleagues in the Metropolitan Police service together, this is as challenging a period as we have ever faced."He stressed he did not doubt the operational capability of the force. But he said: "I think the challenges we are facing, that stretch we are facing, is not as we have known for a long, long time."We can make significant economy savings, but how far we can stretch those savings is a real issue. I am concerned about our current budgetary situation."On the student protests, Sir Paul said: "There's clearly a sense of anger out there that's led to a level of violence."He said some protesters were determined to breach police lines and had come prepared, and added: "I think we have got a sense of a real passion about a cause out there. Within that, there are various levels of passion that lead to extremism."

description.hltext_display: New Zealand Air Force releases 47 years of UFO reports
description.content:
Wellington - The New Zealand Air Force released Wednesday more than 2,000 pages of previously top secret reports on nearly half a century of UFO sightings.
News reports indicated that the material, documenting alleged sightings of strange flying objects from 1952 to 2009, showed no evidence of visits to the Pacific country from outer space.
They particularly shed no new light on New Zealand's most famous UFO sighting of mystery lights seen by crew and passengers on a commercial airline flight along the east coast of the South Island in December 1978.
The lights, which were filmed by a Television New Zealand camera crew aboard the plane, were observed at the same time as air traffic controllers said they saw mysterious objects on their radar, but said no other aircraft were reported in the area.
The documents include suggestions by various people that they were reflected lights from a squid boat, a meteor or caused by atmospheric conditions.
But Suzanne Hansen, who told Television New Zealand she had been researching UFO sightings for 35 years, said, "It is obviously something else we can't explain.
"We don't know what it is, but it is certainly something that is unidentified and non-conventional."
TVNZ said the 12 volumes contained correspondence "of a fairly outlandish nature" but there was also a 1961 sighting from a respected Air Force officer who insisted he saw a mysterious cigar-shaped object, with what appeared to be a cockpit and undercarriage - a sighting that baffled him and his superiors.

event_or_fact.property: she had been researching UFO sightings for 35 years, said, "It is obviously something else we can't explain

description.hltext_display: 89岁退休高官开公车带失地村民上访(组图)
description.content:
杨维骏
1922年3月生，云南昆明人。1945年毕业于云南大学政治系，同年加入中国民主同盟，建国后历任民盟云南省委秘书长、副主任委员和中央委员，云南省第五、六届政协副主席，第六届全国人大代表。
他为民请命的事在网络传播后，被网友称为“最可爱官员”。
本报讯 (记者黄玉浩) 12月17日，89岁高龄的云南省政协原副主席杨维骏坐着政府专配用车，为12名失地农民代表开道，带其到云南省政协反映问题。
杨维骏说，那些村民都是昆明市西山区福海社区韩家湾村的。他们要反映的问题是，政府拆迁安置政策不合理。
据农民代表张桂仙介绍，昆明市西山区福海社区韩家湾村有8个自然村组要拆迁，1700亩耕地要被征用，房屋在今年年初被限期拆除，政府没有出示征地手续，每亩25万元的征地款也未发放，冬天到了，安置房至今没有下落。
张桂仙说，他和村民曾去上访过80多次，去过省委省政府、省人大政协、市区政府，但事情毫无进展。
12月17日，韩家湾村的400多名村民到社区街道办，要求政府出示土地征用与拆迁的相关手续，遭到拒绝。
张桂仙说，在村民中，有个从云南大学毕业的大学生，他给已经退休的副省级官员杨维骏打电话，反映问题。
12月17日，杨维骏从村民处听闻这一消息后，从云南省政协老干部处借调一名工作人员，并乘坐专车赶到现场。
到达现场后，杨维骏命人拍照、摄像取证，并带着村民去省政协，“政协能监督政府，没有我带路，农民肯定进不了大门。”
12月18日，记者在杨维骏家采访，有云南省政协老干部处一处长来访，他和杨维骏就带领村民上访问题辩论了2个多小时。该处长认为，杨不该以省政协原副主席的身份带上访农民进入省政协大院，称农民有冤屈应走正常渠道反映问题。
杨维骏回应说，“我为什么不能以退休干部身份，为群众反映问题？”
■对话
“你把农民的地和房子都拿走了，不去合理安置，让他们怎么生活？”89岁的老人扬起一份反映昆明西山区福海社区遭遇违规拆迁的举报材料称，他一定会将此事过问到底。
“替老百姓说活，我问心无愧”
杨维骏认为，将政府配车只用于游山玩水那才是不正常现象
“省国土厅承诺，立即调查”
新京报：你为什么要带农民到省政协上访？
杨维骏：当时了解到这群失地农民的处境，觉得十分可怜，他们的土地和房子都被政府征用了，但各种手续都没有，安置房也没有下落，他们四处上访，到有关部门信访都没用，都在踢皮球，省里打到市里，市里推到区里，区里又说没权做主，我既然是省政协退休的副主席，群众找到我，那我有义务将这个情况反映给省政协，政协对政府不是有监督职责吗。
新京报：为什么你要亲自带着他们去，你觉得你带着和他们自己去有什么区别？
杨维骏：农民自己去的话，连政协的大门也进不去，有门卫，领导不会见他们，我毕竟是有级别的，我的配车可以畅通带着他们进去，能引起一些领导的重视，老百姓自己去信访，拖到猴年马月也不见得有人管，农民太可怜了，有些官员对待群众的感情太淡薄，太冷漠。
新京报：你领着农民到省政协后又发生了什么？
杨维骏：农民开着两辆面包车，坐着12个农民，跟着我的专车，门卫都认识我的专车，所以没人拦。
到省政协，先找分管老干部处的一个副秘书长说要到信访处反映这群农民的问题，这个副秘书长就说要请示领导，要走相关程序的审批，我当时就怒了，救命的事，能拖吗，就带着农民直奔信访处，结果整个办公室一个人都没有，当时是周五上午，这很不正常。11点半，我让农民回家，我就直接去了省国土资源厅递交了反映材料。
新京报：国土厅有什么回应？
杨维骏：一个副厅长说会派巡视组去了解情况，如果他们推托不办，我就连国土厅一起告。
新京报：省国土厅的回应和你的特殊身份有关吗？
杨维骏：可能有关，我将举报材料递交省国土厅办公室的时候，我说了我的身份，办公人员说需要由省政府办公厅向省国土厅的厅领导进行对接，我又找了办公厅，后来国土厅的一个副厅长来电承诺马上成立调查组去了解情况。
“有人劝，管闲事会被灭口”
新京报：带群众上访，你想过政协有人来责怪你吗？
杨维骏：真没想过，所以当政协老干部处的一位处长来我家责怪我开着专车带群众去政府上访不妥，我很是愤慨，作为一个为群众和政府工作多年的老干部，发挥余热体恤民情，反映民生疾苦本无可厚非，我觉得人民培养一个干部那么多年，干部反过来不知道报效自己的衣食父母，这和动物有啥区别。
新京报：他们责怪你什么？
杨维骏：说我开着政府配车带农民信访行为不妥。我就说你拿出政策和法规，哪一条规定政府配车不能用于退休干部的调研，既然政府每年的工作报告都要征询老干部的意见，那我就有义务有权利去调研，并将群众疾苦反映给政府部门。
新京报：但开着公车为民请愿的确罕见。
杨维骏：罕见才是不正常的。难道干部的公车就是用来吃喝玩乐的？退休干部的配车难道就是用来游山玩水的？这才不是为民服务的态度，政府给我配的车，那是人民给我的待遇，我会用他来做更多有益于人民的事。
新京报：那这个处长来责怪你，是不是代表组织上并不认可你的这一行为？
杨维骏：我觉得不是，可能只是某个领导或某一群人，他们会对我的行为反感，会觉得我这老头瞎管闲事，也可能触动某些人的利益。但我是在替老百姓说话，我问心无愧，心怀坦荡，我在说真话，反映民众真实疾苦。
新京报：说真话你有顾虑吗？
杨维骏：我没有，但给我反映情况的那个云大学生听说刚被政府官员找去谈话，让他劝我不要过问此事，否则让他小心，我也因为多次向省委省政府多次递交群众的信访材料，有人托人转告我再瞎管闲事，小心灭口，但我从不退缩，从政以来我屋内挂着自写自勉的话，“以丹心照万民，甘造坎坷不甘驯”。
新京报：你只有一个人，昆明市可能有很多信访者，你能解决所有问题吗？
杨维骏：我觉得还是体制有问题，为什么那么多失地农民，为啥那么多人上访，为啥暴力强拆和流血冲突不断，我觉得在于一些主政者并非以民生问题为首重，而是追求那些看得见的政绩，所以到处大拆大建，全国兴起的“农民被上楼”运动就是典型，村庄改造村民却失去自主权，农民生活和就业处于困境，许多官员只唯上、只唯权、只唯钱、只唯政绩，却忘了群众是我们的衣食父母这个根本。
“即便在位，也会为民请命”
新京报：你如何和社会分享你的观点？
杨维骏：今年我让在北京的女儿为我开了博客，我将我的观点发在博客上，希望更多的官员、学者和群众都能来参与讨论，为国家的民主和经济的发展献计献策。
新京报：你的博客取名直言，博文中对一些现象提出批判，有网友觉得是因为你退休了才敢这么说？
杨维骏：不是，我今年快90岁了，按说应该像许多退休老干部那样养花种草颐养天年，但我总觉得自己还能为人民做些事情，直言与反腐败是我一辈子坚持在做的事，我在位的时候，遇见这种农民我还是会了解情况，确定是政府或某个部门的责任我依然会专车开道亲自为其请命，占着官位不为民办事那是对人民犯罪。
新京报：你专车带道为民请命的事在网络传开后，很多人称你为最可爱的官员，引起这种轰动，你想到过没有？
杨维骏：没有，作为一个卸任干部为群众反映诉求没什么值得赞颂的，如果引起了网民的轰动，那只能说现在的官员真正为民办事，对人民充满感情的官员变少了，我也遇见一些干部对群众趾高气扬、出去都讲豪华排场，这些官员已经脱离群众了。
新京报：周边的人如何看待你的行为？
杨维骏：许多在职或退下来的干部都很敬佩，很赞赏这种做法，当然也有人内心可能不认可，认为多一事不如少一事，那些反对的官员，我觉得大多是只唯上、不唯民的人，价值观不同不相为谋。

description.hltext_display: Мировое соглашение между Киркоровым и Яблоковой рассматривает суд
description.content:
Мировой суд в Москве в среду может утвердить мировое соглашение между певцом Филиппом Киркоровым и режиссером Мариной Яблоковой по делу о ее публичном избиении.
Об этом сообщила Российскому агентству правовой и судебной информации (РАПСИ) пресс-секретарь Пресненского суда Ольга Сутяпова.
Мировое соглашение между Киркоровым и Яблоковой было заключено на минувшей неделе. Его условия не разглашаются. Вместе с тем, по словам одного из участников процесса, Киркоров полностью признал вину и обязался выплатить 10 миллионов рублей на благотворительные цели.
Яблокова ранее обратилась в суд с заявлением о возбуждении в отношении певца уголовного дела за нанесение легкого вреда здоровью и оскорбление. Инцидент произошел во время репетиции церемонии Золотой граммофон.
Киркоров, который сначала отрицал свою вину, впоследствии признался, что болен и нуждается в лечении. Он прошел обследование в израильской клинике, где врачи не нашли психических отклонений.
Адвокат певца Александр Добровинский по окончании судебного заседания сообщил журналистам, что Киркоров доволен заключением мирового соглашения с режиссером Яблоковой и даже обещает ей новогодний подарок.
Отвечая на вопрос о причинах заключения перемирия, Добровинский предположил, что "подействовал разум всех сторон".
В свою очередь адвокат Яблоковой Сергей Жорин выразил надежду на то, что конфликт исчерпан и его продолжения не последует.
По материалам: korrespondent.net
Теги: Россия, Москва, музыка, певец, суд, избиение, Филипп Киркоров, Марина Яблокова

description.hltext_display: What we think: A stocking full of funds
description.content:
VALDOSTA — With only a few days left until Christmas, the Empty Stocking Fund has surpassed last year’s $18,267.50 total. Today’s paper lists the total at $18,805.30.
While the 2010 Empty Stocking Fund has surpassed the 2009 total, we ask folks to remember that last year’s total fell $5,336 short of the 2008 total.
Such shortfalls mean the fund is stretched in its mission to ensure no child awakes to an empty stocking Christmas morning.
For generations, readers of The Valdosta Daily Times have kept the Empty Stocking promise of Valdosta-Lowndes County children waking to toys at Christmas. Along with the Salvation Army and Guardian Bank, the Empty Stocking Fund is a community effort.
While there are many Christmas toy drives now, the Salvation Army ensures that families receiving toys from the Empty Stocking Fund are not receiving toys from other organizations, agencies or programs.
Without the Empty Stocking Fund, these children would receive no toys on Christmas morning.
We ask in these last days before Christmas to please help a child in need.
If you’ve already given to the Empty Stocking Fund, we thank you. If you haven’t given, please give to the Empty Stocking Fund.
To donate to the Empty Stocking Fund, send contributions to: Empty Stocking Fund, c/o Margie Blanton, Guardian Bank, P.O. Box 3340, Valdosta, Ga. 31604.

description.hltext_display: Weapon of Tech Callaway FT-i Driver Review
description.content:
These drivers are being marketed as their most innovative golf clubs for sale yet. Advancements come in the form of two areas, namely the mixed material composition of the driver head, and the geometry of the driver to attain a specific weight distribution. There's no doubt the Callaway FT-i Driver is a strange looking chap. If you hadn't played the game before you'd swear it looks like a novelty club. So, if you're used to wielding a more conventional driver then the shape could be a bit off-putting.
This driver was extremely accurate, for it lacked hitting power due to the softer face material. Callaway has long been known for its long hitting Titanium drivers and the consumer wanted both designers in one! Introduce the Fusion Series beginning with the original ERC Fusion to the Callaway FT-i Driver, Callaway high performance drivers have incorporated Fusion Technology.
The FT-i features a larger head than the original Fusion and the FT-5. Oh, did I forget to mention that it is also square! This will raise the MOI and lower the center of gravity for straighter, higher launching shots! The advances in technology have allowed the designers at Callaway to "fuse" an entire face area of a Titanium driver to the body similar to the C4. This makes for not only a very forgiving driver, but one that goes long as well! The technology frees almost 50 grams of weight to be distributed to the perimeter to create a high launch low spin Callaway FT-i Driver designed for today's golf balls. Callaway has also incorporated a new feature where this weight is put in the center of the club, to the toe or to the heel. This will created a fade or draw biased head that will be more prone to opening or closing at impact to help reduce or create a different ball flight for the player.

description.hltext_display: Dundee REIT Completes $115 Million Equity Offering
description.content:
To publish a PR you need to Register NOT FOR DISTRIBUTION TO U.S. NEWS WIRE SERVICES OR DISSEMINATION IN THE UNITED STATES.
DUNDEE REIT (TSX:D.UN) announced today the closing of its previously announced public offering of REIT Units, Series A ("Units") at a price of $29.85 per Unit. The syndicate of underwriters, led by TD Securities Inc., elected to exercise their over- allotment option in full, resulting in a total of 3,864,000 Units being issued today for gross proceeds of $115,340,400.
The net proceeds of the offering will be used to fund committed and future acquisitions and for general trust purposes.
This press release is not an offer of securities for sale in the United States. The Units being offered have not been and will not be registered under the United States Securities Act of 1933 and accordingly are not being offered for sale and may not be offered, sold or delivered, directly or indirectly within the United States, its possessions and other areas subject to its jurisdiction or to, or for the account or for the benefit of a U.S. person, except pursuant to an exemption from the registration requirements of that Act.
Dundee REIT is an unincorporated, open-ended real estate investment trust and provides high quality, affordable business premises. It is focused on owning, acquiring, leasing and managing mid-sized urban and suburban office and industrial properties in Canada. Dundee REIT's portfolio currently consists of approximately 11.5 million square feet of gross leasable area, located across Canada. Dundee REIT's portfolio is well diversified by geographic location and tenant mix. For more information, please visit www.dundeereit.com.

description.hltext_display: 非Ⅱ浪漫通告连连 圣诞告白甜蜜献礼
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
一首歌唱响心中最深处的感动，一曲旋律挑动回忆最珍贵零稀的画面，一个故事拼凑出浪漫最真实的色彩。非诚勿扰Ⅱ带着一段浪漫相约QQ炫舞。舞台之上的携手故事载满了今冬白色的点点回忆，而今天携手炫舞之旅则倍加浪漫。非诚勿扰Ⅱ今日全国上映，QQ炫舞携手非Ⅱ打造圣诞前最幸福的浪漫天地。接连不断的疯狂活动，惊喜不断的好礼回馈，加上浪漫天空下的朵朵白雪飘落手心，将感动融化至心。
邀您共赴浪漫之约，炫舞携手非诚勿扰Ⅱ：http://x5.qq.com/act/a20101203fcwr/
1年的时光沙漏将甜蜜的点滴故事写在了笑笑与秦奋的相亲日记中。而今天，在这相亲沙漏最后一粒沙落下之时，全国也同时翻开了笑笑与秦奋另一段的试婚日记。不变的浪漫主旋律，充满未知的爱情结局，非诚勿扰Ⅱ带来的是又一段甜蜜的故事。
携手的浪漫，狂欢的舞会，非诚勿扰Ⅱ活动连连发，通告不断，好礼不断。12月15日至1月15日，为期一个月的疯狂派对持续欢庆。
微博时代，快乐打头。QQ炫舞微博里也打开了圣诞联合献礼与元旦新年联合献礼的话甲子。非诚勿扰Ⅱ的火热上映也掀起了关于电影各种话题的讨论热潮。无论是电影场景、美食、歌曲、台词，还是由此引发的圣诞告白等等美好而又浪漫的话题都将成为今冬最热闹的讨论焦点。圣诞礼物、非卖绝版、结婚套装、飞行印章、元旦礼包等等好礼也掀起了非诚勿扰Ⅱ狂欢派对的高潮。非Ⅱ圣诞特辑“圣诞惊魂”以及圣诞元旦双“蛋”好礼的破壳而出也将迎来又一波狂欢的热潮。
准备好了圣诞惊喜浪漫的告白么？QQ炫舞携手非诚勿扰Ⅱ已经为舞者们准备好了一箱又一箱惊喜的大礼。非Ⅱ降临，圣诞将至，浪漫离我们还远么？《QQ炫舞》??最浪漫的舞蹈游戏《QQ炫舞》官方网站：http://x5.qq.com
官方论坛地址：http://x5.gamebbs.qq.com
《QQ炫舞》微博：http://t.qq.com/qqx5

description.hltext_display: 英王室双喜临门 女王外孙女将嫁橄榄球星
description.content: 路透伦敦12月21日电---英国皇室周二宣布，女王伊丽莎白二世的外孙女莎拉・菲利普斯（Zara Phillips）将与英国橄榄球球星廷道尔（Mike Tindall）成婚，不过皇室未提供确切的婚礼日期。

description.hltext_display: Создатель Wikileaks написал мемуары
description.content:
Создатель, пожалуй, самого скандального сайта в истории Интернета австралиец Джулиан Ассанж намерен написать мемуары. Как сообщает британская The Guardian, основатель WikiLeaks заключил контракт на издание автобиографии.
Информация об этом попала в СМИ из Twitter главы литературного департамента испанского подразделения Random HouseCanongate и Knopf. Рукопись будет закончена в марте", – написал Лопес. Клаудио Лопеса. "Дж. Ассанж продал свои мемуары. Публикацией в Великобритании и США займутся издательства
В Canongate веб-сайту DailyFinance подтвердили эту информацию. Как рассказал владелец издательства Джейми Бинг, CanongateFraser, Peters & Dunlop. По словам издателя, книга Ассанжа будет опубликована уже в следующем году. будут принадлежать права и на переводы будущих мемуаров. Бинг также сообщил, что решением правовых вопросов занималось британское литературное агентство
Австралийский хакер Джулиан Ассанж стал одним из главных ньюсмейкеров уходящего года. В конце июля 2010 г. на основанном им сайте WikiLeaks был выложен "Дневник войны в Афганистане" – собрание более чем 90 тыс. секретных документов, рассказывающих о действиях американского контингента в этой стране. Публикацию одобрили не все – некоторые эксперты и правозащитники заявили, что в результате публикации могут пострадать мирные афганцы, помогающие военным бороться с талибами. В начале октября WikiLeaks опубликовал еще более объемное собрание материалов о войне в Ираке.
Однако главной информационной бомбой стала коллекция из 250 тыс. не предназначенных для опубликования американских дипломатических телеграмм, выложенная на сайте в конце ноября. Из этих документов многие политики и руководители государств узнали, что именно думают о них сотрудники Госдепартамента США и американских дипмиссий.
Между тем у самого Ассанжа сейчас большие неприятности: в суде Великобритании рассматривается вопрос о выдаче его Швеции, правоохранительные органы которой обвиняют австралийца в совершении насильственных преступлений сексуального характера. В настоящий момент основатель WikiLeaks отпущен под залог.
Джулиан Ассанж оказался не единственным, кого посетила идея заработать на истории WikiLeaks. Рассказать о том, как все было на самом деле, собирается бывший соратник Ассанжа Даниэль Домшайт-Берг, в начале декабря объявивший, что создаст сайт-конкурент WikiLeaks.
По материалам: www.utro.ru
Теги: книга, издательство, автобиография, мемуары, Wikileaks, Джулиан Ассанж

description.hltext_display: 两名男子盗取骨灰盒敲诈殡仪馆
description.content:
中新网萍乡12月20日电 (王昊阳 肖本江)为谋取不义之财，江西两男子竟将主意打到死人身上，二人在半个月的时间内，行遍赣西，狂盗公墓、殡仪馆内的骨灰盒，事后敲诈殡仪馆。
日前，此案经江西省萍乡市安源区人民法院审结，被告人王某和周某犯敲诈勒索罪，各获刑三年零九个月。
据办案人员介绍，今年5月27日至6月14日晚，王某、周某先后窜至江西省靖安县殡仪馆公墓山、高安市殡仪馆、安义县殡仪馆、宜春市殡葬管理所、萍乡市人文公园，撬开公墓墓地盖板，先后盗走5名死者的骨灰盒，藏匿于公墓附近。
事后，二人在现场留下字条，要求殡仪馆工作人员与其通过手机短信联系。靖安县殡仪馆、安义县殡仪馆工作人员与二人联系后，皆被要求各汇款4000元，到二人指定的银行帐户，工作人员照办后，按被告人告诉的位置，找到了骨灰盒。
遭到敲诈的5殡仪馆中，2家汇款8000元，另3家未汇款。二人敲诈既遂8000元，未遂41000元。二人在萍乡作案时，被安源区警方抓获。
经安源区人民法院审理认为，王某和周某采取利用盗取的骨灰盒相要挟，敲诈公共财物，数额巨大，其行为构成敲诈勒索罪。
最终，法院一审判决王某和周某有期徒刑各三年九个月。(完)
稿件来源：中国新闻网 32

description.hltext_display: Biggest storm yet heads for Calif; homes evacuated
Seattle ships C Rob Johnson to San Diego
description.content:
The Seattle Mariners have traded catcher Rob Johnson to the San Diego Padres for a player to be named later or cash considerations.
Seattle and San Diego made the deal on Tuesday.
Johnson had been designated for assignment by the Mariners on Dec. 13 after the Mariners signed designated hitter Jack Cust and needed a spot on the 40-man roster.
Johnson was Seattle's opening day starter behind the plate in 2010 but his struggles at the plate eventually led to his demotion to Triple-A Tacoma. The 28-year-old Johnson played in 61 games last season with Seattle, but hit just .191.
He also struggled with an American League-high nine passed balls in less than a half-season.
Johnson never played for the Mariners after Aug. 1. In 18 games at Tacoma, Johnson hit .297.
Johnson was originally the Mariners' fourth-round pick in 2004 and played parts of four seasons in Seattle.

description.hltext_display: 患癌病亡保险拒赔? 提交保费发票虚假家属主动撤诉
description.content:
朱女士所在公司与保险公司签订了团体保险承保协议，但在朱女士患盆腔恶性肿瘤去世后，其亲属通过公司向保险公司请求支付赔偿金时却遭到拒绝。朱女士的三名亲属遂将中华联合财产保险股份有限公司深圳分公司（以下简称中华联合财险）告上法庭，索要5万元保险金。此案昨在深圳中院二审开庭，让人颇感意外的是，朱女士亲属当庭承认了提交虚假发票的事实，最终主动放弃了诉讼请求。
一审：
保险公司支付5万元
朱女士亲属诉称，朱所在单位深圳某公司于2007年5月与中华联合财险签订了团体保险承保协议，2008年5月，该公司续保并缴纳了保险费用。2008年4月12日，朱女士患病入院治疗，被诊断为盆腔恶性肿瘤（小细胞瘤），后于2008年7月6日去世。
朱女士的丈夫、父母多次通过所在单位向中华联合财险请求履行保险责任，但对方均以各种理由推脱。无奈之下，朱女士的亲属将中华联合财险诉至法院，请求法院判令对方支付保险金5万元。
而中华联合财险则辩称，朱女士的亲属没有证据证明朱是保险单上所载明的28种重大疾病而死亡，死亡原因不明，因此不予支付赔偿款。
一审福田法院审理查明，根据朱女士亲属提交的医院病理会诊报告单、住院疾病诊断证明书等均证明朱女士死亡原因是患有恶性肿瘤。另外，中华联合财险此前已按照附加28种重大疾病保障保险向朱女士亲属支付了1万元保险金，但未支付附加团体人身疾病身故保险的保险金5万元。因此法院判决中华联合财险支付朱女士亲属保险金5万元。
二审：
双方达成调解
因不服一审判决，中华联合财险上诉至深圳中院。昨日二审开庭时，中华联合财险一方表示，朱女士死亡时间为2008年7月6日，而保险期限为2007年5月17日至2008年5月16日，朱女士是在保险期满后去世的，双方并未在2008年5月续签员工团体保险承保合同书，因此他们不应承担保险责任。
该方还提出，朱女士亲属提交的保费发票是虚假的，且未能提交保费转账凭证，不能证明已缴纳保费。
让人颇感意外的是， 昨日在法庭上，朱女士亲属承认了发票是虚假的，是基于错误事实提起诉讼。双方最终达成调解，朱女士亲属放弃了诉讼请求。

description.hltext_display: Рада обнулила госпошлины
description.content:
Верховная Рада приняла в целом закон «О внесении изменения в ст. 4 Декрета Кабинета министров «О государственной пошлине» (относительно льгот по уплате государственной пошлины).
За принятие соответствующего закона (№ 6506, инициатор – премьер-министр Николай Азаров) проголосовали 243 народных депутата из 259, зарегистрированных в сессионном зале.
Как сообщили в пресс-службе ВР, законом предусмотрено, что от уплаты госпошлины освобождаются органы соцстрахования и органы соцобеспечения – по регрессным искам о взыскании с лица, причинившего вред, сумм пособий и пенсий, выплаченных потерпевшему или членам его семьи, а органы соцобеспечения – также по искам о взыскании неправильно выплаченных пособий и пенсий.
Как известно, закон был принят в январе 1993 года, и органы соцобеспечения имели право на такую льготу по уплате госсбора. В 1997 году эти органы были переименованы в органы труда и социальной политики населения, в связи с чем и возникла необходимость внести изменения до этого декрета.
По материалам: politics.comments.ua
Теги: экономика, Украина, премьер-министр, законопроект, Рада, Николай Азаров, пошлина

description.hltext_display: Gearhart Chevrolet makes news by ...
description.content:
n historical event took place at Gearhart Chevrolet in Denville. It was a huge leap for the domestic automobile industry as evidenced by a mass media reaction. The very first 2011 Chevy Volt in the nation was sold by Gearhart Chevrolet to Jeffrey Kaffee, a retired airline pilot who lives in Parsippany.
STAFF PHOTOS BY PIERFRANCESCO BACCARO
The first electric car by Chevrolet, the Volt, arrived at Gearhart Chevrolet in Denville and was purchased by Parsippany resident Jeffrey Kaffee, shown here inside his new Volt.From left, CNBC reporter Philip LeBeau interviewing Gearhart Chevrolet president Judith Schumacher-Tilton as she hands over the keys to Jeffrey Kaffee.
Along with the huge turnout of local print and broadcast media companies, Phil LeBeau of CNBC reported live from the dealership, as the documents were signed and the keys were handed over to the nation's first Chevy Volt owner. News 12 was on site to report and WOR-710AM Radio broadcasted live on the "Morning Show with John Gambling" to mark this event.
Chevrolet announced that this all-electric car marks the first delivery of 10,000 in scheduled production during the coming year. Gearhart Chevrolet is the largest volume Chevy dealer in Morris County and its sister dealership, Schumacher Chevrolet in Little Falls, is the third largest Chevrolet dealership in the state. Both are owned by the Tilton Automotive Group and the Schumacher-Tilton Family.
Stephen Tilton, Gearhart CFO, stated, "There will be a total of 300 Volts available in the New York Metro area in the immediate coming months and into the first quarter of 2011 and we expect to have an allotment between the two dealerships of 15-20 Volts within that time period, most of which have been pre-sold". Judith Schumacher-Tilton, president of the dealership made a statement citing that " the Chevy Volt puts GM back in the game and the push toward everything domestic is a step in the right direction for America."
The Chevy Volt is the world's first mass produced, plug-in electric vehicle with extended range. The EPA estimates that the Volt will travel for 35 miles entirely driven by its 149 horse power electric motor. An 9.3-gallon reserve gas tank can power the vehicle for an additional 344 miles giving the Volt a total range of approximately 375 miles on a single charge and a full tank of gas.
The engine fires only as needed and acceleration is firm and linear with an unbelievable pick up speed of 0-60 mph in just 9.0 seconds. The four-door, four-passenger hatchback has front-wheel drive, front-engine mount and carries a base price of approximately $33,500 after a $7,500 tax credit.
The 16 KWH lithium-ion battery pack is backed by a 100,000 mile/eight-year warranty. Most people can commute gas and tail pipe emissions free for about $1.50 per day. It can be plugged into any residential electrical outlet — meaning, no external charging station is required.
Chevy Volt has been named 2011 Motor Trend Car of the Year.
For more information, or to test drive the NEW Chevy Volt, come to Gearhart Chevrolet at 281 Route 46 East in Denville, or call 973-627-0900.

description.hltext_display: 파주서 구제역 방역기계 수리중 손가락 절단사고
description.content: 21일 오후 7시쯤 경기도 파주시 적성면 어유지리 구제역 방역초소에서 이동통제 근무를 서던 적성면주민센터 공무원 A(39)씨가 방역기계 벨트에 손가락이 끼어 절단되는 사고가 발생했다.A씨는 방역초소에서 사용하던 약품 분사용 차량용 방역기계가 얼어 순간적으로 작동이 되지 않자 직접 수리를 하려다 벨트에 새끼손가락이 밀려들어가 1cm 정도 절단되는 사고를 입었다.A씨는 긴급 출동한 119구조대에 의해 응급처치를 받고 병원으로 이송됐다.

description.hltext_display: POWEO abandonne la production pour survivre
description.content:
(AOF) - Poweo A cet effet, l'opérateur national autrichien Verbund, actionnaire de référence de Poweo depuis 2006, a proposé de racheter pour un montant de 120 millions d'euros, correspondant à leur valeur nette comptable, les 60% de Poweo Production qu'il ne détient pas encore.
Poweo considère que cette opération lui permettra de dégager les ressources de trésorerie appropriées au regard de ses engagements financiers pour l'ensemble de l'année 2011 a minima.
Poweo bénéficiera également jusqu'au 30 juin 2013 d'une option de rachat de cette participation.
En outre, Poweo a d'ores et déjà confié à un établissement bancaire un mandat de cession portant sur l'ensemble de sa branche Energies Renouvelables, comprenant une capacité de production installée de 105 MW.
Selon Poweo, la cession des actifs de production d'électricité s'inscrit dans la logique d'une loi NOME qui ne favorise plus le modèle d'opérateur intégré combinant la production et la commercialisation d'énergie.
Le rapport remis en avril 2009 par la Commission Champsaur considérait pourtant que les nouveaux entrants qui investissaient dans la production d'électricité devraient se voir octroyer un avantage supplémentaire en termes de conditions d'acquisition d'électricité d'origine nucléaire, indispensable pour la compétitivité de leurs offres commerciales ; ce schéma n'a toutefois pas été retenu dans la loi NOME, a regretté le groupe.
Par ailleurs Poweo entend poursuivre les discussions intensives déjà engagées afin d'identifier et mettre en oeuvre toute mesure d'accompagnement permettant de pérenniser plus avant sa présencesur le marché français en tant que commercialisateur d'énergie.
Du point de vue de Poweo, il est nécessaire à cet égard que les pouvoirs publics créent maintenant un environnement attractif sur le marché français de la commercialisation d'énergie.
Le deuxième acteur mondial dans le domaine de l'électricité est né. Deux ans après la fusion entre Gaz de France et Suez, GDF Suez vient de reprendre le britannique International Power. Il est ainsi propulsé du neuvième au deuxième rang des producteurs mondiaux d'électricité, derrière EDF. Il devient également le leader mondial des groupes de services aux collectivités (utilities) en tenant compte de la production de gaz. Toutefois, cette opération va accroître la dette de GDF Suez, qui va passer de 33,5 à 42,4 milliards d'euros. Le groupe français compte donc lancer des cessions de 4 à 5 milliards d'euros. En France, l'emploi intérimaire, qui a commencé à redémarrer fin 2009, a continué sa progression, en juin. Le rythme a été un peu supérieur aux mois passés, avec une hausse de 1,3% sur un mois et de 24,8% sur un an. L'augmentation avait été plus faible au mois de mai (+0,3% sur un mois et +22,8% sur un an) mais à peu près équivalente en avril (+1,7 % sur un mois et +24,6 % sur un an). Cette donnée n'est pas spécifique à la France car l'intérim se redresse également à l'étranger, notamment aux Etats-Unis. C'est ce que confirment les chiffres publiés par le leader mondial du secteur, Adecco. Il a bénéficié d'une croissance de 16% de son chiffre d'affaires en juillet et août. Selon le groupe le taux de pénétration sur le marché du travail de la part de l'intérim remonte aux États-Unis. Il avait chuté à 1,3% pendant la crise et se situe désormais à 1,6%.
Selon une source de marché, Oddo Securities a suspendu son objectif de cours et confirmé son opinion Alléger sur Poweo. La dernière publication (CA T3 le 10 novembre 2010) a fait état de pertes supérieures aux attentes du broker. De plus, la visibilité sur les prochains mois lui semble actuellement limitée.

description.hltext_display: Savior For Strugglers Ping K15 Fairway Wood Review
description.content:
The Ping K15 Fairway Woodis ideal for those who struggle with fairways. The head is oversized and with a longer, deeper face the Ping G15 fairways and this provides excellent levels of forgiveness. As the head the larger than standard it gives a great zing sound at impact and the feel is very good too. Around the Christmas is when you can find a lot of cheap golf clubs online and you can take the K15 fairways home at a good price.
The K15 Fairway Wood has an elongated head design that increases the moment of inertia by 25%. Together with an external weight pad, this new design ensures natural club head rotation to improve accuracy and distance. The low profile design of the K15 fairway wood lowers the center of gravity for improved performance while inspiring confidence to launch the ball higher.
The Ping K15 Fairway Wood features a larger head design that has positioned the mass of the club away from the club face to help increase the moment of inertia and lower and deepen the centre of gravity to provide a dynamic loft at impact that produces a higher trajectory.
Like the K15 driver, the K15 fairway wood uses Ping's patent pending Straight Flight Technology that utilizes an external weight pad to place 6% of the clubhead mass towards the heel of the club. This promotes a natural clubhead rotation through impact while the clever design means the external sole weight pad is barely visible at address.
The flight is a little higher than a G15 fairway, but not much and as long as you are not playing in windy conditions, mid-handicappers could consider this club too. The SF Tec (Straight Flight Technology) 'bulge' on the heel side of the sole is subtle and helps to turn the club over at impact to reduce the likelihood of a fade. Overall the Ping K15 Fairway Wood is a great fairway wood for higher handicappers.

description.hltext_display: 夫妇大量拼接变造假币跨省购物
description.content:
中新网新余12月20日电 (王昊阳 宋英)邓某和刘某是湖南省涟源市一对农民夫妇，二人专业从事拼接变造假币，并带着两位亲戚跑到江西，以购买日常用品的方式，以假币换得真币。四位农民在江西频繁作案，被新余市分宜县警方抓获，涉案金额达2万余元。
日前，此案经分宜县人民法院审结，四人犯变造货币罪与使用假币罪，邓某被判处有期徒刑三年，刘某等人被判处有期徒刑一年零六个月。
据办案人员介绍，邓某和刘某夫妇属累犯，曾因变造货币罪，分别被上海市卢湾区人民法院判处有期徒刑一年零三个月、一年。刑满释放后，二人不知悔改，今年又跑到江西以身试法，而且把两个侄子带上了犯罪道路。
今年5月，邓某在湖南省长沙市火车站，花3000元购买了25000元假币，刘某则从湖南省涟源市老家带来10000余元来长沙，二人将真币和假币拼接在一起，跑到江西省宜春市、新余市、分宜县等地，以购买卫生巾、鸡精等日用品方式使用假币。
刘某将侄子刘祥某和吴某也拉下水，给二人分配任务，每天用光1000元，主要用于购买20元以下的香烟，以假币购物，找回真币，再将香烟与真币交给刘某。刘某给二人每人每天100元工资，另负责二人日常开销。
邓某和刘某二人将找回的真币存入银行，或将真币换成百元钞票，再用真币与假币拼接，循环变造假币，供其继续获取非法利益。
邓某等人在分宜县频繁使用假币，遭到群众举报，引起警方重视。5月14日晚，邓某等四人在分宜县某宾馆落网，警方当场缴获假币19400元、变造币8700元、银行卡40张、使用假币购买的香烟247包、卫生巾15包、鸡精等日用品5件。
分宜县人民法院审理认为，邓某和刘某等人采取用真假货币拼凑的手段，改变货币的真实形态，变造货币达24500元，数额较大，其行为均已构成变造货币罪；刘祥某、吴某明知是假币而使用，金额达15800元，数额较大，其行为均已构成使用假币罪。
最终，经法院一审判决，邓某和刘某犯变造货币罪，分别被判处有期徒刑三年、一年零六个月；刘祥某、吴某犯使用假币罪，分别被判处有期徒刑一年零六个月、一年。四人各处罚金10000元。(完)

description.hltext_display: Ryan is the new 36th District assemblyman
description.content:
of Nutley Sun
At an East Rutherford meeting on Tuesday night, Democratic leaders from Bergen, Essex and Passaic counties named Kevin Ryan, Essex County undersheriff and Nutley resident, to fill the unexpired 36th district Assembly seat, according to Assemblyman Gary Schaer's office.
"The 36th District is among the most diverse in New Jersey, encompassing a densely populated urban area in Passaic and 10 other municipalities each with their own distinct character," Schaer said in a press release.
"Along with Senator Paul Sarlo, I look forward to continue representing the residents of southern Bergen County, Nutley and Passaic and welcome Assemblyman-Designate Ryan to join us.
"With a respected career in law enforcement, he is well-suited to pick up right where former Assemblyman [Fred] Scalera left off, as an expert on homeland security issues."
State law required a county committee of the same party as the outgoing member select a candidate for replacement, and due to the multiple county makeup, a combined convention of members was necessary, the New Jersey Democratic State Committee told to the Sun earlier. The results are then certified by the county chairs, before being approved by the state chair, Communications Director Jason Springer said.
Ryan will remain in the position until a special election, scheduled for November.
"I also want to thank the dedicated men and women of the 36th District County Committee, including our committed municipal chairs and the leadership of our county chairmen, for their service to their communities and assistance moving forward with strong representation of a diverse legislative district," Schaer stated.
Ryan was with the Nutley Police Department before joining the county, where he's served for 17 years. Ryan was sworn in as undersheriff in 2008 and earns $113,297 annually.
According to the Sheriff Department's website, Ryan supervises the Field Operations Division, including the Bureau of Narcotics, the Patrol Division, the Bomb Squad, the K-9 Unit and the Office of Emergency Management.
Scalera of Nutley said he resigned on Nov. 29 to spend time with family and accept a private job.

Boys swimming: Mankato West 94, Mankato East/Loyola 84
description.content:
MANKATO — The Mankato West boys swim team was heavily favored going into Tuesday’s Big Nine Conference meet against crosstown rival Mankato East/Loyola. The Scarlets rolled to a 92-34 lead through the 500-yard freestyle and then swam exhibition in the last four events. The end result was a 94-84 win for the Scarlets.
See the full story in Wednesday's paper or at our e-edition.

description.hltext_display: 'Uneventful' school referendum on tap
description.content:
LYNDHURST — With a $30 million school referendum just a month away, district and township officials have been taking a low-key approach as they prepare for one of the district's most important votes in recent years.
While no public forum is scheduled to discuss the details of the proposed 125,000-square-foot middle school, there have been presentations, Board of Education meetings, PTA gatherings and civic events.
"It's uneventful," schools Superintendent Tracey Stellato said. "But we've been involved in all kinds of venues."
Before schools close this week for the holiday recess, attorneys are completing building specifications and the final wording for the Jan. 25 referendum, she said.
With six elementary schools older than 80 years, officials are hoping that residents will vote in favor of the project.
In the proposal, the $37 million middle school would be funded partly by the town, which will bond $7 million as part of a shared-services agreement to use the auditorium and run the office of emergency management, recreation programs and senior programs from the school.
The same plan fell through three years ago, when the developer of the EnCap golf and housing project went bankrupt, but officials said they think voters know the advantages the town would reap by having a middle school.
"This thing is not a surprise to anyone who lives in the town," Mayor Richard DiLascio said of the revived plan.
"I don't think people need to be convinced that the quality of education in a town directly reflects in the values that people see in their homes," he said.
The 6-acre property — a sports field owned by the school district near Marin and Page avenues and Fourth Street — was bought in the 1930s for a new school and is already zoned for public use.
Proponents are hoping that voters will be persuaded to approve the plan based on today's low interest rates, low construction cost and the obvious need to upgrade facilities.
"People are realizing that you can't have a building that's 118 years old," DiLascio said. "The Lincoln School is 118 years old. What are you going to do with that building?"

description.hltext_display: Census cuts state's clout
description.content:
Political leaders and analysts debated Tuesday how much clout New Jersey will really lose in Washington and which incumbents would have to face each other after the state loses a seat in the House of Representatives in 2012.
They all agreed, however, that voters may have to shout a little louder to be heard in Congress when there are more people in fewer districts.
The Census Bureau announced Tuesday that New Jersey's population on April 1 was nearly 8.8 million. That's 4.5 percent more than 2000, but it was 63,000 short of what was needed to keep the 13 House seats the state has now. Western states grew by 13.8 percent, for example, and Southern states by 14.3 percent.
So in the next election, New Jersey will elect only 12 people to the House and they will each represent nearly 733,000 people.
"Someone's going to be disappointed come next fall. It's a mathematical reality," said Jay Webber, chairman of the Republican State Committee.
"Somebody is going to be in somebody else's district," agreed John Wisniewski, chairman of the Democratic State Committee.
Who that is won't be known until later next year, and neither chairman would speculate. Detailed population data down to the block level has to be released first, and then the 40 districts in the state Legislature must be redrawn in time for the June primaries. Then a special bipartisan commission with a yet-to-be-named independent tiebreaker will redraw the House districts.
One political scientist was predicting the lost district would come from North Jersey because estimates made throughout the past decade showed older urban areas such as Essex and Hudson counties shrinking while western and southern suburbs grew rapidly.
"There is going to be a lot more change up north in terms of who is represented by whom," said Patrick Murray, director of the Monmouth University Polling Institute. "That's where the population drifted away from."
The districts represented by Democratic Reps. Donald Payne of Newark and Albio Sires of West New York will probably continue to have a majority of African-American and Latino voters, respectively, or the map could face a court challenge using voting rights laws and Supreme Court precedents.
Murray said Republicans on the commission will likely want to put Democratic Reps. Steve Rothman of Fair Lawn and Bill Pascrell Jr. of Paterson together in the same district so one of them has to lose. Democrats, he said, will want to put Republican Reps. Rodney Frelinghuysen of Harding and Scott Garrett of Wantage together.
"The tiebreaking member may have an effect and might put a Republican and a Democrat in the same district, or somebody might decide to step down," he said.
Other political insiders were less sure the lost seat would definitely come from North Jersey because veteran lawmakers may try to protect themselves at the expense of those with less tenure or political power.
One seat to watch is that held by Jon Runyan of Mount Laurel, a Republican who defeated first-term Democrat John Adler last month.
Murray said the state's clout in Washington would not really be affected since the delegation rarely votes as a bloc for state issues and because the difference between a 12-vote bloc and a 13-vote bloc in a 435-member chamber is insignificant.
But Rep. Frank Pallone, D-Long Branch, said any decline in the state's delegation hurts New Jersey's power.
Wisniewski was concerned about the loss of a seat in the Electoral College, which is apportioned according to the number of House and Senate members a state has.
"New Jersey takes a step slightly backwards because electoral votes are the be-all and end-all in presidential politics," Wisniewski said.
The size of the House, which is controlled by Congress, has been 435 seats since 1911.
Last month's election sent seven Democrats and six Republicans to the House for the congressional session that starts in January, including Runyan.
