description.hltext_display: New Website Reveals All About Tassimo Machine
description.author: darakora
description.content:
10 Alexandra Terrace, King Edward, Avenue, Dartford, DA1 2HH. A new resource has been developed for people interested in tassimo machine has been launched. http://tassimomachine.com contains information about every aspect of tassimo machine including specific information about tassimo machine.tassimo machine, the owner, announcing the launch of the site also highlighted the importance of establishing exactly what was useful and what was not when you research online. "The Internet is an amazing tool that has changed our lives, but when I've been researching tassimo machine online, I've often struggled to find any relevant, accurate, and useful information".It's harder than ever to work out what is actually true about a particular subject, and information online about tassimo machine is no exception.
tassimo machine has spent many months in preparation for the launch of the website, investigating the authority resources from not only websites, but also from audios and videos. The comprehensive nature of the website means that, whatever specific area the visitor is looking for (for example, like information about tassimo machine, for example), then they will certainly find it.Very few websites take account of what the end-user wants as obviously they have a financial objective. However, this website is completely free of charge, as its creator feels that it was about time that someone did what the average surfer didn't have time to do - namely, seperate the 'truth' from 'fiction'.
A number of users have already given feedback on the website with a number commenting on how practical it was to have all the necessary resources in one place without having to search around the Internet to discover what they needed.If you want to find out more, please go to http://tassimomachine.com where all the information you need can now be found one of the Internet's top new tassimo machine websites.

description.hltext_display: Taylormade R7 CGB Max Fairway Wood's Review
description.content:
Tell you, the TaylorMade R7 CGB Max Fairway Wood is equipped with TaylorMades moveable weight technology. Something that will appeal to the golfers who like to tweak their own equipment.Its head is fitted with 3 moveable weights, which Taylor Made say will give a golfer around 22 yards of flexibility in their shot type from left to right. For those who love drivers that allow them to tinker with the weight configuration at every opportunity, the Taylor Made R7 CGB Max fairway wood is the logical addition to their golf bag.It features movable weight technology, a discretionary weighting system that can be manipulated to change the club's characteristics on a shot-to-shot basis, generating results from a 20-yard draw to a 2-yard fade bias.
It's easy enough to tinker with that course conditions or the state of a player's game that day can be factored into its performance, with the weight changing according to the situation at hand.It also has the triangular head shape that Taylor Made is so fond of, with the typical center of gravity that is low and deep in the clubhead. Because the titanium clubhead contains Taylor Made's inverted cone technology, it has a high MOI and enough forgiveness and stability for everyone.
Moreover, the TaylorMade r7 CGB MAX fairway woods incorporate a variety of top-level technologies that make them the best game-improvement fairways that TaylorMade has ever created. They share the driver's triangular head shape and the exceedingly far-back CG location in relation to the face that this geometry makes possible. That CG location will prove especially valuable to the many players who have trouble getting fairway woods in the air. Last but not least is SuperFast Technology in the form of an ultra-light graphite shaft that promotes added clubhead speed for increased distance.
This would probably be a good fairway wood for mid to high handicappers. While not being ultra forgiving, you will certainly be let off with the majority of bad strikes.The power this club produced was generally very good. Despite the higher trajectory on most shots the carry could be very impressive. However this may be harder to achieve if you're hitting into a very stiff wind. Something that should probably be considered when players look at this club.
Overall, the R7 CGB Max is certainly a good reliable Fairway Wood. Safe and efficient off the tee, and fantastic for launching the ball off the fairway.You get decent distance, but not quite as much as with the Burner Fairway Wood from TaylorMade, which we found to be a very long club indeed.But for us, despite the many good qualities of the TaylorMade R7 CGB Max Wood, the club on the whole just launched the golf ball a bit too high for our liking. But each golfer will have their own opinion on what they are after for their game.

description.hltext_display: 上海男高音歌唱家魏松车祸留疤索赔百万
description.content:
原告：
事故的造成在于司机驾驶拖挂货车，在城市快速路上倒车，而出租车司机一味追求高速行驶而疏于观察。事故导致魏松的颜面部受伤严重。
被告：
海博出租愿意承担三成赔偿责任。对于魏松提出的10万元整形治疗费、误工减少的52万元收入，代理人认为“证明力欠缺”，要求原告出示商业演出的个人税单。
当歌唱家的脸部容貌因车祸而受损，并连续取消了演出合同，其最终要求赔偿52万余元的“误工收入”和10万元的精神损失。3日，上海市浦东新区人民法院开庭审理了男高音歌唱家魏松遭遇车祸索赔案。此案中的两名被告，海博出租车公司和常州一运输公司则认为，魏松索赔请求不仅金额过高，而且缺少依据。
原告：货车超车道上倒车
2007年9月22日，著名歌唱家魏松搭乘了海博出租车前往浦东国际机场。然而，出租车在行驶至迎宾大道（外围）远东上桥处变道时，出租车与两部常州新华昌集装箱运输有限公司的牵引拖挂车发生追尾。
魏松的代理人侯律师称，出租车一头撞进了车尾底部，而坐在后排的乘客魏松则被抛到前椅，与挡风玻璃发生了碰撞，随后反弹到后排座椅，头部猛烈撞击副驾驶座椅。
据鉴定，事故导致魏松面部受伤严重，缝合20余针，如今留下多处疤痕，其中右颊挫裂伤达4厘米。
原告认为，事故的造成在于司机驾驶拖挂货车，在城市快速路上倒车，而出租车司机一味追求高速行驶而疏于观察。
在原告方看来，魏松的脸颊和口唇部受伤、组织缺损并留有多处明显大疤痕，给魏松造成了严重的精神伤害。魏松因此缺席了原定国庆期间的5场上海市级音乐晚会和多场商业演出，蒙受了较大经济损失。
为此，魏松将海博出租车公司和常州一运输公司双双告上了法庭，并提出了包括精神损失、误工收入、医疗整形、营养费等总共100万多元的赔偿要求。
海博：愿承担三成责任
庭审时，被告之一的海博出租表示，根据警方的交通事故责任认定，愿意承担三成赔偿责任。
对于魏松提出的10万元整形治疗费以及误工减少的52万余元的收入，海博出租的代理人提出了“证明力欠缺”的质疑。
“这方面损失的证据主要来自歌剧院出具的如‘每场演出两万元’的证明，以及商业演出的合同，”海博出租的代理人认为，“这些证据缺少法律依据。”该代理人说，魏松应提供能证明公司性收入的工资单，或者商业演出中个人所得税税单。
运输公司还坚持认为魏松的精神损失费“要价太高”。
后遗症：至今不敢坐出租
但侯律师认为，原告所主张的损失均是受伤前，魏松所在单位上海歌舞团已经确定或已经与其他单位签订的演出合同，履行期在住院或病休期间之内的，这些演出未能参加、合同未能履行导致的损失和被告的侵权行为之间存在法律上的因果关系。

description.hltext_display: 九岁女童吃饭就能睡着 求医半年没找出病因(图)
description.content:
蕾蕾有时候在沙发上一靠就能睡着
半岛都市报12月20日讯 “我实在是没有办法了，看着曾经‘活蹦乱跳’的女儿成了今天这个模样，心里真的好难受啊！”20日，家住莱西的王女士反映，今年5月份开始自己9岁的女儿总是犯困，有时候正吃着饭也睡了过去，还经常做噩梦说梦话。她带着孩子去过很多医院，都没确诊是什么病，吃了很多药也没有效果，无奈之下她求助本报寻找专家。
怪：9岁娃娃突然爱睡
王女士告诉记者，女儿蕾蕾(化名)今年9岁，上小学三年级，从今年5月份开始，女儿经常犯困，每天早上7点就起床，但是一到了9点就喊着想睡觉。“一开始我以为她上学比较累，打瞌睡是正常的，但慢慢地她困得越来越频繁了。”王女士说，女儿每次从学校回到家就想睡觉，有时正吃饭也能趴在桌上睡着，一般白天能睡三四次，每次都能睡上一个多小时，叫也叫不醒。
“不仅老睡觉，还经常做噩梦说梦话，经常睡着后哆嗦几下。”王女士说，孩子经常睡醒后告诉她梦见了害怕的事情，精神十分紧张。孩子不睡觉的时候，身上也没有劲，两腿发软。蕾蕾身高1.33米，体重原来有25公斤，生病之后身体浮肿，体重增加到了35公斤。
痛：四处求医不见疗效
王女士伤心地告诉记者，有时候看到孩子倒在沙发上呼呼大睡，她就坐在一旁心疼地哭。“青岛的医院几乎看遍了，还去过济南和北京的医院，但是都没有查出准确的病因。”
“孩子看电视高兴的时候会不经意地点几下头，特别兴奋的时候也会做这个动作，所以有医院诊断孩子是癫痫。”王女士说，也有医生说不是癫痫。还有两家医院的医生说，孩子是发作性睡眠，给孩子开了一些治疗药物，但现在吃了一个多月依然没有任何作用。
急：渴望专家救救孩子
蕾蕾的老师也发现，她上课精神不集中，经常会趴在桌子上睡着。王女士说，以前丈夫开着一个手机店，平时自己可以去店里帮帮忙，每个月能挣2000多元，家里虽然不富裕，但一家三口过得很幸福。可是自从孩子生病以后，因为要给孩子到处看病，丈夫的手机店经常关门，收入也受到了影响。
“我们真想找到这方面的专家，帮我们看看孩子到底是得了什么病。”王女士说，现在孩子又吃药又打针，遭了这么多罪，她心疼极了。

description.hltext_display: Learn some cruel lessons
description.content:
There were some cruel lessons to be learned from the final stages of yesterday's Open Championship at Turnberry - not least that hard work on those tricky shots around the green will pay off.
Handicap golfers were undoubtly scratching their heads as to why more players were unable to get up and down from just off the green to save par but from your armchair it's hard to appreciate the delicacy of touch required to keep the ball down and under control when the greens are firm and a seaside wind is whipping across the course.
Most of the counterfeits we receive come from club pros who inadvertently take a very convincing fake as part of a trade-in. If they don't happen to stock every manufacturer they might not have anything with which to compare the fake one. Not being able to compare like for like is the biggest reason why so many get into the market.
A crucial hole as the event reached its climax was the par-3 15th hole. At 206 yards and the wind helping off the right, the back left pin position was easily accessible to players of Tour calibre and protected only by a typically severe, steep-faced links bunker less than five paces behind the hole.
At last, If you want to be harder to beat by your friends while getting your handicap down in a hurry, practising three shots into two around the green. Build a good short game can make all the difference! Fighting! Fighting!

description.hltext_display: 男子欲为结婚姐姐送厚礼盗窃单位保险柜
description.content:
姐姐要结婚，弟弟想送一份厚礼，但又苦于手头紧张，弟弟铤而走险，把单位保险柜里3万多元现金拿走。昨日，成都商报记者获悉，金牛检察院以涉嫌盗窃罪对弟弟提起公诉。近日，金牛法院将公开审理该案。
今年10月18日凌晨3时许，袁某利用事先偷配的保险柜钥匙，将当日保险柜里的33200元盗走。第二天，民警例行盘查时，袁某交代了犯罪事实。袁某供述，他作为快餐店“乡村基”的中层管理人员，保险柜钥匙由他和另外四人轮流保管，一人保管一天。他得知姐姐要结婚，他工资虽然不低，一个月有三千多的收入，但没什么积蓄。苦于没钱给姐姐置办礼物，他打起了保险柜的主意。10月17日下班后，在家挣扎几个小时后，次日凌晨3时许，他来到店里，打开了财务室保险柜，拿走了3万多元。
昨日，成都商报记者采访了袁某的姐姐。姐姐说，姐弟俩从小感情就很好，家里条件不好，当时家里只允许一个人读书，姐姐主动放弃了读书，很早就出去打工，弟弟读书、结婚的费用大都是姐姐打工挣来的。可能正因为此，弟弟想送一份厚礼，才铤而走险干了傻事。
稿件来源：南海网 38

description.hltext_display: 女子不满丈夫因偷车被判6个月将孩子扔法院
description.content:
“喂，是刑庭的法官吗？我是向华青(化名)的老婆，我把我的大儿子留在法院了，希望你们照顾他……”12月14日，一位女子将电话打进新都法院的刑庭，而她的丈夫因偷盗电瓶车刚被新都法院判处有期徒刑6个月。昨日，成都商报记者获悉，在法官的劝说下，该女子终于将儿子领了回去。
事情的缘由还得从2006年的一件案子说起。向华青是四川省资中县人，小学文化，与妻子何晶玲(化名)一起来新都打工。2006年2月16日下午3时许，向华青将新都区大丰镇某小区一辆价值2300余元的电动车盗走，后以300余元贱卖。案发后公安机关将向华青挡获，后向华青取保候审。案件移送至法院后，向华青却一直未能到案。法院人员经过多次联系，均未能联系上向华青，最后只得终止案件审理。直到2010年11月9日，在民警的例行检查中，发现了网上追逃人员向华青，将其挡获归案。
恢复庭审后，向华青辩称自己并非有心逃避司法机关的处罚，而是因为不懂法，以为自己没什么事了，就到郫县打工去了。法院考虑到向华青虽然在取保候审期间逃逸属于情节恶劣，但是本案社会危害性不大，且罪犯家中尚有年幼的两个儿子需要照顾，家庭困难，依法判处向华青有期徒刑六个月。
判决生效后不久，12月14日，向华青的妻子何晶玲带着两个年幼的儿子到法院开取“在押人员会见单”，其离去后不久就打来了上述电话。接到电话后，刑庭法官立即冲下楼，最后在门口法警队值班室找到了孩子，这名男孩只有4岁。
根据来电显示，刑庭法官联系上了何晶玲。何晶玲说，自己一个人带着两个年幼的孩子确实困难，大儿子4岁，小儿子2岁，把两个儿子独自放在家里自己又不放心，但是带着儿子出去打工又不现实。
随后，法官带着何晶玲来到看守所看望向华青。向华青知道此事后，没有埋怨妻子，只是劝说妻子不希望家散了。最后，在法院和向华青的劝说下，何晶玲终于将儿子领了回去，新都法院还向何晶玲资助了部分现金和一些生活用品。

description.hltext_display: Why Titleist AP2 710 Forged Irons 2010 Is So Hot?

Descrition
I believe everybody knows that theTitleist AP2 710 irons are advanced performance, multi-material, dual cavity forged irons that provide improved feel, classic blade looks, and playability with shot control for the serious and skilled golfer.
Features:1. Advanced Performance: You Can FeelHigh quality, high technology design and construction featuring a forged steel body, tungsten nickel box and Tuned Feel System enhances performance and feel.2. Improved Feel: The integrated aluminum and soft elastomer Tuned Feel System in the back cavity improves sound and feel at impact. A soft, forged carbon steel body with a high density tungsten nickel sole box reduces low frequency vibration for soft, solid feel.3. Playability With Shot Control: Dual Cavity design pushes weight to the perimeter for playability without loss of shot shaping control.4. Dynamic Gold Shaft: High performance, tour-proven shaft provides player preferred feel, weight feedback and shot control.
One of my friends has had it and played it . He said, " this AP2 710 looks very well. And it is rather great. I like it very much. If you have this club, you will get a different feeling on the green. description.hltext_display: Man City boss to be handed £50m transfer kitty
description.content: The Mirror reports that the City owners have told Mancini they will spend what is needed to get the club back in the race for the Premier League title. City failed to get top the top of the table following their 2-1 home defeat to Everton on Monday. Mancini is reportedly keen to bring in a new striker in January to ease the burden on Carlos Tevez. Wolfsburg star Edin Dzeko and Porto striker Hulk are amon the players being linked with moves to Eastlands. City are ready to sell players such as Emmanuel Adebayor, Roque Santa Cruz, Wayne Bridge and Shaun Wright-Phillips in order to part-fund Mancini's transfer kitty.

description.hltext_display: 丈夫和俩宝宝下跪 网恋让锦州女子铁心离婚
Category: Finance and bankingSubject: BIDV extends financing to housing, seafood firmsRead: 4484Published: 11/03/2006 10:11')"> BIDV extends financing to housing, seafood firms
description.content:
(VNS) The Bank for Investment and Development of Viet Nam (BIDV) on Monday signed an agreement on comprehensive co-operation with Housing and Urban Development Corporation and Ha Long Investment and Development Company.
HA NOI (25 Oct 2006) — The Bank for Investment and Development of Viet Nam (BIDV) on Monday signed an agreement on comprehensive co-operation with Housing and Urban Development Corporation and Ha Long Investment and Development Company.
Under the agreement, from 2006-2008, BIDV commits to grant the corporation a maximum short-term credit of VND1.2 trillion (US$75 million) each year.
BIDV itself will supply loans or seek other credit institutions to co-support the corporation’s feasible, effective, and payable projects which comply with BIDV’s credit conditions.
For Ha Long Investment and Development Company (BIM), this year, BIDV will provide BIM a short-term loan worth VND200 billion ($12.4 million) to finance seafood breeding and processing activities in its production bases in Quang Ninh and Kien Giang provinces.
In the 2006-09 period, BIDV will consider financing capital for BIM’s three projects with a total investment of VND510 billion ($31.8 million) in 60 months.
The bank yesterday also become a main sponsor for Asian Pacific Economic Cooperation with funds of VND3.2 billion ($199,750). — VNS

description.hltext_display: 80后硕士专业收废品 “破烂王”账本里有房有车
description.content:
高亚洲一天的生活开支
生活消费：早餐，1杯牛奶、1个鸡蛋、饼干若干共花4元;中饭，15元；晚饭，40元;饭后的奶茶、水果20元；买阅读刊物10元；通信费10元/天。
个人租贷：房贷100元/天；房租20元/天。
公司开支：工资开支950元、伙食开支250元、交通开支(两辆货车和一辆小汽车)50元、经营场地租金30元/天。
1389元――这是一位刚毕业硕士的日开销。他叫高亚洲，今年湖大行政管理研究生毕业。他不是富二代，更不是纨绔子弟，而是靠“破烂”为生的80后创业者。他的账本里有他的事业蓝图、有他的生活愿景、有他从学生到创业者的成长轨迹。
日开销从13元变为1300元
长沙愿景废旧物资回收有限责任公司的总经理、财务、业务员……25岁的高亚洲身兼数职，日开销1300元以上。而半年前，他还是名学生，每天忙着做调研、写论文，除了三餐，不用花任何钱，“一天13元足够了”。
如今，房贷、房租、车耗以及公司的各项开支都来了，而且都是刚性的。面对记者，高亚洲憨憨地说：“这种转变很自然，连自己都没想到。”
他的账单里还有10元的刊物消费，大学养成的阅读习惯，高亚洲一直坚持着，“去图书馆不方便，只能自己买。”
放下身段苦干，只赚不赔
与废品为伍，几乎没有大学生会愿意，但高亚洲却认为废品能发挥很大的“剩余价值”。
2009年5月起，他多次给企业老总和高校领导写信，如今已建立了稳定的“废品回收”合作联盟。高亚洲认为，创业者从事废品回收风险小、市场空间却很大。
他采用“传统销售+电子商务模式”，将能再使用的物品，如旧家具、旧家电、旧书等在网上挂牌销售。明年，他准备投资数十万元，提高再生资源回收行业的技术含量和增值空间。
买房买车写文章都不误
事业蒸蒸日上，高亚洲的生活也丝毫不落伍。毕业之前，高亚洲就买了小轿车。3个月前，他又首付25万元，买下了一栋复式楼，“一大家子都过来也住得下了”，他乐呵呵地说。
如今他父母、兄嫂来长沙帮他打理公司，他还有了温柔贤淑的女友，他说，长沙给他的幸福感很“粗壮”，这都是自己努力争取来的。
工作之余，高亚洲还坚持着他的写作梦想。如今，他已在《中国青年报》、《南方都市报》、《三湘都市报》等报纸发表过多篇评论文章。他说，“我的梦想我都要实现。”

description.hltext_display: Rescatan a una mujer y sus dos hijos de un incendio en su vivienda en Alcoy
description.content:
Alcoy (Alicante), 22 dic (EFE).- Una mujer y sus dos hijos han sido rescatados por los bomberos tras declararse un incendio en el salón de su vivienda, en la localidad alicantina de Alcoy, si bien las llamas no han provocado daños personales, según han informado fuentes del Consorcio Provincial.
Los hechos tuvieron lugar en la tarde de ayer en el comedor de un inmueble, situado en el segundo piso de un edificio de la calle Escultor Peresejo, en Alcoy.
El incendio, ya extinguido, se originó por motivos que se desconocen en un domicilio en el que se encontraban una mujer y sus dos hijos pequeños, los cuales fueron rescatados por los bomberos, quienes además confinaron en sus respectivas viviendas al resto de vecinos de la comunidad por razones de seguridad.
Según fuentes del Consorcio alicantino, las llamas se extendieron rápidamente por toda la estancia de la vivienda afectada, que quedó completamente destrozada, al tiempo que el humo afectó también al resto de la vivienda.
Las mismas fuentes han confirmado que "nadie ha sufrido daños personales".
Los bomberos ventilaron los domicilios del edificio para que los propietarios, excepto los de la vivienda en la que se originó el incendio, pudieran volver a sus casas.
Al servicio acudieron el vehículo primera salida y la autoescalera desde el parque de bomberos en Cocentaina (Alicante), con el sargento jefe de turno y cinco bomberos. EFE 1010437

description.hltext_display: My Experience In GOlf Course
description.content:
The Northern Irishman has only two professional titles to his name and is looking to end a 21-month wait for a second European Tour win."This year hasn't been as successful as I wanted it to be," he said. "It's been a good 12 months but then I've had my ups and downs.
I felt as though I played good enough to have a couple more wins but that's the way golf goes sometimes. I've thrown in some really good golf and I've also had some pretty average weeks as well.
The Arabian Gulf's first beach front golf course, managed by Troon Golf, beat off some high profile courses to the coveted title, further demonstrating the strength and depth of golf Abu Dhabi as well as in the Middle East. Launched in January when Player hosted an inaugural tournament, the course has been lauded by visitors from all over the world. It features unrivalled ocean views, expansive bunkering and superb greens. The 21-year-old's only Tour wins to date are the 2009 Dubai Desert Classic and this year's Quail Hollow Championship. I love the golf course, I love Hong Kong and I love coming back here. And I know the golf course well and I feel I've got a good idea of what I need to this week to try and get that win here. The Ulsterman opted out of his PGA Tour card for next season after revealing he missed the camaraderie on the European circuit. I found out a lot about myself and why I was playing and what makes you happy and what makes you want to play golf. There's no point playing a golf tournament where you don't want to be at. In announcing I was quitting the US Tour, I didn't think it would have been such a big deal but then with Lee Westwood not going and Martin [Kaymer] still undecided, I can see how it could create a bit of a stir. But at the end of the day, you have to make yourself happy. You have to look after number one.

description.hltext_display: 争吵"气死"老太 小不忍付出天价赔偿
description.content:
人民网湖北谷城12月21日电 谷城一居民因与邻居老太发生矛盾纠纷，遂后双方发生争吵，不料，过后老太突发疾病抢救无效死亡，该居民遂卷入一场“人命”官司，为此付出高额吵架赔偿费。一提及此事，谷城居民张小荣（化名）懊悔不已。
12月19日下午，家住谷城县城关镇的居民张小荣（女）与住在同栋楼上的邻居老太太（77岁）因锁事发生矛盾纠纷，一时情急，就与老太发生了口角争执，过后约半个小时，老太太在家突发疾病，经抢救无效死亡。老太太的亲属便来到张小荣家理论要求“偿命”，见此情景，她可真的傻了，这下可惹大祸，两家为此闹的不可开交。该县城关派出所接到群众报警后，迅速及时介入，通过调查，初步认定该起事件不属于案件，前往处置民警通过现场法律政策宣传、有效控制，双方情绪趋于平稳，主要就责任认定和赔偿诉求差距较大达不成协议，经进一步工作，双方遂分别聘请律律师参与调解，经过多轮谈判，在律师积极工作、现场民警大力协助下，双方就赔偿达成一致意见，由张小荣赔偿死者家属5.5万元。随后老太太的家属同意火化尸体，至此该起因吵架惹出的人命官司画上一句号。
一场本该可以避免的“人命官司”发生了，给双方当事人带来巨大的精神伤害和财产损失。该案给广大市民朋友提了个醒，当与他人发生矛盾纠纷冲突时，一定要记住学会理智、宽容的心态去处理，心平气和地去解决，否则也会象案中的张小荣一样付出天价“吵架费”。（
稿件来源：人民网(北京) 43

description.hltext_display: Cipiers in Lantin staken weer
description.content:
In de gevangenis van Lantin, nabij Luik, hebben de cipiers dinsdag opnieuw het werk neergelegd. Er is onvrede over het gebrek aan personeel.
Vorige week werd er ook al gestaakt in de instelling, nadat een cipier was aangevallen door een gevangene.
Er werden al gesprekken met de directie gevoerd over de aanwerving van nieuwe krachten, maar dat leverde niets op. Een meerderheid van 80 procent besloot daarop het werken stop te zetten.
Ook in de gevangenis van Sint-Gillis is er al een hele week een staking aan de gang. De actievoerders wensen er eveneens extra mensen.

description.hltext_display: Tips om lingerie te kopen
description.content:
Peeters & Pichal actua lingerie man vrouw
Zoek je nog een kerstcadeau voor je vrouw? En wil je lingerie kopen, maar durf je niet? Dan heeft de Gezinsbond goede tips voor jou. In het jongste nummer van hun tijdschrift 'De Bond' publiceert deze organisatie namelijk een handleiding voor het kopen van een setje lingerie. Want veel mannen weten blijkbaar helemaal niet hoe dat moet.
Hoe zit dat bij jou? Ben jij een man, en kocht je al ooit lingerie voor je vrouw? Liep dat van een leien dakje? Ben jij een vrouw, en kreeg je al lingerie cadeau van je man? Was je tevreden over de aankoop? Laat het ons weten!

description.hltext_display: Perlis Raja Muda Wants More Youths To Take Up Golf
description.content: KANGAR, Dec 22 (Bernama) -- The Raja Muda of Perlis, Tuanku Syed Faizuddin Putra Jamalullail, today called for more youths in Perlis to be encouraged to take up golf to help identify talents in the sport. He also said that more competitions and coaches should be made available for these young golfers. Tuanku Syed Faizuddin gave the advice at the presentation of certificates at a youth clinic organised by the Malaysian Golf Association at the Putra Golf Club, here. The clinic was attended by 75 youths of between six and 16 years, and five of them were selected for participation in a golf clinic in Melaka. -- BERNAMA

event_or_fact.property: more competitions and coaches should be made available for these young golfers.

description.hltext_display: 医生派出所报案 医院内被"病人家属"骗120元
description.content:
南都讯 昨日上午，东华医院检验科的陈医生前往步步高派出所报案，称自己在医院内被所谓“病人家属”坑骗120元，即使报了案，他还是宁愿相信“病人家属”是没来得及还钱，而不是不还。
陈医生介绍，本月12日下午5时许，一位总在他身边晃悠的中年女人凑了上来打招呼：“陈医生你好，我父亲昨天想来找你检查身体，你竟然不上班。”此中年女人一番寒暄又接了一通电话后，以“在楼下买东西刚好差120元”为由开口借钱。
当陈医生询问其父亲名字并且希望能够在病历系统上寻找记录时，中年女子开始不满意：“连120元都不肯借……我父亲还说想请你吃饭……私家车还停在下面呢……”陈医生自觉奇怪，但一时心软，掏出钱包递了120元给对方。
但陈医生也留了个心眼，让楼下保安注意该女子车牌，谁料女子在马路对面上了一辆越野车后绝尘而去。他将此事与同事分享时，发现有些医生早已经历如此“被借钱”经历，比如曾在光华医院坐诊的梁医生就被以同样方式骗过200余元。
2
他扮“乘务员”
掉包乘客行李
场景：客运大巴
桥段：以安保为名阻止乘客随身携带行李
结局：事主两台手提电脑和数码相机被掉包
南都讯 11月18日下午，从新加坡回国的左先生于广州市站乘坐往东莞的大巴，在东莞汽车东站下车时，发现自己的两台手提电脑和数码相机全被掉包，而掉包的原因是自己轻信了“乘务员”。
“这些天在开亚残运会，你们的行李必须放在行李架上以保证安全”，据左先生称，他在广州市站一上车，便有一位身穿西服的中年男子以乘务员的口吻阻止他将手提电脑包随身携带，而且还信誓旦旦地面对车上所有乘客如此出言。
当一个半小时后下车，发现自己放置在行李架上的电脑包里只剩几块厚纸皮时，左先生才恍然大悟为什么当所谓“乘务员”强制将行李上架时，旁边那位先生不停地向自己打眼色。随后，左先生向当地派出所报案。
据南都记者从车站调度管理方获悉，类似骗局近来屡见不鲜，尤其是以亚运安保为由对随身行李进行掉包，涉事粤S牌新岗客车的司机告诉南都记者：“为此我们车上一直有张贴提醒贵重物品随身携带，乘客需要留个心眼。”
3
他俩“借”厕所
进了工厂狂偷
场景：工厂
桥段：有人负责厂外放风，有人负责翻墙或以其他名目进厂行窃
结局：2名嫌疑人被刑事拘留
南都讯 寮步镇横坑村一手袋厂的保安直到昨天还在后悔，自己的仁慈之心险些被人利用。
12月14日下午2点左右，这名保安独自一人在工厂大门口值班。这时，两名穿着普通的年轻人说要借个厕所。保安开始没有答应，毕竟工厂有严格规定，不能随便放陌生人进厂。
“当时他们的表情很痛苦，说是找工作，走了好多路，又找不到厕所，实在是快憋不住了”，两名年轻人求了四五分钟，看在都是外出打工不容易的份上，且周围确实没有卫生间，保安动了恻隐之心，于是将两名年轻人放了进来，还给两人指了指路，嘱咐他们进厂后别乱跑。
保安要值班并没有再留意年轻人的去向，这时刚好一名张姓工人上班过程中临时有事要回宿舍，打开房门时发现有个人影从宿舍阳台迅速闪过。等张姓工人跑到阳台上时，小偷已经翻过工厂围墙。张姓工人与工友立即开车去追，将两名小偷截住。
等工人将两小偷带进工厂时，保安这才恍然大悟，他放进来的是两名小偷。张姓工人再次回到宿舍才发现，他的抽屉已经被撬开，抽屉里的手机和几千元现金已进了小偷的裤兜。
目前，2名犯罪嫌疑人已被刑事拘留。警方分析，这些小偷作案时间多为白天，且团伙分工明确，有人负责在厂外放风，有人负责翻墙进入工厂，专挑员工宿舍下手，偷盗手机、电脑、现金等财物，因此提醒工友贵重物品不要放在宿舍。
4
他们“借”电话
非要人家手机
场景：大街小巷
桥段：以问路或借打电话为名骗取手机或钱物
结局：事主警觉行骗未遂
南都讯 每到年底，东莞街头偷抢蒙骗的现象就会多起来。日前，李先生在长安锦厦街头，差点被几位年轻男女骗走手机，而意图行骗者还开着一辆价值20多万元的高档轿车。
李先生告诉南都记者，那天上午10点多，他独自一人在长安锦厦锦江花园外的大街上边打电话边行走。突然，一辆很新的黑色锐志从后面开来停在他身边，正副驾驶有两年轻男子，后排坐着一个年轻漂亮的姑娘，她打开车窗礼貌地问他锦厦××律师行怎么走，李先生说他也不知道。
“姑娘说他们是从南城过来，找这个律师行办事。他们手机没电了，想借我手机给律师行打个电话。我就帮她拨了号码但手机没给她，接电话的是个女的，说她现在不在律师行，希望能和那个姑娘通话。”有些警觉的李先生说有事可以转达，没把价值几千元的手机给车里的姑娘。
见帮不上忙，李先生挂了电话就离开。没走几十米远，那辆车又跟了上来，姑娘出示她的手机并表示自己只想尽快联系上律师行。此时，车内男子也拿出中华烟请李先生抽。李先生这次索性从包里拿出另一部很不值钱的破手机，给车内的姑娘打电话。
“她在通话中，又要求我用刚才那部手机帮她再拨另一个号码看有没有人接。我拿出纸和笔要记号码，但她坚持要我用手机拨打。”李先生说，他这时意识到这几个年轻人的目的不是问路，而是想骗走他那部价格不菲的手机，就明确拒绝了。
南都记者从长安警方了解到，近期他们还没接到类似骗局的报案，但提醒广大市民，临近年底，外出遇到可疑人物和可疑事时要多个心眼，免得上当受骗造成不必要损失。

description.hltext_display: El aeropuerto de Bruselas vuelve a la normalidad tras reponer anticongelante
description.content:
Bruselas, 22 dic (EFE).- El aeropuerto de Bruselas puede volver a operar con normalidad esta mañana tras reponer sus reservas de líquido anticongelante, aunque persisten algunos retrasos y anulaciones en vuelos hacia al centro y norte de Europa por las condiciones meteorológicas en estos destinos.
El aeropuerto de la capital belga anunció ayer que volvía "a las operaciones normales de invierno", después de que la escasez de anticongelante, utilizado para evitar que los alerones y la cola de los aviones queden bloqueados por la presencia de hielo, obligara a cancelar la mayoría de las salidas desde el lunes por la tarde.
La compañía gestora asegura que ya existen reservas suficientes para cubrir la demanda de todas las aerolíneas que operan vuelos desde la capital belga.
No obstante, recomienda a los viajeros que comprueben los detalles de su vuelo en la página web (www.brusselsairport.be), ya que se producen retrasos y cancelaciones de vuelos hacia ciudades como Amsterdam, Zurich, Fráncfort, Dublín, Viena o Copenhague, a causa de las condiciones meteorológicas en dichos destinos.
La misma situación se da en el aeropuerto de Amsterdam-Schipol, que avisa en su web de las posibles alteraciones del tráfico aéreo a causa de la nieve, aunque la mayoría de los vuelos operan con normalidad.
También operan con normalidad el aeropuerto de Charleroi, ubicado a 55 kilómetros al sur de Bruselas y desde el que vuelan compañías de bajo coste como Ryanair o Jetairfly.
Las previsiones meteorológicos anuncian bajas temperaturas para el resto de la semana y nevadas en gran parte de Bélgica. EFE

description.hltext_display: Lay up from the Danger Zone
description.content:
My advice is to take the mystery out of golf by keeping clear of that danger zone in front of the green. While I appreciate we nearly all want to tell our mates how we had the chance to reach certain par-5 holes in two shots or almost drove a dogleg par-4, common sense should be our secret weapon.
Despite their genuine experience and dedication to the game, I'm amazed by some golfers' naivity when it comes to course management. Many can strike the ball well off the tee, off the fairway and out of the rough; can play bunker shots with finesse; even shape shots around trees and mounds.
But when it comes to playing a chip 20-40 yards short of the green, they're terrified they're going to flub it or thin the ball through the back of the green or into a hazard. This was the tale of woe I heard the other day from an experienced ten-handicapper, who admitted he'd been playing for 20 years without really grasping the art of course management.
I told him that he shouldn't really be complaining about leaving himself with awkward chips and pitches in front of the green - he shouldn't be there in the first place! Why take the risk of trying to rip a driver to a short par-4 on to or just short of the green, when he could take a more accurate long iron or fairway metal and leave himself a full shot into the green?
Nearly all mid to low handicap golfers can clip a wedge or sand iron on to a green from 90 yards with some degree of consistency. Why leave yourself with a tricky shot when you could ‘lay up' to leave the shot you're comfortable with?
This is what you should do on the course you play the most. Re-think your strategy on some holes and instead of always reaching for that driver off the tee, hit an iron or fairway metal off the tee into position. Leave a full shot you know you can play well and to a specific distance.

description.hltext_display: Kerstfeest met de familie. Kijk je er naar uit?
description.content:
24 december en 25 december: voor veel families is het de ideale gelegenheid om nog eens met zijn allen gezellig rond de tafel te kruipen, en bij te praten. Nu ja, gezellig. Niet iedereen vindt die eindejaarsfeesten met de familie even leuk. Omdat er op dat moment vaak vetes met familieleden boven komen drijven. Omdat er onderhuidse spanningen opduiken. Omdat je in geforceerde familiesituaties terechtkomt.
Psychiater Dirk De Wachter reageert. En ook jouw mening is welkom:
Hoe denk jij over de kwestie? Kijk je nu al uit naar het kerstfeest met je familie? Of wou je dat de eindejaarsperiode nu al achter de rug was? Laat het ons weten!
Reageer je liever anoniem? Mail dan naar peetersenpichal@radio1.be

description.hltext_display: Québec City
description.content:
Few municipalities are as breathtaking on approach as . Situated along the majestic St. Lawrence River, much of the oldest part of the city -- Vieux-Québec -- sits atop Cap Diamant, a rock bluff that once provided military defense. Fortress walls still encase the upper portion of the old city, and the soaring Château Frontenac, a hotel with castle-like turrets, dominates the landscape. Hauntingly evocative of a coastal town in the motherland of France, the tableau is as romantic as any in Europe.
Québec City is the soul of New France and holds that history dear. It was the first significant settlement in Canada, founded in 1608, 400 years ago, by Samuel de Champlain. Much of 2007 was spent sprucing up the city for its 400th-anniversary celebrations in 2008, adding more access to the waterfront and an entirely new pavilion called Espace 400e that opened in spring 2008 to be the central location for celebrations throughout the year. After 2008, it will become a Parks Canada discovery center.
The city is almost entirely French in feeling, spirit, and language, and 95% of the population is Francophone, or French-speaking. But many people do know some English, especially those who work in hotels, restaurants, and shops, and thousands of resident college students study English as a second language. Although it is often more difficult in Québec City than in Montréal to get by without French, the average Québécois goes out of his or her way to communicate -- in halting English, sign language, simplified French, or a combination of all three. Most of the Québécois are uncommonly gracious, even with the city being the capital of the politically prickly Québec province.
Because of its beauty, history, and unique stature as the only walled city north of Mexico, the historic district of Québec City was named a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1985 -- the only area so designated in North America.
Ile d'Orléans, an agricultural and resort island within sight of Vieux-Québec, is less than a half-hour from downtown and an easy day- or overnight-trip. Consider, too, a trip along the northern coast of the St. Lawrence past the shrine of Ste-Anne-de-Beaupré, the waterfalls near Mont Ste-Anne, and on to pastoral Charlevoix and the Saguenay River, where whales come to play.

description.hltext_display: Category: Finance and bankingSubject: State-owned banks told to equitise fasterRead: 4619Published: 11/03/2006 10:11')"> State-owned banks told to equitise faster
description.content:
(VNS) — Two giant State-owned commercial banks have been urged to accelerate their equitisation process in order to raise their competitive edges as the country prepares to join the World Trade Organisation.
HA NOI (27 Oct 2006) — Two giant State-owned commercial banks have been urged to accelerate their equitisation process in order to raise their competitive edges as the country prepares to join the World Trade Organisation.
The two banks, the Bank for Foreign Trade of Viet Nam (Vietcombank) and the Mekong Housing Development Bank (MHB), are the first State-owned commercial banks to be put into pilot equitisation, while three other SOCBs banks are expected to be equitised within the next few years.
Recently, Deputy Prime Minister Nguyen Sinh Hung has urged the State Bank of Viet Nam (SBV) to report the equitisation progress of both Vietcombank and MHB, along with analysing and assessing the recent Vietcombank’s bond issuance by the end of this month.
He also asked the SBV to carry out equisation soon for three other banks, namely the Bank for Investment and Development of Viet Nam (BIDV), the Industrial and Commercial Bank of Viet Nam (Incombank) and the Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development of Viet Nam (Agribank).
According to the plan, the equitisation of the three banks will be implemented in two steps; enhancing those banks’ financial capacities following international standards, and then equitising them within the next two years.
Meanwhile, Deputy Head of the Economic and Budgetary Committee under the National Assembly, Duong Thu Huong, said that speeding up the equitisation process to allow domestic banks to integrate successfully into the global economy would help raise banks’ financial capabilities.
As Vietcombank and MHB are the first State-owned commercial banks which have been chosen to be equitised under the Governmental decision, the two banks can issue shares to raise their chartered capital. Last year, Vietcombank issued VND1.4 trillion (US$87.5 million) shares as the first step for the bank to equitise.
Deputy General Director of the Vietcombank, Dinh Van Muoi, advised that his bank was selecting consultants and he would finalise his decision by December of this year.
In an effort to speed up Vietcombank’s equitisation process, his bank, along with the Debt and Assets Trading Company, signed a deal to resolve overdue debts at the beginning of this month.
Up to the end of last year, Vietcombank handled nearly VND5 trillion (US$312.5 million) in overdue debts. As a result, the proportion of bad debts decreased from 30.8 per cent in 2000 to 2.7 per cent last year.
Meanwhile, General Director of the BIDV, Tran Bac Ha also revealed that his bank’s equitisation is one of the most essential tasks under the bank’s development strategy during the 2006-2010 period, in order to enhance its financial capabilities and corporate governance while improving the bank’s competitive edge in preparation for integration.
He also confirmed that the equitisation plan will be submitted to the Government for approval by the first quarter of next year, while valuation of the BIDV is expected to be carried out by the third quarter of 2007.
The bank will make its initial public offerings (IPO) by the end of 2007, he said. BIDV will list its shares on domestic securities and the Singapore stock market soon after the IPO, he added.
The bank has requested for assistance to handle its non-performing loans in reaching the bank’s capital adequacy ratio (CAR) of 8 to 10 per cent in order to reflect international standards by the end of this year.
"We also asked the Government and the SBV to allow us to hire foreign consultants to consult in our equitisation process, including consulting on building an equitisation plan, valuation and selecting strategic partners, as well as with IPO," he added. — VNS

description.hltext_display: 现实版"卖拐"闹剧上演:男子连遭同一人手机诈骗
description.content:
大家一定记得小品《卖拐》，没想到现实生活中也有真实版“卖拐”。12月17日，受害人张先生竟然遇到了半年前用假手机诈骗过他的犯罪嫌疑人，这名犯罪嫌疑人竟然还准备使用同样手段再次诈骗张先生。
12月17日上午，从包头到呼和浩特出差的张先生一下火车就遇到一名推销手机的男子。张先生抬头一看发现这名男子就是今年6月份曾用假手机诈骗了他400元钱的那个人。张先生假意答应要买手机，随后他告诉骗子他要到通达商城一朋友处取钱，当两人走到新城区公安分局锡林路派出所门前时，张先生突然拽住骗子大声呼叫，这时，从派出所里冲出几名民警，当场将骗子马某抓获。
张先生说：“给我看的时候手机是真的，当我付钱后拿到的却是手机模型，因为这个骗子长得很有特点，当时我就记住了他的样子，没想到今天又遇上了。” 审讯中，马某对诈骗一事供认不讳。目前，犯罪嫌疑人马某已经因涉嫌诈骗被刑事拘留。

description.hltext_display: Email Security With Online Email Setup And Support Posted By: Herry Willson
description.content:
a major and significant factor responsible for elevating business activities to new altitude. Though it is an alternative way of communication, but due to its indifferent features it form backbone of various organizations.
Email security is another important aspect emerging rapidly with elevated importance and usage of emails in the market. The sections of security implications commonly include email storage, policy, auditing, and proper email management. Each and every issue related to email security can be conveniently resolved with installation of an efficient email support client program.
Microsoft Outlook and Outlook Express is the most valuable email client programs delighting businesspeople. These email applications comes along with the Internet Explorer web browser and are offered by Microsoft at zero cost. Microsoft Outlook and Outlook Express have numerous features which are extremely helpful for office people.
The personal preferences of users can be taken into account to customize the emails they send or receive and customization can be easily carried through option of email setup rules provided with these email client programs.
Various malicious virus and Spyware existing in the cyberspace must be considered, and email security must be followed by the PC user with a practical as well as holistic approach.
Email errors are very usual and occur within email account or with the configuration of email client, and be aware that management and fixation of email errors is not creamy deed. But make sure that you are managing your emails in the best possible way and if not; you must think about an effective email management offered by online service providers for email support and email setup.
Online technicians also suggest you the best email setup for your email account, where three ways are generally available for accessing email with most website hosting accounts. The list comprises POP, IMAP or Webmail. Choose the best one depending on your requirements.
POP: POP stands for Post Office Protocol and just like name it works as a post office, where sent mail is received by the post office (server) and your mail program (Outlook, Eudora, etc) goes to the post office and pick it up. And thus mail is transferred on your computer and is no longer available on the server, which is pretty similar like receiving a letter. If you are using Post Office Protocol mail keep running regular backups of your mail program.
IMAP will do better if you need to access your email regularly from multiple computers.
Webmail: Choice of different programs clients used to access their email through their web browser.
Online technical support providers are the most suitable option, which are offering an entire range of email support services for best email management along with fixing email problems.
The email setup and support package covers entire services from installation of any email client, configuration, to its tune up.
Optimal security to your business from damaging or unauthorized virus attacks can be provided, if you buy email support services for added advantage to your systems. Email protection is provided by online technical support vendors to immediately troubleshoot any email error, spam filter and virus scanner.

description.hltext_display: Man and boy killed in house blaze
description.content:
A man and a young boy have died after a house fire caused by a chip pan left unattended on a cooker, emergency services said.
West Midlands Ambulance Service said both victims were confirmed dead shortly after their arrival at hospital following the blaze in the Lower Stoke area of Coventry.
An ambulance service spokesman said three ambulances and a paramedic officer were sent to the property in Hollis Road after several 999 calls.

description.hltext_display: 酝酿一年半 他把妻子的情人引向死路
description.content:
明知妻子与他人有不正当关系，但是为了家丑不外扬，他忍气吞声，视若不见。在经过一系列的周密安排后，他以工作之名把妻子的情人引到一处楼顶，将其杀死后，还浇上汽油焚尸。
楼顶惊现无名焦尸
12月15日，住在北京西路某住宅小区的李普很忙，因为他家的太阳能设备坏了，必须请人帮忙修理。当日下午3时许，李普的哥哥和一名修理工来到楼顶上，却看到了让人毛骨悚然的一幕：地上有一具烧焦的尸体。李普的哥哥随后报警，拉萨市公安局刑警支队的民警迅速赶到现场。
经现场勘查，民警得出无名焦尸为男性，是被人用钝器击打头部，导致其死亡，后被焚尸。现场没有任何证明死者身份的物品，死者是何人成了破获此案的关键所在。
嫌疑人浮出水面
为了尽快破案，民警随后把尸体照片进行大量冲洗，并在发现尸体的小区附近进行挨家挨户的走访。很快，一条具有重要意义的线索反馈了回来。12月3日，有位报案人李祥称其舅舅何军已失踪十几天，至今杳无音讯，手机也一直处于关机状态。
从无名尸体的死亡时间来推算，何军的失踪在时间上与无名尸体基本吻合。民警于是找到报案人李祥，通过他对何军的描述，发现何军的情况与死者基本相似。另外，为了进一步确认死者的情况，民警让李祥对死者面部照片进行辨认，最终确定，无名男尸就是已失踪多日的何军。
据悉，何军42岁，是拉萨市某建筑工地上的一名普通建筑工人，社会关系简单，无财无权。在发现何军尸体大楼的监控录像中，民警发现一个让人为之振奋的线索，那就是何军在12月8日早上10时左右，与另一名男子进入过该楼，十几分钟后，该男子一人从楼中走出，并在路边的摩托车上取出一个白色塑料壶后又返回楼里。这名男子是谁，与何军是什么关系？
经过李祥辨认，确定与何军一起出现在大楼外的人，是他的同事雷明秀。另外，李祥还对民警反映了一条重要线索。雷明秀的妻子和何军存在不正当的男女关系。综合所有线索，民警分析何军的死，雷明秀有重大作案嫌疑。
酝酿一年半后杀人焚尸
2009年8月16日，这天对于雷明秀来说，是耻辱的一天。因为他发现妻子与别的男人有了不正当关系，而背叛他的还有很要好的朋友何军。
从知道妻子与何军的事后，雷明秀装作毫不知情，而且与何军还维持着朋友关系。然而天天面对何军，雷明秀的心慢慢变得黑暗，并产生了杀死何军的念头。时间在雷明秀的恨意中过了一年半，一切已计划周详，雷明秀决定行动。
2010年12月8日，雷明秀对何军说在北京西路有活干，要何军帮忙。9日一早，雷明秀骑着摩托车来到加油站，买了20元钱的汽油，用塑料壶装好，随后来到与何军约好的楼顶。雷明秀对何军表示，该楼顶有漏水的现象，让何军画线测量尺寸。
乘何军在画线时，雷明秀从何军的工具箱里取出榔头，直接朝何军头上砸去，何军当即被砸倒在地，雷明秀见何军还有呼吸，又朝何军的头部砸了几下，直至何军不动为止。何军死了，雷明秀来到楼下把汽油和一双套好塑料袋的皮鞋拿回楼顶，从何军身上搜出手机和能够证明身份的物品，放在何军的胸口上，浇上汽油将何军的尸体焚烧。
怕留下脚印，雷明秀把自己脚上的皮鞋脱下，也扔进了火里烧，并穿上事先准备的套有塑料袋的皮鞋，骑着摩托车离开了现场。自认为做得天衣无缝的雷明秀，回到家里开心过日子。12月18日，他终究还是没能逃脱法网，被拉萨市公安局刑警支队的民警抓获。目前，雷明秀已被依法刑事拘留。

description.hltext_display: Ook ervaringen met specialisten en zwart geld?
description.content:
Een luisteraar die liever anoniem blijft, heeft enkele bedenkingen bij het zwart geld dat chirurgen en specialisten - regelmatig? - vragen aan hun patiënten. Zo moesten haar kinderen een kleine heelkundige ingreep ondergaan in een Vlaams ziekenhuis (geen privékliniek). Maar een week voor de ingreep, kreeg ze een telefoontje van de arts, om te zeggen dat er 600 euro per patiënt in het zwart zou aangerekend worden. Dit bedrag moest vóór de operatie betaald worden.
Een bevriend chirurg vertelde haar dat dit een gangbare methode is.
'Wat gebeurt er bij mensen die het financiëel moeilijk hebben?' vraagt onze luisteraar zich af. 'Kan dit zomaar?'
Ook Peeters en Pichal zitten met vragen: Heb jij dit ook al meegemaakt? Om welke ingreep ging het? Hoeveel zwart geld werd er gevraagd? Wanneer moest je deze som betalen? Op welke manier werd jou dit meegedeeld door de arts? Kortom: Wat zijn jouw ervaringen op dit vlak? Reageer je liever anoniem? Mail dan naar peetersenpichal@radio1.be

description.hltext_display: Fulham chasing Aston Villa midfielder
description.content: Ireland played under Hughes at Manchester City and will be allowed to leave Villa in January. Hughes believes Ireland can help Fulham in their battle to avoid relegation this season, according to The Mirror. Hughes is desperate to strengthen his squad in January.

description.hltext_display: Nuevas nevadas desde esta tarde cuando el transporte vuelve a la normalidad
description.content:
París, 22 dic (EFE).- Los servicios meteorológicos franceses anunciaban hoy un nuevo temporal de nieve que desde esta tarde barrerá el norte del país de oeste a este, con riesgo de nuevos problemas en los aeropuertos, las carreteras y los trenes que apenas están volviendo a la normalidad tras el último episodio del lunes.
Météo France indicó que las nevadas, que empezarán en Bretaña y llegarán a la región de París al cabo de la tarde, antes de continuar en Champagne, Borgoña y Lorena, podrían dejar espesores de entre cinco y diez centímetros en las zonas llanas en la capital.
Se trata de espesores del mismo orden que los que causaron un tercio de anulaciones de vuelos el lunes en los aeropuertos Charles de Gaulle y Orly, y condujeron a las autoridades a prohibir la circulación de los camiones en la región de París y en varios otros departamentos.
Esta mañana Météo France tenía una veintena de departamentos del norte de Francia en alerta naranja por las nevadas.
Los servicios meteorológicos advirtieron, además, de que el viernes nevará de forma todavía más intensa en particular en el noroeste de Francia, en Auvernia y en la región Ródano-Alpes (con capital en Lyon).
La situación en los aeropuertos de la capital francesa se fueron normalizando ayer, cuando pudieron salir la mayor parte de los viajeros bloqueados -algunos desde el fin de semana-, a excepción de varios cientos que esperaban aviones de otros países, sobre todo el Reino Unido y Alemania, donde la situación era mucho peor.
En los ferrocarriles franceses también iban mejorando las cosas salvo en el Eurostar que conecta París con Londres, donde ayer se tuvieron que suspender un 20% de los trenes habituales, precisamente cuando miles de personas que no podían salir o llegar por avión al Reino Unido habían recurrido a este medio de transporte.
El consorcio que explota el Eurostar anunció que no quedan más billetes hasta después de Navidad y aconsejaba que pospusieran el viaje todos aquellos para los que no fuera imprescindible desplazarse. EFE

description.hltext_display: Time Management Tips for Working at Home
description.author: KC Morgan
description.content:
Time management is an essential skill for any professional, but its doubly important for those who . The home is filled with distractions, daily chores and lots of other pressures that make time stretch pretty thin. Isnt there always laundry to do, dishes to put away, a snack to eatsomething interesting on TV? Its easy to get distracted, to become swamped with work, to become a little bored when assignments and opportunities start to feel the same. Work at home more efficiently by using . Boredom is a big problem in the average day. Even when the work is interesting and engaging, those who work alone may find their minds wandering and have difficulty focusing on the task at hand. Repeating similar assignments on a regular basis, even when they provide income and other rewards, starts to get a little stale. Beat boredom to work more efficiently, and get tasks completed more quickly.
Instead of working on a single project at a time, from beginning to end, why not work in a less linear fashion? Start half of one project, then turn to another. Flip things again, going back to the original project and completing it before moving back to the second. By doing a little at a time and then changing tasks, self employed professionals can add a little excitement (and important changes) to their at home work day.
Ringing phones, playing children, friendly neighbors and lovable household pets can, at any moment, become the enemy of the self employed, professional. Every moment is another opportunity for one of these things - and many others - to break concentration. Outside influences arent the only distraction for the at-home worker. Its easy to get lost in thinking about at task one moment, and discover that youve been watching daytime TV for over an hour the next. can be a huge time-saved for the professional. First, establish a set office space. Explain to family members that when the office is occupied, youre off-limits. Before beginning a concentration-heavy task, do a quick run-through of the house to check on the needs of pets, young children and any appliances that have been left running (the dishwasher or laundry machine, for example). And if the phone just wont quit, turn off the ringer and left voice mail or the machine handle the rest. Prepare in advance for distractions, and help defeat them before they can become a problem.

description.hltext_display: Wait for new supermarket goes on
description.content:
Campaigners for a Tesco in Marlborough are still waiting for a store, despite Wiltshire getting nine new 'big four' supermarkets in two years.
Research by the BBC found permission was granted for at least 44 Morrisons, Asda, Sainsbury's and Tesco stores in the West in the two years to November.
But legal action by Sainsbury's, which also wants to open in Marlborough, means no new store has opened there.
Campaigners say they just want a cheaper alternative to Waitrose.
The UK-wide research aimed to discover the number of new 'big four' supermarkets given approval between 1 November 2008 and 1 November 2010.
It found that at least 577 stores - 392 of them Tesco - were approved across the UK during that period.
Lisa Farrell, who has campaigned for a Tesco in Marlborough for almost two years, said it was a shame none of them had opened in her town. "It's just a two-tier town, you've got the rich that can shop in the town centre and all of us low-income families who can't afford to and have to travel to Swindon or Devizes," Miss Farrell said. Plans for a Tesco in Marlborough were approved by Wiltshire Council in March, but Sainsbury's has since called for a judicial review into the decision, saying their application should have been considered at the same time.
The battle between the two supermarkets has meant no new store has been able to open and the council said it did not expect a resolution to the matter until March 2011.
Miss Farrell, a 48-year-old hospitality manager, said: "They're forgetting us. We just want somewhere we can go and shop. At the moment we still have to travel or shop online. "Places down the road have six or seven supermarkets, so I can understand if they get upset about another one, but Marlborough is full of tourists so shops charge what they like." Tesco has begun building the store on Marlborough Business Park, in anticipation of a favourable result in the judicial review. A Sainsbury's spokesman said: "We have been given leave to appeal this decision in the High Court. Given that this decision is currently in the legal process it is not appropriate for us to comment further on this at this time".

event_or_fact.property: It's just a two-tier town, you've got the rich that can shop in the town centre and all of us low-income families who can't afford to and have to travel to Swindon or Devizes
it was a shame none of them had opened in her town

description.hltext_display: 99.7%受访者称年末突击成普遍现象
description.content:
今年10月25日，国务院召开常务会议部署今年后几个月经济工作。其中，会议强调继续做好财政金融工作，从严控制一般性支出，防止年底突击花钱。漫画：朱慧卿
年关将至，“突击”现象屡见不鲜：有学生为了考试能过关突击复习，有官员突击应付检查，有建筑单位挑灯夜战突击赶工……
近日，中国青年报社会调查中心通过民意中国网，对2535人进行的一项调查显示，95.6%的人承认自己有过突击经历，有四成人(39.9%)表示“经常突击”。99.7%的人确认，“突击”是当今社会的普遍现象，其中42.3%的人表示“非常普遍”。
哪些群体突击现象严重？67.4%的人首选“学生”
“我经常突击复习，为的就是考试能过关。这样一来，复习的大部分内容考完后没多久就忘光了。”重庆市网友“心若止水”虽然总是告诫自己，平时要认真学习才能取得好成绩，但他发现，突击已经成为自己的习惯了。他曾用一周时间备考公务员，15天备考导游证，一个月备考英语四、六级。而最终的结果是都考过了。
今年，“心若止水”像往常一样，通过突击复习参加了司法考试，不过这次的考试他没过，“现在很多学生都突击复习考试，因为即使平时积累得再多，考试中也体现不出来，有时还不如突击一下呢。而最终能不能过，全凭自己的突击能力和运气了。”
哪些群体的突击现象最严重？本次调查中，67.4%的人首选“学生”，59.9%的人选择“官员”，44.3%的人选择“建筑商”。同时，还有55.8%的人认为“各行各业都很严重”。
“现在很多学生为应付考试总是突击复习。”复旦大学社会学系教授于海认为，造成这一现象的原因，是不少教师的教学方式和课程设计存在问题，值得反思。另外，这也是学生们“重结果、轻过程”，只图最后过关心理驱使的结果。于海担心，“学生们这种突击应试心理，很可能会带到将来的工作中。”
“现在最严重的‘突击’现象，是一些地方政府临时下任务的必然结果。很多人不得不全力突击去做，把原本正常的工作节奏和秩序都打乱了。”于海举例说，一些学校曾为了政府看重的某个活动停课两周，突击完成任务后，学校再安排教师和学生补课。“为什么政府的活动就比学校的正常教学秩序更重要呢？”
“另外一种普遍的‘突击’现象，是部分地方政府或企业好大喜功造成的。为了提前完工，他们往往要求员工在节庆前做完工作，使得员工经常夜里加班。”于海曾在加拿大生活过一年，他发现，当地的工程，都会合理规划时间，比如一项工程的工期确定为3年，工人就不会突击干活儿，非要争着一两年完成任务，也不会因为工程耽误休假。
于海说，还有一种令人匪夷所思的突击现象，就是一些政府部门和单位，年底时“突击花钱”。“因为‘年关’在财政上是一个节点，很多单位要衡量当年的开支水平，并决定来年的预算规模。没有多少机构愿意勤俭持家，因为这会影响来年的拨款水平。所以，与其让多余的钱烂在财政大库里，还不如把钱化为机构福利，让大家都得到实惠。这还能体现单位年初的预算是合理的，不是诳人。”
突击现象普遍是因为“重结果、轻过程的心理作祟”？
中南财经政法大学廉政研究院院长乔新生教授表示，当今社会突击现象普遍的原因有很多，其中“赶超时期”心理是最普遍的一个原因。社会各界普遍存在焦虑，追求短期利益，讲求“先捞一把再说”，很少去考虑长远利益。
乔新生认为，部分地方政府的资源配置缺乏效率，总是“一任官员一任规划”。一些官员有“过关心理”――只要在自己任内有政绩，不会去管当地的后续发展。最终的结果就是城市变成了工地。
另外，“长官意志”在社会上仍然普遍存在。比如，本来需要半年时间才能完工的项目，部分政府官员把手一挥，于是施工单位为了效率不得不缩短施工工期。
乔新生还认为，我们的一些评价体系也不太科学。比如，高校老师的研究成果要一年一报，可是有含金量的学术成果不可能短时间内突击出来。如此评价，只能导致平庸的学术论文和注水研究成果比比皆是。
突击现象普遍的原因是什么？调查中，76.5%的人首选“重结果、轻过程的心理作祟”，其次是“缺乏长期、长效的考评制度”(73.3%)，还有69.8%的人认为是“整个社会急功近利”，48.8%的人选择“临时规定、检查太多”，40.8%的人认为是“对问题重视不够”。
突击后果：萝卜快了不洗泥
北京市某公司室内设计师郭饴，经常深夜加班赶设计。“很少有客户给设计师充足的时间思考。尤其马上过年了，很多工程必须在年前完工。所以，一些要一个月才能做出来的图纸，我们必须两周内完成。时间这么短，整天想的就是马上要交活儿。我们只能根据经验做简单却不容易出错的设计。”
“设计师总会有思路卡壳的时候。如果工程的设计环节延误时间，下面环节的人只能更疯狂地加班。”于是，郭饴为了不给下面的人添麻烦，总会抓紧时间赶工。
“但设计时间太少，图纸难免会出现问题，这样后期工作总是不太顺利，工程质量也不会高。很多客户不太关注工程的质量问题，施工队为了赶工，出现一些明显错误也就将错就错了。”
突击现象层出不穷会造成哪些后果？调查中，83.0%的人首选“形式主义盛行”，其次是“解决问题不彻底”(74.8%)，“质量安全隐患”(68.1%)排第三，另有50.6%的人认为这“会自降标准和目标”。
“我们经常把效率，尤其是政府认定的效率标准，看作第一位。这扭曲了很多人的价值观念。”于海说，由于部分地方政府注重时效，往往会改变社会节奏和社会秩序，其他单位只能搞突击完成其任务。最糟糕的是，公众会觉得社会秩序必须为政府让路，对什么都不再有尊重之心。“比如，学校为了政府的临时任务停课，破坏的就是公众对教育的尊重，学生也会觉得教育没有政府的活动重要。”
不过，于海并不是反对所有的突击，比如SARS、地震等情况，就需要紧急动员。除此之外，政府不应随便破坏其他单位的正常秩序，这样才更能获得支持和紧急动员时的响应。
突击的后果往往是“萝卜快了不洗泥”。乔新生告诉记者，从1989年~1999年，我国几乎平均18天制定一部法律，“一部分法律在当时看来会对改革有促进，但现在却成了深化改革的拦路虎。我们走了很多弯路。”
乔新生表示，要解决改变突击型社会这个符号，就必须真正尊重每个公民的权利，必须约束政府权力，还要将公平正义放在更重要的位置，让老百姓休养生息才行。

description.hltext_display: Tiger Woods has cortisone shot in ankle | Golf
description.content:
Golf
Woods had a shot in right ankle: Tiger Woods had a cortisone shot in his right ankle 1 ½ weeks ago to relieve lingering soreness. By Tuesday, he was back to work hitting discount golf clubs and filming a commercial for EA Sports.
Mark Steinberg, his agent at IMG, said Woods had intended all along to have the shot after the Chevron World Challenge, which ended Dec. 5. Woods' next tournament is the Farmers Insurance Open, which starts Jan. 27 at Torrey Pines in San Diego.
"This was always the Callaway X-24 Hot Irons ," Steinberg said. "He's looking at 2011 as a big year for him."
At this year's Masters, Woods revealed he ruptured the Achilles tendon in his right leg in December 2008 while recovering from knee surgery. Steinberg says it still causes soreness, prompting the cortisone shot.
Steinberg spoke in response to Internet chatter Woods had torn his Achilles while skiing. He said Woods has not been on skis in more than three years.(Callaway Diablo Forged Irons )
RAZR X irons feature a lower, deeper center of gravity and a consistently hot face for distance and accuracy. In head-to-head tests, the new RAZR X Irons are 56% more accurate than a competitor's iron that chases distance at the cost of accuracy. Tighter Shots, Shorter Putts, Lower Scores.
RAZR X irons Technology shifts the center of gravity 12% lower and 15% deeper by redistributing 30 grams of weight in the back cavity; providing the power and forgiveness of a wide-sole iron with the precision and playability of a thin-sole iron.
Recommanded discount golf clubs by Enjoymygolf.com

description.hltext_display: بنيتيز على حافة الهاوية في إنتر ميلان
description.content:
تعليقات: 0 شارك بتعليقك
روما - الألمانية
ترددت بقوة في وسائل الإعلام الإيطالية صباح اليوم الأربعاء أنباء حول إقالة الأسباني رافاييل بنيتيز من منصب المدير الفني لفريق إنتر ميلان حامل لقب الدوري الإيطالي لكرة القدم ، بعد ستة أشهر فقط من توليه المنصب.
كان بنيتيز، المدرب السابق لفريق ليفربول ، تولى منصب المدير الفني لإنتر ميلان الصيف الماضي ولكنه لم ينل الإعجاب خلال فترة وجوده مع حامل لقب دوري أبطال أوروبا ومونديال الأندية.
تعثر إنتر ميلان في الدوري المحلي تحت قيادة بنيتيز 50 عاما حيث يحتل المركز السابع بفارق 13 نقطة خلف ميلان المتصدر ، وتتبقى له مباراتين مؤجلتين.
يعتقد أن بنيتيز يمر بفترة انتقالية عقب فوزه بلقب كأس العالم للأندية في أبو ظبي ، ومطالبته لماسيمو موراتي رئيس النادي بمساندته أو إقالته من منصبه.
تردد أن موراتي رفض مساندة المدرب في تصريحاته الجريئة، ويبدو أن صبره بدأ ينفذ.

description.hltext_display: Warum das Systemhaus Insolvenz anmelden musste: Die kriminellen Machenschaften bei der BSH
description.content:
Die kriminellen Machenschaften bei der BSH
Ralf Ebken und Ubbo Oltmanns, Geschäftsführer der BSH Systemhaus GmbH
Ende der vergangenen Woche musste die BSH Systemhaus GmbH den Gang zum Insolvenzrichter antreten. ChannelPartner hat mit beiden Geschäftsführern über die Gründe der Insolvenz des norddeutschen Unternehmens gesprochen.
Vor drei Wochen wurde nämlich bekannt, dass die Bilanzen der BSH Systemhaus GmbH manipuliert waren. Der verantwortliche Leiter des Rechnungswesens ist daraufhin fristlos entlassen worden. Ferner hat die BSH GmbH gegen diesen Ex-Mitarbeiter Strafanzeige erstattet.
Im Sommer 2010 hat nämlich Firmengründer Ralf Ebken eigenen Angaben zu Folge die Einführung einer neuen Warenwirtschaftslösung, MKS Goliath, beschlossen. Diese speziell an die Bedürfnisse von Systemhäusern zugeschnittene Software macht alle Vorgänge im Projektgeschäft transparent. Ebenfalls Mitte des Jahres hat Ubbo Boltmanns, der im April 2010 mit einer 25prozentigen Beteiligung als Geschäftsführer bei dem Unternehmen eingestiegen ist, einige Unregelmäßigkeiten in der Buchführung festgestellt.
Im November 2010 forderte Boltmanns eigenen Angaben zu Folge schließlich seinen Chefbuchhalter auf, ihm die "echten" Zahlen zu benenen. Daraus ergab sich nun für das Systemhaus sofort eine Kapitalunterdeckung. Davon erfuhren schließlich auch die mit der BSH Systemhaus GmbH zusammenarbeitenden Banken und haben daraufhin dem Unternehmen alle Kredite gekündigt. Der Gang zum Insolvenzrichter war unausweichlich.
Dennoch besteht für das norddeutsche Unternehmen berechtigte Hoffnung auf die Fortführung der Geschäfte. Hauptgesellschafter Ebken (75 Prozent Anteile) befindet sich derzeit in intensiven Gesprächen mit zwei großen deutschen Systemhäusern, es geht um die Übernahme der BSH Systemhaus GmbH noch in diesem Jahr. Es gilt, die 60 Arbeitsplätze bei dem Unternehmen an den Standorten Bremen und Westerstede zu erhalten.
Dennoch: Die beiden Geschäftsführer sind derzeit heillos zerstritten und schieben sich gegenseitig die Verantwortung für das Desaster zu. Ob sie beide nach einer eventuellen Akquisition noch zusammen arbeiten werden, bleibt fraglich. 2009 hat das Systemhaus noch mit 80 Mitarbeitern über 18 Millionen Euro umgesetzt, 2010 dürften es nach einer Bereinigung weit weniger werden. Über die weitere Entwicklung der der BSH Systemhaus GmbH hält Sie ChannelPartner auch über die Feiertage auf dem Laufenden. (rw)

description.hltext_display: Jouw goede voornemens voor 2011. Mogen wij je volgen?
description.content: De jaarovergang is traditioneel een periode waarin veel mensen goede voornemens maken. Stoppen met roken bijvoorbeeld, of gezonder gaan leven, een jaar lang geen alcohol drinken, elke week bij je grootmoeder op bezoek gaan, tien kilo afvallen... Begin jij op 1 januari ook vol goede moed met goede voornemens, en mogen wij jou op regelmatige basis volgen (via mail, telefoon, reportage) om te weten in welke mate je plannen aan het lukken zijn? Vul dan onderstaand formulier in!

description.hltext_display: 飞思卡尔i.MX处理器成平板电脑最大赢家
description.content:
关键字：飞思卡尔 平板电脑
在占据电子书阅读器市场份额的头把交椅后，飞思卡尔开始进军平板电脑市场，与各个平板电脑制造商合作，从著名的电子消费品品牌到队伍不断壮大的中国“白盒子”平板电脑制造商。十一款采用飞思卡尔处理器的平板电脑产品将在圣诞购物季面世——采用率超过任何其他半导体供应商。
虽然西方市场主要青睐少量的高端平板电脑产品，但是许多此类产品目前仍然处于生产阶段，飞思卡尔将视线瞄准了正在迅速崛起的亚洲“白盒子”市场，并悄然占据了显著的市场份额。ABI Research最近的一项报告显示，2010年推出的大部分商业媒体平板电脑均采用来自飞思卡尔的应用处理器。
飞思卡尔电子消费品事业部市场总监Glen Burchers表示，“飞思卡尔从全球的平板电脑OEM那里感受到了巨大的需求，他们准备迎接2010年圣诞购物季的庞大需求。 飞思卡尔的高性能、高能源效率和优化了成本的嵌入式处理等特性吸引了众多平板电脑OEM。”
虽然大多数基于飞思卡尔产品的平板电脑主要用于实现常见的互联网活动，比如浏览、访问社交网络、购物和使用在线内容，但是仍然有一些设计是针对其他的应用的，这表明产品的外形会不断演变，并不断细分市场，从而满足额外的市场需求。例如，一种基于飞思卡尔产品的7英寸平板电脑可以用作一种高端联网彩色打印机的配备了浏览器的触摸屏控制器，还有另外两款分别为5.5英寸和10英寸的平板电脑产品，可以作为带彩色触摸屏、web浏览和社交网络等功能的彩色电子书阅读器。
目前已经供货的基于飞思卡尔产品的平板电脑还包含来自飞思卡尔的模拟电源管理产品。

description.hltext_display: D-Link Boxee launching in Singapore soon
description.content:
The D-Link Boxee is a new breed of media streamer which provides easy access to free online content on top of your personal media library. This includes YouTube and CNN videos piped through a built-in Wi-Fi connection and displayed onto a big screen via an HDMI output. Twitter and Facebook integration, plus a QWERTY keyboard remote also allow users to recommend movies and songs to their friends, as well as to check out what they are playing. These are all carried out through an intuitive interface customized for TVs.
An onboard SD card slot, dual USB ports and DLNA-compatibility ensure the Boxee can handle just about every possible media playback scenario ranging from an external storage to a computer and server. It is supposedly able to support all file formats such as MKV clips in 1080p resolution and 5.1 Dolby Digital surround sound. The D-Link Boxee is due in Q1 2011, pending price confirmation.
Filed under: Home AV
Leave a comment| Bookmark | Share
close this
Tags: dlna, d-link, boxee, media streamer, wi-fi

description.hltext_display: Modern Aquarium Kitchen With a Strong Visual Impact by Darren Morgan
description.author: Lavinia
description.content:
Kitchens are no longer static zones, where nothing interesting ever happens. Northern Ireland based designer Darren Morgan aka Kitchen Mogul created this Dynamic Kitchen to demonstrate just how “alive” a kitchen may become. Here is some information from the designer: “ I wanted this kitchen to literally come alive within the architecture surrounding it while still performing beyond expectation on functional level. My aim is to encourage a relationship between user and kitchen right down to knowing the names of the fish and having the functionality tailored to the user’s lifestyle. The remotely operated doors and custom made aquarium breath life into this kitchen while the island introduces softer geometry and mood setting colour. This kitchen fits any social occasion or time of day. Achieving ergonomic efficiency and aesthetic satisfaction on every level is the reason for this design. ” The design below features a three meter long aquarium, interactive light settings and low energy LEDs that can transform a common dining area into a night club, a restaurant, a coffee shop or a living room, whatever the user feels is appropriate. Could this kitchen design be more versatile?
Ready for more amazing design ideas? Check below ! Silverfish Aquarium – A Mansion for Fishes

description.hltext_display: 2010 was a 'Perfect Gift' for Canadian Tenors
description.content:
Posted:
Updated:
Tuesday, December 21, 2010 9:09 PM EST
Tennessee Valley Headlines
Entertainment News from AP More>>
AP Entertainment News Video More>>
'Spider-Man' stunt double falls 30 feet on set of Broadway musical, suffers minor injuries More>>
Prince William, Kate Middleton make first appearance together since announcing plans to wed. Natural sound only. More>>
Las Vegas' Neon Boneyard highlights city's glitzy history in unique electronic graveyard More>>
WikiLeaks chief says he fears US ready to indict, but says his organization resilient More>>
Nick Cannon says his wife, Mariah Carey, is having twins More>>
The list of Golden Globe nominees are read by actors. More>>
'The King's Speech' reigns over obvious field of Golden Globe nominees More>>
Probation report: Former TV chef sought to put his wife out of misery over infertility More>>
AP Entertainment Writer
LOS ANGELES (AP) - A year after releasing their first hit album, the Canadian Tenors are delivering "The Perfect Gift," a compilation of traditional and contemporary holiday music.
"You have the classics like 'O Holy Night' and 'Silent Night,' but there are songs that are not necessarily Christmas-specific," explained tenor Victor Micallef. "Some great producers worked on that, as well," added band mate Clifton Murray. "'Hallelujah' was (produced by) Bob Ezrin, who worked on 'The Wall.'"
That's as in Pink Floyd's "The Wall" - just one of many aspects of The Tenors that may surprise. The quartet's clean-cut, all-North American looks scream "pre-fab," and, indeed, the band was the brainchild of Canadian composer Jill Ann Siemens, who first started work on the project some 10 years ago. The current configuration of the group is Victor Micallef, Clifton Murray, Remigio Pereira and Fraser Walters, who said that while they might not have come together organically, that's precisely how they've stayed together.
"Unlike some of these other pre-fab groups, there is a lot of money involved and everything," Pereira said. "We started grassroots and just slowly built up. We cut our teeth on the road doing that. That is how it all happened."
The recent holiday album was released in October, months after the group's debut album "The Canadian Tenors" ranked at the top of Billboard's Classical Albums chart.
Before making inroads stateside, Pereira said, the group did 12 shows in 12 small towns without hitting the two main cities - Saskatoon, Regina.
By late 2009, the Tenors built a solid Canadian following, then caught the attention of Oprah Winfrey, who invited the members to be guests on her show. After that February 2010 appearance, the quartet quickly experienced the so-called "Oprah Effect."
"It is still happening," said Pereira, with a smile.
The four spend more time together on the road than they do with their families these days. And, yes, they're cool with the term "bromance."
"'Bromance,'" replied Micallef. "It does work, but like any relationship, you have to work on it. And communication is key. As soon as you stop talking, there is a problem. So, half our work is the music and half our work is relationship building. So, it is so important or else this thing wouldn't survive more than a year."
The Canadian Tenors wrapped up its 2010 tour schedule Tuesday night (21 December) in Fort Worth, Texas, then planned head north, to the singers' respective homes for the holidays.
Talk about cutting it close. "It kind of makes sense because Christmas is a very busy time for us," said Murray. "Obviously tenors and Christmas go hand in hand."

event_or_fact.property: the group did 12 shows in 12 small towns without hitting the two main cities - Saskatoon, Regina

Unlike some of these other pre-fab groups, there is a lot of money involved and everything; We started grassroots and just slowly built up. We cut our teeth on the road doing that. That is how it all happened.
It kind of makes sense because Christmas is a very busy time for us; Obviously tenors and Christmas go hand in hand.
You have the classics like 'O Holy Night' and 'Silent Night,' but there are songs that are not necessarily Christmas-specific; Some great producers worked on that, as well,
while they might not have come together organically, that's precisely how they've stayed together.

description.hltext_display: 博士跳槽需缴60万违约金 校方否认“霸王条款”
description.content:
关键词：博士;跳槽;违约金;霸王条款
博士跳槽引发“天价”违约金争议
当事人：赔偿60万“是天价”，非常不合理；长沙师范学校：不存在“霸王条款”，违约金也已酌情减半
高额的违约金困扰着王宇。
为了读博士，王宇（化名）与用人单位湖南省长沙师范学校签订了服务时间不少于8年的协议。如今，他可能要为跳槽支付几十万的违约金。
王宇认为，当初签订这个条款属于“霸王条款”，“毕竟当时我不签就没法工作和读博，我属于弱势群体。”但用人单位却认为，协议的签署都是双方同意了的，应该遵循协议条款赔偿违约金。
王宇眼中的“天价违约金”合不合理？在类似劳动争议不断增多的今天，该如何保障人才的流动，并保护单位的合法利益？
当事人 迫于就业压力签下“霸王条款”
“我调到另一个学校工作的确是违约，但如果按照学校单方面的要求，我得赔偿违约金60万，这是天价！非常不合理！国家没有这样的政策。”王宇告诉记者，他2004年6月硕士毕业后来到了长沙师范学校工作，学校同意他读某大学的定向博士研究生，并与其签订了一份协议书。目前他已经在长沙师范学校工作了2年，如今打算跳槽，此时他才发现协议上有“霸王条款”。
王宇拿出了他与学校签署的这份协议，记者看到，协议第10条规定，“乙方若需调离甲方，每少服务一年按离岗前一年工资、津贴总额的两倍/年的标准向甲方交纳违约金，还应退还甲方给予的相关待遇”，王宇说，自己对于退还待遇方面没有任何异议，但是并不同意该条款所带来的“天价”违约金。
他回忆自己当初签订协议时的情景，“就业压力又大，如果我不签订这个协议，学校不会接收我工作，我也不能继续读博了，所以只能被迫签订这样的条款。”他说，自己在就业时面对用人单位属于“弱势群体”，而协议中关于违约金的约定方式有违《劳动合同法》中“平等自愿、协商一致”的原则，属于无效条款，也属于《事业单位试行人员聘用制度有关问题的解释》（以下简称《解释》）确认的无效条款。
校 方 协议共同约定的，没有人强迫
“这伤了学校的心，也伤了领导的心。”谈到王宇的离职，长沙师范学校组织人事处处长周智湘说。
据校方对王宇出具的调离学校处理意见显示，学校要求王宇退还读博期间的培养费、工资福利、安家费、特殊津贴等待遇方面的费用，除此之外还要求王宇支付违约金。根据协议第10条，“每少服务一年按照离岗前一年（即2009年）工资、津贴总额（5.2万元）的两倍/年的标准（10.4万元/年）付给学校违约金，计10.4万元/年×6年=62.4万元”。不过长沙师范学校人事处处长周智湘表示，基于王宇的实际困难，目前只要求其缴纳一半，即31.2万。
针对王宇所说的“霸王条款”，周智湘对此并不认同，“当初是双方共同约定的，如果签订的时候认为不合理，那可以不签或者去找别的更好的地方进行就业，没有人强迫。”他认为，学校是事业单位，并不能完全套用《劳动合同法》，他表示违约金的问题，学校已经咨询了有关政府部门，并根据《关于在事业单位试行人员聘用制度的意见》（以下简称《意见》）的文件精神、学校相关管理制度以及协议等做出处理。
同时他表示，目前学校已经做出了重大让步，同意违约金减半，而且还有“进一步商量的空间。”
讨 论 “天价”违约金到底合不合理？
“天价”违约金到底合理不合理？记者联系了湖南省人力资源和社会保障厅事业单位管理处，一名工作人员表示，用人单位为劳动者提供专项培训费用，对其进行专业技术培训的，可以与该劳动者订立协议，约定服务期，“劳动者违反服务期约定的，用人单位要求劳动者支付的违约金不得超过服务期尚未履行部分所应分摊的培训费用。”
这名工作人员表示，这样签订的合同是不平等的，“不可能要求赔这么多。”他还告诉记者，如果用人单位要求这么多违约金，可以要求其“拿出依据来”。
随后，记者又联系到湖南省劳动人事争议仲裁院，一名工作人员则认为，现在一些单位招人，开出了优厚的待遇，但也存在不少劳动者“钻空子”的现象，政府的条文制定应该既考虑到个人利益，也要考虑到单位利益。同时随着社会的发展，《意见》有一定的局限性，但暂时没有更具操作性的规则和制度。至于60万合理与否，则“不是一句话能够讲清楚的。”
[律师看法]
约定内容确实存在有失公平之嫌
针对协议是否被胁迫签订的，秦希燕律师事务所值班律师认为，王宇需要提出有关胁迫证据。一般认为，以给公民及其亲友的生命健康、荣誉、名誉、财产等造成损害或者以给法人的荣誉、名誉、财产等造成损害为要挟，迫使对方作出违背真实的意思表示的，可以认定为胁迫行为。
至于双方争议的条款是否属于《解释》确认的无效合同（条款），则要看王宇是否能举证证明对方胁迫或威胁他并使之违背真实意思表示签订该条款。
而校方认为学校是事业单位，不能完全套用《劳动合同法》，该律师认为如何适用法律、法规、规章及相关规定的问题，可按照《劳动合同法》第九十六条之规定处理，即“事业单位与实行聘用制的工作人员订立、履行、变更、解除或者终止劳动合同，法律、行政法规或者国务院另有规定的，依照其规定；未作规定的，依照本法有关规定执行。”
同时，该律师认为，用人单位和劳动者在订立合同或协议的过程中应遵循国家相关规定，还需遵循公平原则。双方协议约定乙方若需调离甲方，乙方不仅要承担巨额违约金，而且要退还培训费、工资福利、安家费、特殊津贴等相关待遇，这实际上是有关服务期违约责任的问题。《意见》及配套的《解释》均无服务期违约责任的规定，但有“受聘人员经聘用单位出资培训后解除聘用合同，对培训费用的补偿”的相关规定，本案违约责任条款的内容与《意见》及配套的《解释》所体现的精神有较大出入。该内容与《劳动合同法》有关服务期违约金的相关规定也不符，“本案违约责任条款虽然是维护单位人才稳定的必要条款，但其约定的具体内容也确实存在有失公平之嫌。”
[请您说话]
王宇认为，自己的离职属于违约，的确应该支付违约金，但是数十万的“天价”违约金实在太高。而不少单位的人事部门却认为，“说走就走”的方式会损害到单位利益，不制定违约金的话会让人“钻空子”，“吃完东家吃西家。”
作为劳动者的你，认为“天价”违约金合理吗？你在和用人单位签订劳动合同的时候有没有注意到一些类似“条款”？会不会有被迫签订协议的情况发生？而作为用人单位，你是不是也正面临着员工流动性太强又束手无策的局面？你有什么好的解决办法？如果你有什么想说的，欢迎拨打我们的热线电话0731-85571188，发表你的看法。

description.content:

Bill preventing big tax hikes for millions of Americans goes to Obama; to sign into law Friday More>>
LOS ANGELES (AP) - Activision Blizzard Inc., the video game maker behind the smash-hit shooter "Call of Duty: Black Ops," on Tuesday added a new target in its lawsuit against two former executives: rival Electronic Arts Inc. Activision also put a price tag on its claim for the first time, seeking $400 million.
The amended complaint filed in the Los Angeles Superior Court is the latest salvo in a legal shootout that began when Jason West and Vince Zampella sued Activision for $36 million in March, claiming Activision fired them to avoid paying royalties for their work on the "Call of Duty" franchise.
Activision, owned by France's Vivendi SA, claims EA lured the men away, starting as early as July 2009, despite their having two years left on their contract, in part by using talent agency Creative Artists Agency as an intermediary. It alleges EA dispatched a private jet to Southern California to shuttle West and Zampella to a secret meeting at the home of EA's chief executive John Riccitiello near San Francisco in August 2009.
The two later formed Respawn Entertainment, hiring about 40 employees away from Activision. Respawn said in April it will create games exclusively for release by EA.
In the complaint, Activision alleges that EA intentionally interfered with contracts, engaged in unfair competition and aided and abetted breaches of fiduciary duty by the executives.
EA, which is based in Redwood City, did not immediately respond to a request for comment.
West and Zampella did not directly work on the "Black Ops" game, which Activision said Tuesday had exceeded $1 billion in global sales. The men's unit at Activision, Infinity Ward, works on roughly every other game in the "Call of Duty" franchise with Activision subsidiary Treyarch.
Shares of Activision, which is based in Santa Monica, rose 10 cents to $12.33 in after-hours trading on Tuesday, after closing up 2 cents at $12.23. Electronic Arts shares were unchanged in extended trading after closing up 8 cents at $15.93.

description.hltext_display: Category: Finance and bankingSubject: Viet Nam-Russia joint bank receives licenseRead: 5283Published: 12/01/2006 14:12')"> Viet Nam-Russia joint bank receives license
description.content:
Viet Nam-Russia joint bank receives license
Publish Date: 12/01/2006
(VNS) A joint venture between the Bank for Investment and Development of Viet Nam (BIDV) and its Russian partner, SJC Vneshtorgbank, has been granted a licence by the State Bank of Viet Nam.
HA NOI (7 Nov 2006)— A joint venture between the Bank for Investment and Development of Viet Nam (BIDV) and its Russian partner, SJC Vneshtorgbank, has been granted a licence by the State Bank of Viet Nam.
BIDV’s General Director Tran Bac Ha said Russian President Vladimir Putin was expected to officially inaugurate the Viet Nam-Russia Bank (VRB) in Ha Noi during his stay for the upcoming Asia-Pacific Economic Co-operation (APEC) Leaders’ Meeting this month.
The chartered capital of VRB is US$10 million, of which Viet Nam is contributing 51 per cent. The remainder belongs to the Russian partner.
VRB is licensed to operate for 50 years and its head office will be in Ha Noi.
The bank’s target clients will include Russian investors in Viet Nam, Vietnamese investors in Russia, and Vietnamese-Russian joint venture businesses.
According to the licence, VRB will implement, in Vietnamese dong, banking services such as receiving deposits, payment, lending, cheque and credit card issuance and payment, opening accounts at the State bank, and borrowing short-term capital from the State bank.
Apart from this, VRB will also carry out banking services in foreign currencies. These services will include receiving deposits, foreign currency transactions, lending, payment, transferring money, taking part in the inter-bank foreign currency market and international payments. — VNS

event_or_fact.property: Russian President Vladimir Putin was expected to officially inaugurate the Viet Nam-Russia Bank (VRB) in Ha Noi during his stay for the upcoming Asia-Pacific Economic Co-operation (APEC) Leaders? Meeting this month

LOS ANGELES (AP) - Prime-time leader CBS is tweaking its schedule to bring midseason shows aboard.
Joining the CBS lineup is spinoff series "Criminal Minds: Suspect Behavior," which will debut Feb. 16. Other newcomers are the comedy "Mad Love," debuting Feb. 21, and the spy drama "Chaos" starting April 1.
As part of the shuffle, the Tom Selleck police drama "Blue Bloods" will move to 10 p.m. ET Wednesday for four weeks beginning Jan. 19, then return to its 10 p.m. ET Friday home in February.
"Rules of Engagement," now airing Monday, will pair with sitcom sibling "The Big Bang Theory" on Thursday at 8:30 p.m. ET starting Feb. 24. It's replacing "(Bleep) My Dad Says" with William Shatner, which will wrap for the season.
"The Defenders," starring Jim Belushi and Jerry O'Connell, will end its season run with a shift to 8 p.m. ET Friday starting Feb. 4. CBS didn't announce whether it or the Shatner comedy will be renewed for next year.
___

http://www.cbs.com
