description.hltext_display: Top After-Market NASDAQ Losers (XLNX, ALTR, NETL, TFSL, PKOH)
description.author: IB Times Staff Reporter
description.content:
The top after-market NASDAQ stock market losers are: Xilinx, Altera, NetLogic Microsystems, TFS Financial, Park-Ohio Holdings, Oritani Financial, Vertex Pharmaceuticals, Finish Line, Wet Seal, and Ebix. to get the day's most relevant news, data and anlaysis . Sample
Xilinx Inc. (XLNX) lost 3.56 percent to $27.38 in the after-hours trading. The company lowered its sales guidance for the third quarter to down about 7 percent to 9 percent sequentially from previous forecast of flat to down 4 percent sequentially, due to weaker than anticipated sales to a few large communications customers specifically in its wireless segment.
Xilinx expects sales growth to return to the communications segment in the March quarter based on current backlog and forecast from its large customers. The company is slated to report its third-quarter results on January 19.
Altera Corp. (ALTR) plunged 3.52 percent to $34.55 in the after-market session.
NetLogic Microsystems Inc. (NETL) plummeted 3.31 percent to $31 in the after-hours trading. TFS Financial Corp (TFSL) fell 2.94 percent to $8.25 in the after-market session.
Park-Ohio Holdings Corp. (PKOH) dropped 2.39 percent to $20.67 in the after-hours trading.
Oritani Financial Corp. (ORIT) tumbled 2.36 percent to $12.02 in the after-market session.
Vertex Pharmaceuticals Inc. (VRTX) slid 2.26 percent to $35.50 in the after-hours trading. The company said it has modified a midstage trial assessing regimens of its lead investigational drug telaprevir for treatment of Hepatitis C virus in combination with VX-222. The study is the second of three phases of clinical tests typically required for U.S. approval. The company said it has discontinued the second two-drug treatment of telaprevir and VX-222 alone, upon meeting a pre-defined rule related to viral breakthrough. But studies would continue with three arms, by including ribavarin to the two-drug combination.
Finish Line Inc. (FINL) declined 1.81 percent to $18.45 in the after-market session. The company's third quarter profit was $4.1 million or 8 cents a share, down from $6.6 million or 12 cents a share last year. Sales rose 8.7 percent to $260.9 million. Analysts had expected profit of 5 cents a share on revenue of $249.09 million. Comparable store sales increased 10.1 percent.
Looking ahead, Finish Line expects to achieve double digit operating margins by driving the top line in its stores and by accelerating growth in e-commerce that will play a vital role in the future.
Wet Seal Inc. (WTSLA) decreased 1.60 percent to $3.70 in the after-hours trading.
Ebix Inc. (EBIX) moved down 1.49 percent to $23.19 in the after-market session.

description.hltext_display: Who has Scored the Most Points in the Heineken Cup?
description.author: Neil Hughes
description.content:
The Heineken Cup is considered the greatest, most intense rugby competition on the planet outside of international rugby. Now in its 16th season it continues to thrill with pulsating matches played across Europe. Its a truism that teams arent successful in the Heineken Cup without possessing a highly reliable kicker, but who are the greatest point scorers in the history of this great competition? Here are the top 5. OGara has been the oil in the Munster machine since his competition debut back in 1997. The Irish outside half, 5th in the all time , has been the catalyst behind Munsters remarkable record of qualifying for the knockout stages in the last 12 competition. His tactical awareness and pinpoint accurate goal kicking have been the hallmark of his game as Munster have played a forward oriented territorial game which has seen them win all but 1 of over 50 matches at their Thomand Park fortress. To date, OGara has scored 1177 points in 95 Heineken Cup appearances for Munster and has been instrumental in Munster winning the Heineken Cup twice. Remarkably, OGara is the only player in the top 5 Heineken Cup points scorers to have won the tournament on more than one occasion.
Apart from a brief sabbatical in France with Clermont Auvergne, Stephen Jones has plied his trade with the Scarlets, the West Wales region based in Llanelli. Hero of three Scarlets semi final campaigns, Jones, is a solid outside half more in the style of Neil Jenkins, rather than the more flamboyant heroes of Llanelli teams of the past like Phil Bennett and Jonathan Davies. Jones is renowned for his distribution and solid defense as well as his metronomic kicking style but can take a ball into contact and set a target for his forwards. Jones has scored 839 points in the Heineken Cup of which 39 were scored in his two seasons with French team Clermont-Auvergne. Jones also scored 59 points in the Amlin Challenge Cup.
Whilst leading the Italian national side in their campaign to be included in the 6 Nations tournament, Dominguez became one of the first Italian star to be recruited by one of the French powerhouses when he moved from Milan to Parisian side Stade Francais.
Dominguez scored 645 points in the Heineken Cup and 111 in the Challenge Cup. His 188 point haul in the 2000-01 campaign when Stade were losing finalists to Leicester Tigers remains the Heineken Cup record for a single Heineken Cup season.
Yachvili is a prime example of the French fashion of place kicking scrum halves. He has been the main source of points for the extravagantly talented but entirely flaky Biarritz Olympique team who despite Yachvilis skills can turn in performances like the one which beat the Ospreys in San Sebastian in the 2010 quarter final and then lose to Italian side Aironi in the 2010/11 pool stages.
Yachvili has scored 565 Heineken Cup points in a career which has seen him play in two losing Heineken Cup finals. He has also scored 5 points in the Challenge Cup whilst playing for English side Gloucester in 2001/02
The second Irishman in the top 5 points scorers in the Heineken Cup. Humphries won the Heineken Cup with Ulster in 1998/99, but ironically, wasnt their kicker that season as full back Simon Mason was their front line kicker.
Humphries was more of an attacking fly half, who scored 14 tries in his Heineken Cup points haul of 564 and added a further 19 points in the 2nd tier competition during a season at London Irish.
Heineken Cup Final TicketsThe pools for the knockout stages of this season's Heineken Cup are well underway, but tickets for the final in Cardiff on May 22 2011 are already on sale. Information on where fans can buy tickets for pool games and the knockout stages, including how to buy tickets for the Heineken Cup final from the official ERC rugby site.

description.hltext_display: Cielo muy nuboso, vientos flojos y nieve a 1.400 metros
description.content:
Pamplona, 22 dic (EFE).- El cielo estará hoy muy nuboso o cubierto, con precipitaciones débiles o localmente moderadas, que serán de nieve a una cota de 1.900 metros, que bajará después a unos 1.400 metros.
La Agencia Estatal de Meteorología anuncia vientos flojos o moderados de componentes este y sur, tendiendo por la noche a componente norte, con algunas rachas fuertes en zonas altas, tendiendo al final a flojos variables.
Las temperaturas experimentarán un moderado ascenso, de forma que las máximas alcanzarán los 13 grados en Pamplona y Lekaroz/Baztán, 11 en Isaba/Roncal y 12 grados en Tudela.
Para mañana se espera un acusado descenso de la cota de nieve desde los 1.400 a los 400 metros, con cielos que en la mitad norte estarán muy nubosos o cubiertos con precipitaciones débiles o moderadas, localmente persistentes, y que en el resto se mantendrán nubosos o muy nubosos con precipitaciones generalmente débiles que tenderán a cesar en el transcurso de la segunda mitad del día.
Habrá heladas débiles en zonas altas, los vientos soplarán moderados del noroeste, con rachas fuertes en la Ribera del Ebro, y las temperaturas experimentarán moderado descenso. EFE

description.hltext_display: Latest Phones : At Best Prices With The Deals Of Networks Posted By: troymichael
description.content:
The increasing demand for latest mobile phones have kept motivated, the top manufacturers to always come up with the most sophisticated of handsets. Gone are the days when mobile phone was considered a luxury. Today, it is one of the most unavoidable part of our lives. Also, it is no longer a mere medium of communication as well as the latest phones come loaded with the most advanced technologies.
Some of the leading names in the mobile phone industry are Nokia, Sony Ericsson, Samsung, BlackBerry, etc. All these manufacturers are constantly striving to be at the top and as a result, we have a practically unlimited range of smartphones. Few basic features every Latest Phones is expected to have are camera, music player and internet connectivity. Apart from these, the recent smartphones work on 3G networks, which help us to enjoy video calling.
Also other applications like document viewer, MP4 players, social networking sites' accessibility are very essential these days. The best feature of all latest mobile phones are their storage capacity. With advancing technologies, you now have handsets with internal memory up to 32 GB. Latest Phones Latest Mobile Phones

description.hltext_display: 纸尿片惊现5片生锈刀片 致婴儿生殖器红肿(图)
description.content:
市民潘先生把纸尿布撕开来一看，发现里面居然有长满铁锈的刀片。记者张宇杰摄
图为刀片特写。记者张宇杰摄
生产商承认刀片系不慎掉落
家属称导致婴儿生殖器红肿
双方未就赔偿金额达成一致
本报讯 (记者张学斌) 结婚十几年，终于生了个宝贝儿子，市民老潘却为一块小小的纸尿片伤脑筋。一个多月前，儿子使用的纸尿片里竟出现5块锈刀片，他自称婴儿曾因此导致外生殖器红肿。
昨日涉事公司客服负责人向记者证实，刀片确系该公司在生产中不慎遗留，公司方面将就赔偿金额一事与消费者再行商谈。
5张刀片被婴儿坐身下
家住南庄镇东村的潘泽瑞称，今年11月3日上午，妻子给当时38天大的儿子换纸尿片，发现平时乖巧的儿子大哭不止，不时用手抓着身下。妻子寻迹摸向纸尿片，终于发现一丝异样：本应松软的纸尿片，明显能感到里面有硬邦邦的异物。
“是锋利的美工刀片，上面长满铁锈。”老潘把纸尿片拆开，一片片棉花撕去，4块锈迹斑斑的刀片出现在眼前。儿子用了半天的纸尿片里竟有刀片，这让老潘和妻子大惊失色。
本应干净卫生的纸尿片里，为何有生锈刀片这种危险又不卫生的东西？纸尿片由全日美实业(上海)有限公司(以下简称全日美)生产，老潘当日就拨打该公司客服电话投诉。
昨日在其家中，记者见到了这块含刀片的纸尿片。纸尿片里的棉花与4块生锈刀片粘连在一起，成了枯黄色。仔细摸过去，纸尿片里还有一块刀片存留，加在一起共有5块锈刀片。男婴小伟忽闪忽闪着眼睛，丝毫不知自己曾遭遇过“刀尿片”。事情发生后，他的尿片已换成另一品牌。
恐独儿子“传宗接代”被误
老潘的小儿子今年9月末在禅城某医院出生，从儿子出生开始，他始终在该医院附近的一婴幼儿用品专用店购买纸尿片。这种嘘嘘乐牌婴儿纸尿片，48片售价30元。老潘回忆，出问题的纸尿片由他亲自买回，当时包装密封良好，无异常。
老潘称，看到刀片后，他立即查看儿子有无异常，结果发现儿子的小JJ上有轻微红肿，“之前从未有过，两天后红肿才消失。”老潘妻子泪水涟涟地说，“纸尿片里竟有生锈刀片那么脏的东西，不知以后对儿子是否有伤害。”
“万一留下后遗症，孩子怎么办？”老潘和妻子急得团团转。事发第二天的11月4日，全日美驻佛山业务员陈某赶到潘家，了解情况后为婴儿拍照取证，并表示会将情况汇报上海总部。几天后，公司总部表示“可以给予适当补偿”。
生产商：刀片为不慎遗落
将给予赔偿
昨日，记者与纸尿片制造商、全日美实业(上海)有限公司方面取得联系，公司方面证实，刀片确系该公司在生产过程中遗落，但未对婴儿造成实质性伤害。
公司客服负责人周小姐介绍，11月3日公司接到投诉后，公司立即派人到消费者家中取证，调查结果显示，是由于添加原料的生产过程失误导致机器中的刀片不慎遗落到纸尿片中。“纸尿片的生产过程为全自动，以前从未出现过这种事。”
对于消费者指称的“婴儿生殖器红肿”，该负责人称，传回来的取证照片显示，婴儿只是臀部轻微发红未发现生殖器红肿。“很多初生儿会对纸尿片过敏，这是正常现象。”
公司据此认为，纸尿片中虽有刀片，但未对婴儿造成割伤等实质伤害。按照消保委“一赔四”的规定，本应对其作产品价格4倍即120元的赔偿，而公司商谈决定赔偿消费者2000元精神损失，但赔偿金额距老潘要求的1万元要求太远，双方一直未谈妥。公司负责人承诺，全日美公司将再次与其商谈，尽快解决赔偿一事。

description.hltext_display: Israel complains to UN over Gaza rockets (AFP)
description.content:
JERUSALEM (AFP) Israel has called on the Security Council to issue a "clear and resolute" message against rockets fired into its territory from the Gaza Strip, in a letter to the United Nations body that was made public on Wednesday.
The December 21 letter, made public by Israel's foreign ministry, comes amid rising tensions on Israel's border with the coastal enclave.
On Tuesday, Israel launched a series of airstrikes against what it said were tunnels, training sites and weapons facilities in the Gaza Strip, in response to a salvo of mortar shells on Monday and rocket fire on Tuesday morning.
A Kassem rocket landed just metres (yards) away from a kindergarten in a southern Israeli kibbutz, wounding a teenage girl. "The incidents of the past several days are part of an escalation of terrorist attacks emanating from Gaza that target Israeli civilians, towns, and military personnel," said the letter signed by Meron Reuben, Israel's UN ambassador. "Israel holds the de facto authority in the Gaza Strip completely responsible for all of these incidents, which are carried out in clear violation of international law. In response to such attacks, Israel has exercised and will continue to exercise its right to self-defence." The letter is addressed to US ambassador to the UN Susan Rice, the current chair of the Security Council, and UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon.
It says three rockets and 18 mortars have been fired into parts of southern Israel from Gaza since December 19 alone. "The Security Council, the Secretary-General, and the international community must send a clear and resolute message that these attacks are unacceptable," Reuben wrote. "In addition, the Security Council must give appropriate attention to the smuggling of arms into Gaza, which continues to fuel violence and instability in our region." On Tuesday, Israeli army chief Lieutenant General Gabi Ashkenazi warned that the relative calm that has prevailed since Israel's devastating Gaza offensive at the end of 2008 could quickly end. "The situation is tense and fragile and could easily deteriorate, particularly if a rocket lands in a populated area," he told a parliamentary committee.
Between December 2008 and January 2009, Israel launched Operation Cast Lead, in response to hundreds of rockets fired from Gaza into the Jewish state.
The war cost the lives of 1,400 Palestinians, mostly civilians, and 13 Israelis, 10 of them soldiers.
Since then, the number of rocket attacks has dropped considerably, but the army says more than 200 rockets or shells have been fired this year.

event_or_fact.property: The Security Council, the Secretary-General, and the international community must send a clear and resolute message that these attacks are unacceptable; In addition, the Security Council must give appropriate attention to the smuggling of arms into Gaza,
the relative calm that has prevailed since Israel's devastating Gaza offensive at the end of 2008 could quickly end.

description.hltext_display: "Ngangkung" new Malaysian box office record
description.content:
–Prolific producer Metrowealth International Group (MIG) outdid themselves when "Ngangkung" topped RM 8 million and broke the "Adnan Sempit" all-time highest grossing Malaysian movie record which previously stood at RM 7.8 million.
This is the first time a Malaysian made movie has crossed the RM 8 million mark.
The success was even sweeter considering it was reportedly done in four weeks instead of the six needed by its predecessor.
Both movies star Shaheizy Sam in the lead, an upcoming actor whose popularity is sky-rocketing, especially after winning Best Supporting Male Actor at the Malaysian Film Festival Awards, in 2009 for "Bohsia: Jangan Pilih Jalan Hitam" and in 2010 for "Evolusi KL Drift 2".
Metrowealth's upcoming movies include "Kembar Siang", "Kongsi", "3 2 1 Cinta", "Sekali Lagi", "Senario Ops Pocot" and "Keramat".

description.hltext_display: Lohan 'assault' worker dismissed
description.content: A woman who accused actress Lindsay Lohan of attacking her has been sacked by the Betty Ford rehab centre. Rehab centre spokesman Russ Patrick said the employee was dismissed for breaking patient confidentiality at the Palm Desert, California, clinic by giving interviews and "disclosing a privileged document".He said Dawn Holland's interview was a breach of trust and the rehabilitation process."When patients come to the centre for treatment, they come to a safe place where their identity is protected, where anonymity is safeguarded," he said.Mean Girls star Lindsay, 24, is being investigated by Riverside County sheriff's detectives for misdemeanour battery following a confrontation on December 12.A police spokeswoman said deputies were called to the Betty Ford centre shortly after 1am after an altercation between Lindsay and Ms Holland.Lindsay's lawyer said the actress called the police emergency number.Neither Betty Ford nor sheriff's officials identified Ms Holland, but she appeared in an interview on celebrity website TMZ, claiming Lindsay and two other girls had sneaked out of the centre.Ms Holland said she was trying to get Lindsay to submit to a breathalyser test when the actress became belligerent, pushed her and snatched a phone from her hand, straining her arm.Riverside County sheriff's deputy Herlinda Valenzuela said Lindsay's case would be presented to prosecutors, who would decide whether she should be charged.Copyright (c) Press Association Ltd. 2010, All Rights Reserved.

description.hltext_display: Economía/PGE.- UGT advierte de que los Presupuestos de 2011 obstaculizarán la recuperación económica
description.content: UGT ha advertido de que los Presupuestos Generales del Estado (PGE) de 2011, aprobados ayer en el Congreso, consolidarán el retroceso social y obstaculizarán la recuperación económica y del empleo en España.

description.hltext_display: Bis Januar: Taschenaktionen mit Case Logic
description.content:
Avery Zweckform hat rund um die Case Logic-Taschen interessante Pakete geschnürt.
Etiketten-Spezialist Avery Zweckform, der den Generalvertrieb des Taschenherstellers Case Logic unterhält, hat für IT-Händler fünf attraktive Promotionen aufgelegt. Damit soll es den Händlern erleichtert werden, ihren Kunden das passende Taschenportfolio zu bieten. Die Aktionen gelten bis Ende Januar.
Das Aktionspaket "Gut geschützt unterwegs" enthält insgesamt 18 Taschen aus Nylon, von der kleinen Netbook-Tasche bis zur ausgewachsenen Notebook-Tasche. Pro Modell sind jeweils drei in den 18 enthalten, davon müssen jedoch immer nur zwei bezahlt werden. Reseller zahlen also von 18 Taschen nur 12.
Das Aktionspaket "Hüllen-Knüller" enthält insgesamt 12 Notebook- und Netbook-Hüllen verschiedener Größen, von denen nur acht bezahlt werden müssen.
Für Händler mit vielen Apple-Kunden ist das Paket "Alles was der Apfel braucht" gedacht. Insgesamt 18 Taschen in trendigen Farben und Materialien können zum Preis von acht Taschen bezogen werden.
Bundle Nummer Vier "Tasche kaufen - Maus geschenkt" legt, wie der Name schon sagt, noch ein Logitech-Maus B105 dazu.
Das fünfte Aktionspaket bezieht sich ausnahmsweise nicht auf Case Logic-Taschen. Für bestimmte Vertriebskanäle hat Avery Zweckform nämlich auch den Vertrieb von Duracell-Batterien übernommen. Davon können IT-Händler nun profitieren: Die "Duracell-Aktion" bietet eine spezielle Blister-Packung acht Batterien zum Preis von vier Batterien.
Die Aktionspakete können bei Actebis Peacock, Fröhlich + Walter, NTP, Soft-Carrier, Systeam und Tech Data geordert werden. (awe)
Beteiligen Sie sich auch an unserem großen Gewinnspiel von Case Logic und ChannelPartner. Zu gewinnen gibt es attraktive Preise, von der Notebook-Tasche bis zum ausgewachsenen Trolley. Zur Teilnahme geht’s hier.
Leider haben Sie Javascript deaktiviert, deshalb können die Galerie nicht sehen.

description.hltext_display: Golf review of 2010 by Enjoymygolf.com
description.content:
Edit Article | Posted: Dec 22, 2010 |Comments: 0 |
Share
Photo from discount golf clubs expert enjoymygolf.com
European golf enjoyed a year to remember as Lee Westwood toppled Tiger to establish himself as world number one, Graeme McDowell and Martin Kaymer became major champions and Colin Montgomerie and his men wrested the Callaway RAZR X Irons back from America.
Player of the Year - Graeme McDowell
A tough category to call with two truly outstanding candidates; Graeme McDowell and Martin Kaymer. Both men enjoyed quite Callaway RAZR X Irons , claiming maiden major championships as well as multiple titles worldwide. Kaymer also finished the year as European number one after clinching the Race to Dubai money-list crown, but we are going to side with McDowell on this occasion. The Ulsterman triumphed at Pebble Beach to become the first European to win the US Open for 40 years and pushed Kaymer all the way in the Race to Dubai after successes at Celtic Manor and Valderrama. But Callaway RAZR X Irons was his exploits at the Ryder Cup that tip the balance as he retained his composure to secure the all-important winning point for Europe in the singles against Hunter Mahan. GMac also finished the year in spectacular fashion as he came from four shots back on the final day to beat host Tiger Woods at the Chevron World Challenge - a worthy winner.
European golf enjoyed a year to remember as Lee Westwood toppled Tiger to establish himself as world number one, Graeme McDowell and Martin Kaymer became major champions and Colin Montgomerie and his men wrested the Callaway RAZR X Irons back from America.

description.hltext_display: 肇事司机报出叔叔名字续：在其叔动员下自首
description.content:
网友zongzi3于12月20日突然“处理”了自己的主帖，将原内容清空，把题目改为：“路见不平一声吼，吼完继续往前走”。新华社发
据新华社温州12月21日电 日前，温州爆出“我爸是李刚”的相似版，酒驾又打交警的肇事者扬言：“我叔叔是金国友！”此事经当地网站703804曝光后，引起社会强烈反响。20日傍晚，肇事者金建兄慑于警方压力投案自首，警方认定其行为已构成寻衅滋事和阻碍执行公务，对其处以行政拘留20日。
12月18日，网友zongzi3在703804网站发了一篇题为《“我叔叔是金国友”――永嘉惊现“我爸是李刚”》的帖子称：12月17日晚，一名起亚轿车的驾驶员金建兄与一辆奥拓车发生刮擦，温州市永嘉县公安局交警大队瓯北中队一名民警接警带领2名协警赶到现场处理。当交警发现金建兄身上有浓重酒气，要求双方驾驶员配合进行酒精检测时，金建兄随即对民警破口大骂，后又电话召集多人对3名民警、协警殴打，并宣称：“我叔叔是金国友，跟老子作对的话非弄死你们不可！”同时贼喊捉贼大叫：“警察打人了，警察把我打死了！”，随后，这伙人打砸奥拓车，造成该车车顶与右侧车门全部损坏。当其他民警赶到时，他们逃离现场。
该网友称，此人口中所称的“金国友”是永嘉县公安局副局长。
记者向永嘉县警方核实网友报料，永嘉县警方告知：网帖内容基本属实。
目前这起事件已引起温州警方高度重视。永嘉县警方立即调查此案，并通过金国友敦促肇事者、其侄子金建兄接受警方调查。金国友表示：积极配合，支持警方严格依法处理。20日下午5时许，涉案人员金建兄在金国友动员下向警方投案自首。

description.hltext_display: 明年TD终端将推更多单芯片解决方案
description.content:
关键字：单芯片 物联网 TD
12月21日消息 由中国通信学会主办的2010中国手机产业发展大会今天在北京举行，中国移动终端部副总经理何志力在发言中表示，截至2010年6月，我国手机网民规模继续扩大，已经达到2.77亿户，较2009年底增加了4334万户。
伴随着网络规模的发展，物联网的应用成为新的增长点。“中国移动物联网业务持续快速发展，终端数由2004年的15万发展到2010年9月的613.6万，年均增长88%以上，这些应用主要集中在电力、交通和金融三大行业。”何志力说。
自从TD-SCDMA网络设备逐步成熟后，终端成为TD发展最显而易见的瓶颈。不过，这种状态将在今年底被打破。就在前不久召开的移动互联网研讨会上，中国移动通信研究院院长黄晓庆曾指出，到今年底再发布的TD-SCDMA将可以达到WCDMA的水平。
何志力也持有相同的观点。“不仅仅是体现在终端的表现上，除了三星和摩托罗拉外，诺基亚、索尼爱立信、黑莓、夏普都已经加入了TD终端的阵营。”何志力说，“TD-SCDMA推出了65nm、55nm、40nm的解决方案，尤其是 AP+CP单芯片方案也在今年推出，明年将有更多的单芯片方案推出。”
TD-SCDMA芯片将更加集成化，而TD-SCDMA终端也将被赋予更多功能。当下，TD-SCDMA芯片的耗电已经与GSM基本相当，而终端无故障时间接近400小时，与国际水平基本相当。
“TD-SCDMA终端的性能也得到了进一步提升。目前，在处理能力方面已经进入到"GHz"时代，三星等已经发布了相关产品；存储能力在不断扩大；TD-SCDMA终端在屏幕工艺方面不断创新，提供了更佳的视觉体验；同时，GPU的逐步引用也有效提升了图形处理的速度和质量。”何志力说。

description.hltext_display: Sarb index shows SA growth on track
description.content:
Johannesburg - South Africa's leading economic indicator rose 11.5% year-on-year in October from a 16.3% increase recorded in September, according to South African Reserve Bank (Sarb) data released on Wednesday.
The seasonally adjusted leading economic indicator provides a guideline for economic growth for at least six months ahead.
The latest increase takes the indicator to an index level of 129.8 which, on a trend basis, is higher than the 121.8 index level in December 2009.
Month-on-month growth has returned to negative territory, registering a 0.6% decline from a 0.8% rise in September.
September's index was revised downwards to 130.6 from 131.9
The leading indicator had been over 120 and nearer to 130 for the whole of 2007. However, it slowed substantially when the country went into a recession in late 2008.
The indicator also confirmed a few months ahead that economic growth would decline somewhat in 2010.

description.hltext_display: Valdezcaray tiene 6,5 kilómetros esquiables de nieve húmeda
description.content:
Logroño, 22 dic (EFE).- La estación riojana de esquí de Valdezcaray tiene 6,5 kilómetros esquiables, el 32,42% de su superficie, con nieve de calidad húmeda y espesores entre 30 y 40 centímetros, según indica su parte de nieve.
Las pistas que están abiertas son las de Principiantes, Salegares, Sagarroya 1, Sagarroya 2, Salegares 2, Colocobia, Los Tubos, Rehoyo, Pala Lisa, La Vaguada y La Variante.
También están abiertos los remontes de La Cascada, Rehoyo, Colocobia, Salegares, Valdezcaray, Principiantes, Sagarroya 1 y Sagarroya 2; así como los accesos a la estación, donde la temperatura es de un grado. EFE.

description.hltext_display: 丈夫写保证书承诺不嫖娼后和卖淫女私奔(图)
description.content:
丈夫写的保证书。
“当时就想，既然第一次给了他，就将就嫁给他吧，感情还可以慢慢培养，也许时间久了就会有，但没想到，最后他竟然和一个小姐跑了。”37岁的江红(化名)，这两天正在等待着法院的离婚判决，她唯一希望的，就是法院能把两个孩子都判给她抚养。
第一次给了他 就只能嫁给他
江红和老公李华 (化名)成为夫妻之前，都在厦门一家工厂打工，江红比李华大两岁，同时，她也是小组长，是李华的上司。
1997年下半年，两人确定了恋爱关系，“刚开始，我们的关系还没有那么公开，后来我们发生了关系，才公开的”。江红说，发生关系其实是被李华强迫的，之后，她竟然意外怀孕了。当年9月，她在检查机器时，突然头晕眼花，一不小心，右手就被机器绞到了，大拇指当场就断了，其他指头的肌腱也被伤到。虽然后来大拇指又接了回去，但右手的功能大部分都丧失了，江红从此变成了一个残疾人。
1998年10月，两人领了结婚证。“因为自己比较传统，觉得女人把第一次给了人家，就要和他结婚，不然也没有人要我了。”江红回忆说。
妻子苦撑家计 老公傍上卖淫女
但令江红没有想到的是，结婚之后，李华对她的态度就变得十分冷淡，不仅好吃懒做、沉迷赌博，还时不时向她施暴。家里的生计都由江红苦苦支撑。2007年，两人因为言语不合发生争执，李华竟然还当场拿出菜刀砍向江红，幸好江红的弟弟等人在场，及时制止。
2009年10月，江红无意间发现李华和一个女子往来密切，“一个晚上有20多个电话或短信”。江红很快意识到李华有了外遇，但更让她心寒的是，李华外遇的对象竟然是一个卖淫女。“他后来在集美开了酒店式公寓，基本上都是他的父母在管理，那个女人带人到他店里卖淫，两人就认识了。”
忍无可忍向法院起诉离婚
今年2月，李华索性和卖淫女阿娟(化名)双双去了上海。忍无可忍的江红下定决心向法院起诉离婚。得知江红要起诉离婚，李华又从上海赶回了厦门。
江红说，李华在劝她不要离婚的时候，甚至还和她说，把身边几个卖淫女的钱骗到手了，他就回到厦门生活。为了让江红去法院撤诉，李华还写下了一份保证书，保证书的内容包括了不赌博、不嫖娼、要顾家、任劳任怨、和家人和睦相处等，如果违反了这些保证，他将净身出户。但是江红撤诉之后，保证书立马变成了一张废纸，6月，李华再次离开江红去了上海。这个月，江红再次向法院提起离婚诉讼。

description.hltext_display: Norwich rules out Holt sale
description.content: The £2million-rated star has been linked with the likes of Wigan, West Ham, Bolton and Blackpool. A Norwich spokesman told The Mirror: Grant Holt is not for sale. Holt's contract at Norwich is set to expire at the end of next season, but the club are set to hold talks with the striker about a new deal.

description.hltext_display: Роман Бондарук: «Раньше же как было: повесил на руку спорттестер – вот и весь контроль»
大学生情侣公交车上举止亲密被司机呵斥下车
description.content:
卷入“公交门”事件的苏州333路。
18日晚，苏州333路公交车上，发生一起“离奇”纠纷，一对90后小情侣在车上“大秀恩爱”，引来公交司机不满，责令他们下车。为此，双方火药四溅，互不相让，最后小情侣投诉到苏州新区公交公司。这起事件随后被网友们发布上网，顿时成为热议的话题，有人赞赏，有人质疑，并被冠以“苏州公交门”事件。昨天记者联系上当事双方，还原事件经过。
现场还原
大学生情侣：只是挤了挤青春痘，就遭骂！
昨天下午，记者希望可以找到当事司机了解事情经过。但333路的另一位司机窦师傅告诉记者，当事司机范师傅来自湖北，40岁出头，上午去体检了，当天可能不回公司。
记者于是拨通了范师傅的电话。在电话里，范师傅的语气显得疲惫又无奈。据其介绍，18日晚上7点多，在苏州新区何山百润发站，一对小情侣坐上了他驾驶的333路公交车。上了车后，这对小情侣坐在他右后方的座位上卿卿我我。当车子快到苏州科技城站时，“当时那个男生一直在把女孩的衣服往下拉，女孩子还一直‘啊啊’的叫，叫得非常大声，我实在是听不下去，觉得该维护这个秩序，所以就停下车教育他们，让他们注意一下在公共场所的行为必须得当，不能玩得太过火了。”随后，双方就此发生了争吵。
不过，对于范师傅的说法，当事小情侣并不认同。当事女青年小汤告诉记者，她和男友都是苏州科技城内高博软件学院的学生。事发当晚，当车子快到站的时候，由于脸上长了青春痘，感觉很疼，她就让男友帮忙挤一下下巴上的青春痘。谁知道，这时范师傅就“莫名其妙”地走到他们座位前，呵斥他们下车，让两人感觉十分尴尬。后来干脆对骂起来，之后两人也向新区公交进行了投诉。
记者追踪
当事司机：维护公共场所秩序也有错？辞职！
“这件事情，我就算自认为没有错，但遭投诉之后，公司还会说是我的错，我觉得很累压力很大，所以我目前已经向公司递了辞职信。”范师傅告诉记者，自己还有两个孩子在读书，不希望舆论的矛头和压力全指向他和家人，对于这桩“公交门”，范师傅显得欲言又止，但他很确定的告诉记者，辞职是肯定的。
在采访中，苏州新区公交332路司机沐师傅告诉记者，这件事发生后，整个公司基本上都有耳闻，目前公司也已对范师傅发出通告，会对他进行罚款等处罚。而公交司机窦师傅说，要是别人告诉他，有人挤个青春痘被赶下车，那肯定是司机有毛病，正常人都不会因为这个就与人起争执，里面的孰是孰非只有那两个90后自己知道。
说起在公交车上的不雅行为，公交车司机们显得十分无奈。“每次被投诉就得被罚两百块，甚至被劝退，这哪里吃得消噢。我想以后遇到这类事情，我肯定不会管。”窦师傅表示。
网友声音
“顶”公交司机！呼吁再多一些正义司机
对于这一事件，网友们的反应也相当“热闹”。不过，很多网友都是“力挺”范师傅的，认为现在确实有些情侣实在不太像话，有的就公开在公交站台和公交车上抱抱吻吻，那些亲密的动作让人受不了，这样下去没人管，估计要演变为在车上开拍大尺度的了，这样的正义司机还是多一些的好！
网友wangzhuoyu888就表示，“顶司机，打情骂俏也要看看地方的，公交车毕竟是公共场合，乘客应该要注意自己的言行举止。”网友逆风の蝶也表示，“公交车上做这些事，实属不该！我觉得公交司机做得没错，换了我，我也受不了！”
对于网友的评论，许多市民也表示支持。市民孙阿姨也说，“现在在公共场所一直有这样的现象，虽然司机骂人是有点不妥当，但他是急了才这样，总的来说他的心肯定是为了维护其他乘客。”
专家意见
法律上无对错！但个人道德修养需加强
只因在公交上的亲密动作，引起了双方争执，甚至使得公交车司机辞职，江苏尔雅律师事务所宋洪波律师认为，从法律的角度来看，这桩事件没有对错之分，司机没有权利让乘客下车，而乘客也没有权利说就是司机的责任。“实际上，对于类似人们在公共场所的行为举止，更应该自觉的从道德角度上，去提醒和督促自己。”
苏州科技学院社会学系教授高钟博士称，目前类似的情侣“秀恩爱”在高校中是普遍存在的，但他提醒年轻学生，在彰显自己个性的同时，也要把握尺度。“自己的一些隐私行为，不应当妨碍他人的观瞻自由，某些学生情侣没有注意到这一点，也是相关事件的起因点。” 高钟博士表示。

description.hltext_display: Le ministre du commerce britannique piégé par deux journalistes
description.content:
| 09h14
"J'ai déclaré la guerre à M. Murdoch. Je pense que je vais la gagner."REUTERS/ANDREW WINNING
Vince Cable s'est retrouvé mardi 21 décembre bien malgré lui au centre d'un scandale politique qu'il a lui-même déclenché par le biais de confidences sur les divergences au sein du gouvernement de coalition, ainsi qu'une "déclaration de guerre" au magnat des médias Rupert Murdoch.
Le ministre du commerce britannique s'est fait piéger par deux journalistes du Daily Telegraph, qui se sont faites passer pour des militantes de son parti libéral-démocrate, afin de publier mardi une vraie-fausse interview.
"Je détiens l'arme nucléaire. (…) S'ils me poussent trop loin, alors je peux quitter le gouvernement et provoquer sa chute et ils le savent", a notamment fanfaronné le ministre en référence à ses "amis conservateurs", dans les premiers extraits publiés en "une" du quotidien. Il a ensuite énuméré les sujets de discorde avec le parti conservateur et a critiqué l'"espèce de révolution maoïste en cours dans nombre de domaines", en ajoutant : "On essaie de faire trop de choses à la fois."
Des extraits complémentaires diffusés mardi après-midi sont tout aussi dévastateurs. "J'ai déclaré la guerre à M. Murdoch. Je pense que je vais la gagner", a-t-il assuré en se targuant de pouvoir bloquer — en sa qualité de ministre de tutelle — les projets de prise de contrôle de BSkyB par le patron américano-australien de l'empire des médias News Corp.
DES PROPOS "INACCEPTABLES ET INAPPROPRIÉS"
Les "confidences" de Vince Cable tombent doublement mal. Elles ont placé sur la défensive le premier ministre conservateur David Cameron et son adjoint libéral-démocrate Nick Clegg. Tous deux ont été à la peine mardi, lors de leur dernière conférence de presse conjointe de l'année, pour convaincre les journalistes du bilan positif et de l'avenir de leur coalition, après huit mois d'existence.
Les confidences ont aussi coïncidé avec le feu vert donné mardi par la Commission européenne au projet de rachat par News Corp. de la totalité de BSkyB. Un porte-parole du 10 Downing Street a qualifié de "totalement inacceptables et inappropriés" les propos du ministre, en conséquence dessaisi de ce dossier. La question est en effet délicate, puisque Rupert Murdoch a soutenu la campagne victorieuse de David Cameron, après avoir appelé à voter travailliste pendant plus de dix ans.
LES "LIBDEM" AU PLUS BAS DANS LES SONDAGES
En vantant les succès de la coalition qu'il dirige, M. Cameron a devant les journalistes relativisé les divergences avec ses alliés "libdem" : "Si l'on était d'accord sur tout, on appartiendrait au même parti." Mais il a subi une avalanche de questions sur une éventuelle démission de Cable. Ce dernier a de son côté déclaré vouloir rester, dans un communiqué repentant.
Economiste reconnu, de centre-gauche, il a accumulé les écarts de langage depuis son accession au gouvernement. C'est ainsi qu'il a accusé les banques "d'escroquer leurs clients", critiqué l'augmentation des frais universitaires, estimé que la nouvelle politique d'immigration causait un "grand tort" aux entreprises du Royaume-Uni.
L'alliance politique inédite des conservateurs et des "libdem" est censée durer jusqu'en mai 2015. Elle a jusqu'ici desservi les libéraux-démocrates, au plus bas dans les sondages, avec une cote de popularité à 8 %.

description.hltext_display: Category: Finance and bankingSubject: BIDV secures loan for $200 million from Austrian bankRead: 5951Published: 12/01/2006 14:12')"> BIDV secures loan for $200 million from Austrian bank
description.content:
BIDV secures loan for $200 million from Austrian bank
Publish Date: 12/01/2006
(VNS) The Bank of Investment and Development of Viet Nam (BIDV) signed a US$200 million term loan with the Austrian Raiffeissen Zentralbank Oesterreich AG (RZB) bank in Vienna, Austria, on Monday.
BERLIN (8 Nov 2006) — The Bank of Investment and Development of Viet Nam (BIDV) signed a US$200 million term loan with the Austrian Raiffeissen Zentralbank Oesterreich AG (RZB) bank in Vienna, Austria, on Monday.
The deal marks the largest-yet foreign commercial loan won by a Vietnamese bank, an important milestone in the co-operation between RZB and BIDV.
BIDV will use the five-year loan to adjust the structure of its capital sources and assets before the first phase of its equitisation begins in late 2007.
The RZB’s loan will also help BIDV expand its scope of investment and provide medium- and long-term loans for the country’s economic activities. — VNS

description.hltext_display: Экс-министр экономики Армении назначен зампредом Центрального банка
17岁打工仔为讨要700元工资刺死老板
description.content:
东亚吉林讯 就为了700元薪水，17岁的打工仔王某，将拖欠工资的老板马某刺了30多刀，导致马某死亡。事发后，王某主动拨打110自首。
少年首次打工遭拖欠工资
17岁的王某为松原市人，家里还有两个姐姐，一个已经出嫁，另一个正在上大学，身为农民的父母一辈子靠种地为生。懂事的王某为了减轻家庭压力，于两个月前来到吉林市打工。
“每个月500，提供吃住。”没多久，王某在吉林市昌邑区一假牙生产厂家找到了工作。因为阅历浅薄，王某认为这份工作适合自己，薪水也可以接受，就这样，他开始在该工厂打工。
可干了两个月后，王某只得到300元的工资，对此王某非常不满，认为老板还拖欠剩下的700元钱。这是王某第一次打工，他很想把钱要回来。为此，他多次找到老板索要未果。
刺老板30余刀 刀都断了
在多次索要未果的情况下，王某决定离开工厂，但他还打算最后再要一次工资。12月20日下午，王某事先购买了一把30厘米长的匕首，再次来到工厂找老板马某索要工资。
“没钱。”当王某听到这冰冷的两个字后，彻底失去了理智，他见老板推门要离开工厂，就发疯地冲上前去，用尖刀对马某猛刺。据介绍，马某身中30多刀，王某使用的尖刀都断成了3截。
自首后称讨薪为回家过年
案发后，王某自己拨打了110电话报警，并主动到警方投案自首。
据介绍，吉林市昌邑公安分局民主派出所和昌邑刑警三中队的刑警赶到现场，经勘察，被害人马某，38岁，已经当场死亡。
不足1.7米的身高，满脸的稚气，对于王某来说，为700元钱付出的代价太大。就在指认现场时，王某流下了悔恨的泪水。“我就是想要700元工资，他就是不给。”王某称，这是自己第一次打工，挣了钱想回家过年，让父母也高兴一下。
目前，王某因涉嫌故意杀人被警方刑拘，此案仍在调查中。

description.author: Tamiko Nicholson
description.content:
Four simple numbers can help parents raise healthy kids. With high obesity rates across North America, government bodies on both sides of the border are encouraging families to eat healthy and be active. A recent campaign that is catching on and still spreading is summarized by these numbers, 5-2-1-0. The slogans vary from 5210 Healthy Hero, 5-2-1-0 Healthy NH (NH standing for New Hampshire) to Live 5-2-1-0! Its recommended that kids eat at least a day. Parents can incorporate fruits and vegetables into their three main meals and also offer them up for snacks. Try to make the fruits and veggies raw if possible, which can be as easy as apple slices or carrot sticks for snack time. Even though there is 100% fruit juice available at stores, it contains a lot of natural sugar and it doesnt offer benefits like the high fiber content of real fruits and vegetables, so try to limit how much children drink.
Keep screen time down to two hours or less per day for your children. This includes time in front of the TV, computer screen, video games and other electronic devices involving screen use. Children under two are not even recommended to watch television. Have simple arts and crafts, board games and toys available for kids to play with and make that a routine afterschool and on weekends to do on their own or together as a family.
Find a way to work in at least one hour of active indoor or outdoor time for your kids for each day. It should be moderate to vigorous physical activity which means an activity like running, dancing, riding a bike or swimming where the childs heart rate and breathing are increased. Parents can join in with kids to get some exercise
Pop commercials pop up all over TV and vending machines are always easy to access, but soda pop and other sugar-sweetened drinks are not healthy for children. Sugary drinks can be detrimental to teeth and add on unwanted weight. Healthier options are water, milk and fortified soy beverages. Sports drinks, energy drinks and beverages with caffeine in them are not recommended for children.
There are a number of websites about the 5210 movement available online that offer statistics, tips and examples of how to live healthy using the 5210 guidelines. The first two sites are American and based on US Food Guide standards while the latter is a Canadian site based on the Canada Food Guide. There are some differences but all the sites offer valuable information for raising healthier children:
With obesity a problem faced in American and Canada, more parents are looking for ways to raise healthier kids. The 5210 campaign provides an easy formula for parents to remember to help their kids eat healthy and be more active. Remember these rules every day:
Sources:
Foundation for Healthy Communities, 5210 Healthy NH, accessed December 2010.
Greater Rochester Health Foundation, What Is 5210?, 2010. Sustainable Through Community Engagement, 5-2-1-0: Raising Children with Healthy Weights, 2010.

description.hltext_display: Cielos cubiertos con precipitaciones y temperaturas en ascenso
description.content:
San Sebastián, 22 dic (EFE).- Los cielos en Euskadi se presentan hoy cubiertos con precipitaciones al final de la tarde, las temperaturas ascenderán y los vientos soplarán del sur flojos al principio, aunque girarán y aumentarán por la tarde al norte o noroeste moderados.
Según ha informado el Centro Meteorológico del País Vasco, para mañana se esperan cielos muy nubosos con precipitaciones, que podrán ser localmente persistentes, bajada de la cota de nieve de 1.000 a 500 metros, temperaturas en moderado descenso, heladas débiles y vientos del noroeste moderados con rachas fuertes.
Las temperaturas mínimas registradas esta madrugada eran de 9 grados en San Sebastián, 8 en Bilbao y 5 en Vitoria, mientras que se esperan máximas de 15 grados en la capital guipuzcoana y la vizcaína, y de 12 en la alavesa.
El estado de la mar, en el Cantábrico hasta las veinte millas, será de marejadilla, con mar de fondo del norte y olas de hasta un metro.
Los vientos en la mar soplarán del este, fuerza 3 a 4, y variables, fuerza 2 a 3, a partir de la tarde, mientras que la visibilidad podría ser regular por aguaceros. EFE

description.hltext_display: Most improved player - Rhys Davies
description.content:
Having graduated from the Challenge Tour, Davies enjoyed a Callaway X-24 Hot Irons first full season on the European Tour in 2010. Possessor of arguably the best putting stroke on tour, the young Welshman enjoyed a flying start to the campaign and, after coming up just short in Malaysia, claimed his first victory at the Trophee Hassan II in Morocco. He shot a course record final round of 62 at Celtic Manor on his way to finishing as runner-up at the Wales Open and was also second in Madrid. Perhaps the only Callaway X-24 Hot Irons for him was missing out on a place in Europe's Ryder Cup team on home soil at Celtic Manor. But after finishing 18th on the Race to Dubai money-list and establishing himself well inside the world's top 100, Davies has every reason to look forward to 2011. description.hltext_display: Partisan fight looms after population surge gives Texas 4 new US House seats, most in US
description.author: JAY ROOT
description.content:
AUSTIN, Texas - A surge of Hispanic residents and other population gains have Texas poised to add more congressional clout than any other state, but a partisan fight now looms over exactly where the new seats should go.
Texas is gaining four seats in the U.S. House, twice as many as Florida, the only other state to pick up multiple ones, according to new population figures announced Tuesday by the U.S. Census Bureau. All told, Republican-leaning states will pick up at least a half dozen House seats thanks to the 2010 census, which found the nation's population growing more slowly than in past decades but still shifting to the South and West.
With Texas Republicans using recent elections to fortify their already solid control of the state Legislature, the political process of redrawing the state's congressional map would seem to benefit the GOP, too.
But Democrats say not so fast.
Boyd Richie, chairman of the Texas Democratic Party, said Hispanic and black population growth account for the additional seats, and he vowed to fight for a redistricting plan that takes their numbers into account. "A legal and fair redistricting process must produce new congressional districts that reflect the Hispanic and African American population growth," Richie said. "Our Democratic numbers may be down, but we are not out. Democrats cannot and will not allow our voices to be silenced in this critical process." The Census Bureau said the nation's population on April 1 was 308,745,538, up from 281.4 million a decade ago. The growth rate for the past decade was 9.7 percent, the lowest since the Great Depression. The U.S. population grew by 13.2 percent from 1990 to 2000. Michigan was the only state to lose population during the past decade. Nevada, with a 35 percent increase, was the fastest-growing state.
The new numbers are a boon for Republicans, with Texas leading the way among GOP-leaning states that will gain House seats, mostly at the Rust Belt's expense. Following each once-a-decade census, the nation must reapportion the House's 435 districts to make them roughly equal in population, with each state getting at least one seat.
In all, the census figures show a shift affecting 18 states taking effect when the 113th Congress takes office in 2013. The political power follows the high population growth, shifting toward the south and west and away from the industrial Midwest and northeast.
With reapportionment settled, the far more politically divisive process of redistricting is set to begin. In Texas, both major parties were bracing for a showdown over the state's new residents, beginning a fight that is sure to spark court action. But with Republican supermajorities in the Legislature, the temptation to run the table will be strong.
Rep. Pete Gallego, D-Alpine, said if the federal courts don't intervene to compel fairness, Republicans will likely produce a map that gives their party the advantage in three or perhaps even all four of the new seats. "It is very easy to overreach when you're holding the map and have the pen in your hand," he said. Despite the party's recent gains in the November legislative elections, Republicans won't have unchecked authority to draw the state's congressional map to benefit themselves.
Civil rights laws require that the interests of minority voters be protected as district boundaries are redrawn, and Texas is one of the states whose redistricting plans require "pre-clearance" by federal authorities under the Voting Rights Act.
Democrats are also counting on an assist from the Obama administration, which could have a significant voice in the pre-clearance process. It is the first time since the Voting Rights Act passed that the Justice Department will be in Democratic hands during the redistricting process.
Hispanic growth doesn't automatically translate into Democratic growth, though. Two heavily Hispanic congressional seats in South Texas flipped to Republicans this year. There also are several new Latino GOP members about to be sworn into legislative seats.
South Texas Rep. Aaron Pena, who recently left the Democrat Party and became a Republican, said Texas Latinos are more conservative than their counterparts in western states such as California and Nevada.
Pena, who sits on the House Redistricting Committee, said his "educated guess" was that Republicans would get three of the four seats. "The Hispanic community is increasingly up for grabs," Pena said. "It's truly a swing population." Texas already had the largest Republican delegation in Congress, holding 20 of the state's 32 seats. In the 2010 elections, the party picked up another three seats, two of them in heavily Latino districts in South Texas. With all the new growth, Texas will now have 36 seats and 38 presidential electoral votes. Federal lawsuits are essentially guaranteed as part of the process, and if the past is any guide, the courts will have a major say in how the lines are finally drawn. In 2001, the Texas Legislature deadlocked on Congressional redistricting, leaving the federal courts to redraw all the districts. In 2006, the U.S. Supreme Court ordered that new lines be drawn in several districts to protect the rights of Hispanic voters in South Texas.
Starting early next year, most state governments will use detailed, computer-generated data on voting patterns to carve neighborhoods in or out of newly drawn House districts, tilting them more to the left or right. Sometimes politicians play it safe, quietly agreeing to protect Republican and Democratic incumbents alike. But sometimes the party in control will gamble and aggressively try to reconfigure the map to dump as many opponents as possible.
The U.S. is still growing quickly relative to other developed nations. The population in France and England each increased roughly 5 percent over the past decade, while in Japan the number is largely unchanged, and Germany's population is declining. China grew at about 6 percent; Canada's growth rate is roughly 10 percent.
The 2010 census results also are used to distribute more than $400 billion in annual federal aid and will change each state's Electoral College votes beginning in the 2012 presidential election.
Apart from the respective four- and two-seat gains in Texas and Florida, Arizona, Georgia, Nevada, South Carolina, Utah and Washington are all picking up one new U.S. House seat. Ohio and New York will lose two House seats each. Losing one House seat are Illinois, Iowa, Louisiana, Massachusetts, Michigan, Missouri, New Jersey and Pennsylvania.
Each House district represents an electoral vote in the presidential election process, meaning the political map for the 2012 election will tilt somewhat more Republican.

description.hltext_display: الصين والهند تتفقان على مضاعفة حجم التبادل التجاري بينهما
description.author: admin
description.content: تفوقت التجارة على السياسة مع زيارة ون جيا باو، رئيس الوزراء الصيني إلى الهند. واتفق ون مع نظيره الهندي، مانموهان سينغ، على مضاعفة حجم التبادل التجاري بين الدولتين إلى 100 مليار دولار بحلول عام 2015، وذلك خلال محادثات لم تشر إلى تقدم ملحوظ بشأن سلسلة الخلافات المثيرة للقلق. واصطحب ون في زيارته وفدا يتكون من 400 رجل أعمال، في إشارة قوية إلى قطاع التجارة. وعقد هذا الوفد عددا من الصفقات بقيمة 16 مليار دولار في القطاعات المالية وتوليد الطاقة والمنتجات الزراعية ومعدات الطاقة والمنتجات الدوائية والمعدنية والبحرية. وبلغ حجم التجارة المتبادلة العام الماضي بين الدولتين اللتين تتمتعان باقتصاد سريع النمو 42 مليار دولار، ومن المتوقع أن يصل إلى 60 مليار دولار خلال السنة المالية الحالية، ويمتد إلى مارس (آذار). وبحسب ون، فإن القرن الواحد والعشرين من نصيب العملاقين الآسيويين، الهند والصين، لذا يمكن للدولتين أن تتعاونا في إتمام جولة الدوحة لمحادثات منظمة التجارة العالمية. وأضاف أن مفاوضات اتفاقية التجارة الحرة يجب أن تبدأ بين الدولتين، رافضا بشدة فكرة التنافس بين «التنين» و«الفيل». وقال ون إن النمو الاقتصادي السريع في الهند والصين يعد عاملا مهما في دفع الاقتصاد العالمي بشكل عام. وكانت أولى محطات ون بعد وصوله إلى العاصمة الهندية دلهي هي قمة التعاون الصيني - الهندي في مجال الأعمال التي استضافتها غرفة الصناعة الهندية. وقد أكد ون خلال كلمة ألقاها هناك أن الصين مستعدة لفتح أسواقها للمنتجات الدوائية والزراعية الهندية والخدمات، في إطار الإجراءات التي تقوم بها لخفض عجز الميزان التجاري المتزايد، الذي تواجهه الهند مع دولة الجوار الآسيوية. وأوضح ون أن بيئة الاستثمار في الهند والصين جيدة، وهو ما تجلى في التدفق الكبير للاستثمار الأجنبي بهما. ومع ذلك فإن حجم تدفق الاستثمارات المتبادل بين البلدين أقل من 700 مليون دولار، وهناك مجال لزيادته. لكن توضح الإحصاءات الخاصة بحجم التبادل التجاري بين البلدين الكثير، حيث كان نصيب الصين 35 مليار دولار من نحو 50 مليار دولار، بينما بلغ نصيب الهند 15 مليار دولار ويشمل سلعا تقليدية مثل الحديد والمنتجات البحرية والغذائية والجواهر والمجوهرات والأدوية. وبلغت قيمة السلع التي تصدرها الصين من الآلات، خاصة التي تستخدم في قطاعات الطاقة، 7.8 مليار دولار (24 في المائة) وقيمة الأجهزة الإلكترونية، التي تستخدم أكثرها في قطاع الاتصالات مع سيطرة شركتي «هواي» و«زي تي إي» على ثلث السوق الهندية في الاتصالات الهاتفية المباشرة، تبلغ 7.6 مليار دولار (23 في المائة)، والكيماويات العضوية 3.3 مليار دولار (10 في المائة) والحديد والمعدن 1.8 مليار دولار (6 في المائة) والأسمدة 1.4 مليار دولار (4 في المائة). وتشير الأرقام الخاصة بالتبادل التجاري إلى اختلال في التوازن، مما يعني أن أي ترتيب خاص بالتجارة الحرة، حتى وإن كان جزئيا، فإنه غير مطروح للنقاش، على الأقل في الوقت الحالي. ويبدو أن نيودلهي قالت للصين إن الانخراط في السوق بشكل أكبر، على سبيل المثال في قطاع الاتصالات، سيعتمد على «التفاهمات السياسية» مثلا في قطاع الصناعات الدوائية. وقال أحد مسؤولي الحكومة: «إذا رغب الصينيون في الانخراط في السوق الهندية بشكل أوسع، فينبغي علينا أن نصل إلى تفاهم على المستوى السياسي يدعم مصالحنا الاقتصادية». لكن ون قال: «الصين تأخذ هذا الاختلال في الميزان التجاري على محمل الجد. نحن على استعداد لاتخاذ خطوات من أجل تسهيل دخول تكنولوجيا المعلومات والمنتجات الدوائية والزراعية الهندية إلى السوق الصينية». وتصطف الشركات الهندية الخاصة العاملة في مجال الطاقة، سواء «ريلاينس باور» لأنيل أمباني أو «أداني باور» أو «جي إم آر» أو «جيندال باور»، لشراء المعدات الصينية، مشيرين إلى أنه لا يمكن التفوق على تلك الأسعار التنافسية ومستوى جودة لا بأس به والتوصيل السريع والعمولة. المثير في الأمر أن أنيل أمباني وقع صفقة بقيمة 10 مليارات دولار مع شركة «شنغهاي إلكتريك» بعد رفض مصرف «إكسيم» الأميركي منحه قرضا، لأنه ليس لديه ما يضمن الحفاظ على البيئة. على الجانب الآخر كان الصينيون يشعرون بالرضا لحصولهم على الصفقة. وبحسب محلل حكومي، أخطرت بكين كبرى شركات صناعة السيارات بإمكانية بدء التحضير لمنافسة الشركات المصنعة للسيارات اليابانية والكورية الجنوبية في الهند. وبدأت شركة «شنغهاي أوتوموتيف إنداستري»، إحدى كبرى شركات صناعة السيارات الصينية، في العمل على أساس هذا الأمر السياسي، موضحا أنها حصلت بالفعل على نصيب من «جنرال موتورز» في الهند من خلال استحواذها الجزئي على «جنرال موتورز». وتعد هذه الزيارة هي الثانية التي يقوم بها ون بعد زيارته الأولى عام 2005. وتتزامن الزيارة مع الذكرى الستين لإقامة العلاقات الدبلوماسية بين البلدين اللذين سادت في علاقتيهما شكوك متبادلة في الأساس نتيجة النزاع الطويل على الحدود الذي يرجع إلى صراع مرير، وإن كان قصيرا، حدث عام 1962. ويعد ون ثالث أكبر زعيم في العالم يزور الهند منذ نوفمبر (تشرين الثاني) بعد الرئيس الأميركي باراك أوباما والرئيس الفرنسي نيكولا ساركوزي. لكن فيما يعد تطورا دبلوماسيا كبيرا، قال ون إنه ينبغي على مسؤولي الهند والصين عقد مناقشات عميقة لحل الخلافات الخاصة بمنح المواطنين الهنود من جامو وكشمير تأشيرات دخول. وقد أثار ون الموضوع خلال اجتماعه مع رئيس الوزراء الهندي مانموهان سينغ في نيودلهي، حيث قال إن الصين تأخذ قلق الهند على محمل الجد.

description.hltext_display: 工人将摩托车改成飞机试飞失败(图)
description.content:
山寨飞机
一个普通的退休工人造出一架“山寨飞机”，这事是真的。南京市浦口区盘城街道56岁的退休工人章德东用106天，在自家摩托车的基础上，制造出一架“飞机”。昨天章德东在一条宽敞的马路上进行了试飞，虽然记者没有看到飞机升空，但章德东信心满满：“前几天试飞还飞了七八米高呢，我还会继续试飞并进一步改进。”
一句玩笑话
他造“山寨飞机”
章德东说自己是一家仪表厂的机械师。前两年退休后，有一次朋友聊天，章德东说了句：“我也能造飞机。”随后，他把家里一辆摩托车拆下来进行改造，“一共花了106天。”章德东称，刚开始造时，老伴担心他的安全问题，明确表示反对，但看到章德东的“飞机”有模有样，就不反对了，“不少人退休后打麻将打发时间，我搞这个不比打麻将强？”章德东笑呵呵地说。
真的很山寨
零件来自旧机器，“机翼”还能拆下来
螺旋桨是从鼓风机上卸下来的
主体机身由125摩托车改造而成
机翼宽近8米，由不锈钢管和帆布制成
水平尾翼和垂直尾翼也由钢管和帆布制成
昨天下午两点多，记者在盘城街道永丰村附近的一条马路上见到了章德东和他的“飞机”。
章德东说，自己造“飞机”没怎么花钱，很多零件都是其他机器上拆下来的旧东西。比如，摩托车把手下面的轴承是从碾米机上卸下来的，连接机身的链条是从三轮车上卸下来的，操纵杆则取材于拖拉机，连接机身与机翼的钢架是自己买来的方形不锈钢管，固定钢管的钢丝是从卷扬机上卸下来的。
此外，“飞机”能拆卸。章德东说，“机翼上装了四个螺丝，可以拆下来。等会我可以再把螺丝卸下来，开着机身就可以回家了。”
能飞起来吗
昨天试飞全失败，“场地不好且有风”
在围观者的要求下，章德东决定试飞一把。他坐上座位，发动了摩托车，螺旋桨飞速转动起来，但这架“飞机”刚驶出两三米，右侧的机身便擦到了路边的小树枝，“场地不太好，路不宽，而且长度也不够。”
禁不住众人鼓动，过了一二十分钟，章德东再次试飞，但“飞机”刚驶出四五十米，机身突然往右斜，最后机翼再次擦到了路边的树枝，章德东好不容易才停下飞机，双脚在地上拖了好几米，“乖乖，还是人工制动嘛！”一名围观者打趣道。
章德东称，这两把试飞没成功，主要是因为场地不好且风力较大。“今天机翼兜风不太平均，容易跑偏，最好是无风。”
章德东说，这架“飞机”制成已经六七天了，刚制成时他曾经试飞过一次，当时“飞机”能离地七八米高，飞了好几十米。“今天上午飞机也曾经飞起来过，不过只起来一两米高，很快就落了下来。”一名围观者告诉记者，如果“跑道”能长一些，可能会飞得更高更远。
章德东指着身边一名60岁左右的老汉，老汉叫刘文法，年轻时曾经是江西一家机场的机械师。刘文法指出，位于飞机后端的两个小滑轮需改进，因为飞行器离地达到一定的高度，降落时会产生较大的冲击力，轮子很可能会撞坏。
对此，章德东表示会继续对飞机进行改造。
声音
他还要尝试，专家称不宜提倡
“我花了106天造出这个小飞机，如果下一步试飞成功，我想在机翼上喷上‘106’做纪念。”试飞没有成功，章德东并不气馁。
南京航空航天大学一名专家表示，民间自制飞机的成本太低，飞行安全无从谈起，近年来摔死摔伤者并不罕见，而且个人擅自驾机飞行也会对围观群众构成一定威胁，此类飞行不宜提倡。
另外，我国的航空领域管制十分严格，目前对私人飞行器的升空飞行有严格的标准和审批程序，得到批准后才能起飞，私人制造简单的飞行器进行试飞应予以禁止。

description.hltext_display: 婴儿纸尿片藏5片生锈刀片 生产商称系不慎掉落
description.content:
市民潘先生把纸尿布撕开来一看，发现里面居然有长满铁锈的刀片。记者张宇杰摄
图为刀片特写。记者张宇杰摄
生产商承认刀片系不慎掉落
家属称导致婴儿生殖器红肿
双方未就赔偿金额达成一致
本报讯 结婚十几年，终于生了个宝贝儿子，市民老潘却为一块小小的纸尿片伤脑筋。一个多月前，儿子使用的纸尿片里竟出现5块锈刀片，他自称婴儿曾因此导致外生殖器红肿。
昨日涉事公司客服负责人向记者证实，刀片确系该公司在生产中不慎遗留，公司方面将就赔偿金额一事与消费者再行商谈。
5张刀片被婴儿坐身下
家住南庄镇东村的潘泽瑞称，今年11月3日上午，妻子给当时38天大的儿子换纸尿片，发现平时乖巧的儿子大哭不止，不时用手抓着身下。妻子寻迹摸向纸尿片，终于发现一丝异样：本应松软的纸尿片，明显能感到里面有硬邦邦的异物。
“是锋利的美工刀片，上面长满铁锈。”老潘把纸尿片拆开，一片片棉花撕去，4块锈迹斑斑的刀片出现在眼前。儿子用了半天的纸尿片里竟有刀片，这让老潘和妻子大惊失色。
本应干净卫生的纸尿片里，为何有生锈刀片这种危险又不卫生的东西？纸尿片由全日美实业(上海)有限公司(以下简称全日美)生产，老潘当日就拨打该公司客服电话投诉。
昨日在其家中，记者见到了这块含刀片的纸尿片。纸尿片里的棉花与4块生锈刀片粘连在一起，成了枯黄色。仔细摸过去，纸尿片里还有一块刀片存留，加在一起共有5块锈刀片。男婴小伟忽闪忽闪着眼睛，丝毫不知自己曾遭遇过“刀尿片”。事情发生后，他的尿片已换成另一品牌。
恐独儿子“传宗接代”被误
老潘的小儿子今年9月末在禅城某医院出生，从儿子出生开始，他始终在该医院附近的一婴幼儿用品专用店购买纸尿片。这种嘘嘘乐牌婴儿纸尿片，48片售价30元。老潘回忆，出问题的纸尿片由他亲自买回，当时包装密封良好，无异常。
老潘称，看到刀片后，他立即查看儿子有无异常，结果发现儿子的小JJ上有轻微红肿，“之前从未有过，两天后红肿才消失。”老潘妻子泪水涟涟地说，“纸尿片里竟有生锈刀片那么脏的东西，不知以后对儿子是否有伤害。”
“万一留下后遗症，孩子怎么办？”老潘和妻子急得团团转。事发第二天的11月4日，全日美驻佛山业务员陈某赶到潘家，了解情况后为婴儿拍照取证，并表示会将情况汇报上海总部。几天后，公司总部表示“可以给予适当补偿”。
生产商：刀片为不慎遗落
将给予赔偿
昨日，记者与纸尿片制造商、全日美实业(上海)有限公司方面取得联系，公司方面证实，刀片确系该公司在生产过程中遗落，但未对婴儿造成实质性伤害。
公司客服负责人周小姐介绍，11月3日公司接到投诉后，公司立即派人到消费者家中取证，调查结果显示，是由于添加原料的生产过程失误导致机器中的刀片不慎遗落到纸尿片中。“纸尿片的生产过程为全自动，以前从未出现过这种事。”
对于消费者指称的“婴儿生殖器红肿”，该负责人称，传回来的取证照片显示，婴儿只是臀部轻微发红未发现生殖器红肿。“很多初生儿会对纸尿片过敏，这是正常现象。”
公司据此认为，纸尿片中虽有刀片，但未对婴儿造成割伤等实质伤害。按照消保委“一赔四”的规定，本应对其作产品价格4倍即120元的赔偿，而公司商谈决定赔偿消费者2000元精神损失，但赔偿金额距老潘要求的1万元要求太远，双方一直未谈妥。公司负责人承诺，全日美公司将再次与其商谈，尽快解决赔偿一事。

description.hltext_display: Numo Selects Widespace to Monetise Its Mobile Apps
description.content:
Ken Denman, CEO of Openwave, urges operators to move beyond managing mobile video to monetising it, using segmentation to deliver tailored content
Posted 1 month ago by admin Posted 3 hours ago by David Murphy
Numo aims to monetise its apps, including SMS Preview, through its partnership with WidespaceScandinavian app developer Numo is teaming up with premium mobile ad network Widespace, which is represented in over 60 countries, to monetise its mobile apps.
Over the past three years, Numo has attracted over 3m users to its Numo Finder, SMS Preview and Company Phonebook apps. Numo says that by joining forces with Widespace, it will be able to capitalize on this customer base and offer advertisers a strong advertising channel.
“Mobile advertising is being taken seriously,” says Numo CEO, Trond Ingeretsen. “Google acquired Admob for $750m, and Apple bought Quattro Wireless for $300m. I strongly believe that we are in the right position to succeed in this market, with our unique and effective mobile ad units and their volume. With the Widespace revenue maximizing ad server and ad feed, we are about to create a very interesting business model for us and for the consumers.”

description.hltext_display: 《Debusmann专栏》荒谬的美国保密制度
description.content: 路透华盛顿12月17日电---一个秘密，如果数以百万计的人都知道了，是否就不再是秘密了？按照常识来说，的确如此。但美国政府并不这麽认为，他们对维基解密（WikiLeaks）公布美国外交密电的回应刻画了一个典型的“不讲逻辑”的官僚世界。

description.hltext_display: Category: Finance and bankingSubject: A COOPERATION AGREEMENT SIGNED BETWEEN BIDV AND KIEN CONG CORPORATION (CHINA)Read: 4116Published: 07/23/2008 09:07')"> A COOPERATION AGREEMENT SIGNED BETWEEN BIDV AND KIEN CONG CORPORATION (CHINA)
description.content:
On 3rd Apirl 2008 in Hanoi, BIDV and Construction Company No.5 (Kien Cong Corporation, China) signed an cooperation agreement on construction projects within the framework of the Trade Cooperation and Promotion Workshop between Vietnam and Quang Tay Province (China).
Apirl 2008 in Hanoi, BIDV and
Construction Company No.5 (Kien Cong Corporation, China) signed an cooperation agreement on construction projects within the framework of the Trade Cooperation and Promotion Workshop between Vietnam and Quang Tay Province (China).
The signing of the agreement was witnessed by Mr Vu Tien Loc, President of VCCI; Mr Ho Can Van, Chinese ambassador in Vietnam; Mr Quach Thanh Con, Choang Quang Tay Party Committee Secretary and representatives from Ministries and Agencies of the two countries.
In this workshop, Vietnam and Quang Tay enterprises also signed 37 deals in the fields of health, hydroelectricity, mineral, mechanics, railway construction…worth 780 million USD.
On this occasion, Representatives group of China leaded by Lieu Chau City Party Committee Secretary also paid a visit to the Head Office of Bank for Investment and Development of Vietnam (BIDV).

description.content: The Holland international is back in full training after returning from a torn hamstring that he sustained at the World Cup in South Africa. "He's very good in training and he feels absolutely no pain," said Van Gaal. "He's very impatient to play, it's normal after six months out, but he has to wait until January 15."

description.hltext_display: Coloradan gets 19 years in prison for abuse of kids in Haiti
description.content:
/scriptDouglas Perlitz, convicted of abusing kids, named his school after philanthropist Pierre Toussaint, shown in the picture held by lawyer Ezili Danto, above, as she faces reporters Tuesday at the federal court in New Haven, Conn. (Christian Abraham, Connecticut Post) if(requestedWidth 0)} NEW HAVEN, Conn. A Colorado man was sentenced to nearly 20 years in prison Tuesday for sexually abusing children for more than a decade at a school he founded in Haiti, including some who faced him in the courtroom and testified that he threatened to put them back on the streets if they did not submit to his advances.
Judge Janet Bond Arterton called Douglas Perlitz a serial rapist and molester as she imposed the sentence in federal court. She said she believed he would commit the same crimes again if he were in a similar position.
Perlitz, 40, apologized to his victims while speaking in Creole before the sentence was handed down. He said he knew his crimes were horrible but pleaded for leniency nevertheless, asking the judge to consider the good work he did in the impoverished Caribbean nation.
"I began losing my head. . . . I was using you," Perlitz said while facing the six young men who testified earlier. "I mistreated you because you were afraid. Perhaps you were confused. Perhaps you thought, 'How could this man, Douglas, who's protecting me, be touching me like this?' "
"I wasn't thinking about you or your feelings or how my actions would affect you," he added. "I'm asking for forgiveness."
More than 100 people filled the courtroom including the victims, two Haitian police officers and Perlitz's family and supporters.
Perlitz admitted in August that he engaged in illicit sexual conduct with eight children who attended the Project Pierre Toussaint School for homeless children in Cap-Haitien. Prosecutors said Perlitz gave the children money, food, clothing and electronics and threatened to take everything away and expel them from the program if they told anyone.
Arterton said she believed there were at least 16 victims, based on testimony that authorities recorded on video by others who attended the school. Some of the six young Haitian men said in court that dozens of other boys Douglas Perlitz. (Connecticut Post file photo.)were abused by Perlitz.
Perlitz, a resident of Eagle, founded the school in 1997 when he lived in Fairfield County, Conn. Authorities said he began abusing the children, some as young as 11, in 1998 before the school was built. The abuse scandal led to the collapse of the school and its fundraising arm, the Haiti Fund, forcing the children back into homelessness on the streets, prosecutors said.
In court documents, Perlitz said one factor in the crimes was his "dark and abusive relationship" with a priest whom authorities have not named he met while attending Fairfield University.
The six young men were flown to Connecticut and detailed the abuse they suffered.
"He always told me: 'Don't tell anybody about it. If you tell anybody about it, I will put you out on the street,' " one victim said through a Creole interpreter. He said Perlitz first abused him in 1998 and once sodomized him after plying him with rum.

技术资料介绍
介绍了基于CPLD的清分机纸币图像采集控制系统。采用接触式传感器（CIS）SV233A4W对高速运行的钞票进行图像采样，并将采样数据缓存到CPLD内部RAM中，为后续的DSP等图像处理模块提供数据。该系统扩展性强，只需修改内部相关程序就可满足不同应用要求，并可移植到其他图像采集系统。
Abstract:
This paper introduced the image acquisition control system of currency sorter based on CPLD.The system uses CIS SV233A4W to sample high-speed paper money,and store data to internal RAM of CPLD as a cache for image processing part such as DSP. The system has a good augmentability, can satisfy different requirements only by modifying the program. And it can be transplanted to other systems which need image acquisition.

description.hltext_display: 6旬老汉为救老伴火海中双手烧成“炭”
description.content:
他，60岁，曾是一个响当当的铁骨汉子，与同岁的妻子还有儿子生活在榆树市福安乡一个遥远偏僻的小山村。他原本以为，日子会这样不温不火地过下去，却不想一场突如其来的大火烧毁了他原本好端端的家，将他的未来烧得支离破碎，也烧化了他的幸福。
大火中，他拼了老命保护妻子，全然不顾自己的双手已经烧脱了皮。妻子终因伤势严重不治身亡，可他为了抢救妻子烧伤的双手和大腿，已经被烧得不成样子……
惊魂：
午夜大火 转眼间蹿上房
12月20日凌晨1点，榆树市福安乡东沟村像往常一样沉寂在夜色中，村民们早已沉浸在香甜的睡梦里。突然，一间小屋里亮光闪闪。随即，火光冲天，整间小屋顿时笼罩在滚滚浓烟里。
这就是村民老张的家。事发时，一家人在炕上睡得正熟。“姑爷紧挨着我，姑娘和她妈睡在炕梢。”老张说，睡梦中，他只听身边的姑爷大喊：“着火了着火了。”他被从梦中惊醒，只穿了裤头的他顾不上披衣服，急忙跑到厨房去取水瓢，舀上勺水就向屋内泼。
只一瞬间的工夫，大火就蹿上了棚，整间屋子刹那间被熊熊烈火包围，将老张和闺女、姑爷困在了屋外。
刺痛：
深情一吻 老汉泪流满面
老张急忙去接水管，可一切都来不及了，屋内衣服、被褥沾火就着，火势眼看着越烧越猛。冲天的火光晃着老张的眼，屋内凄厉的呼救声震得他猛地一惊：“坏了，老伴还没跑出来呢？被困在火里了！”顾不得没穿衣服，老张急忙抄起院里的大板锹，朝着窗玻璃狠狠砸去。玻璃应声而碎，老张跳进窗子，准备营救老伴。
腿被玻璃碎片划出了一道道血痕，双手瞬间被烤得焦黑，老张全然不觉，他心里只有一个念头：“快，快，一定要尽快把老伴救出来……”老伴体态偏胖，老张在女儿的协助下，还是无法立即将妻子救出。手烧脱了皮，老张却仍执意一遍遍尝试着让妻子摆脱火海。
终于，老伴被费力地拖了出来，此时的她，已经被烧得不成人形。老张一把抱起老伴，马不停蹄地往医院赶，一刻也不敢耽搁。忙乱中，他只觉得手上一暖，低头一看，妻子正深情地亲吻着他被烧得脱了皮的手。“你看……你，手都……掉皮了……”妻子说得断断续续，却字字句句充满了爱怜……老张鼻子一酸，泪水顺着脸颊流淌下来。
绝望：
无钱医治 爱妻不治离世
由于妻子身上大面积烧伤，急需转往长春市大医院进行抢救，一家人连夜从榆树市赶往长春，老两口住进了武警吉林省总队医院。医生告诉老张，他妻子身上80%深度烧伤，治疗费用少说也得三四十万元，这对靠种地为生的老张一家来说，无疑是一个晴天霹雳。家人偷偷瞒着老张将其妻转到榆树的医院，因为那里的治疗费用相对较低。
20日13时许，一个电话让老张头晕目眩。电话那端，儿子哭着说：“妈妈伤势太重，撇下这个家撒手而去了。”说到此，老张痛哭失声，他忘不了与妻子携手走过的那些日子，忘不了大火后那深情一吻。妻子的离世，给了老张当头一棒，他几近绝望，甚至不想配合医生的治疗……
感动：
伤情待定 众人来帮忙
老张说，他不是想放弃治疗，实在是家里负担不起住院昂贵的开销。
病房里，一双破旧不堪的鞋“缩”在病床一角，孤零零地陪着主人。老张说，身体上的疼痛他可以忍。可心里的痛却让他辗转反侧，彻夜难眠。老张的双手、大腿、后背都被大火烧焦，像黑炭一样惨不忍睹。“现在下半身不能自理，烧伤情况还有待进一步检查。不到两天就已经花了一万元钱了，植皮的费用我都不敢想。”老张叹了口气，然后笑着说：“几天来，很多人都来看我、鼓励我，让我重新拾起了对生活的希望……”
新闻快评
爱，是伸手那一瞬
王者东
火焰里，死神嘶哮着散发恐怖，狰狞着喷吐无情。寻常时候，没有人不怕它的。但这一次，是自己爱的人被困其中，还在犹豫什么，即使明白――这一伸手，就要被烧个皮开肉绽。
因为她是我的爱人，因为在婚礼上牵过她的手，因为承诺过――生死不离，患难与共。只要我们还把那个“爱”字当真；只要我们还互称“爱人”；只要我们还把那句“爱你一辈子”当真……就只能往上冲。
抢救生命的病床上，老张那快被烧成焦炭的双手，令人触目惊心。这双黝黑的手，也触动了大家的心扉，心中那根最柔软的神经，让人再次将“爱人”这两个字重温――怎样去爱自己每天朝夕相对的人。这个突发事件的社会背景是“中国式婚姻”正经历阵痛的当口。应该说，目前很多丈夫和妻子，不知道怎么去爱对方，更为过分的是爱上了别人。情感、伦理弄不明白，迟早会泛滥成社会病。目前很多国人处于“对付过”的婚姻状态，悲观者，以“有孩子离不起”为借口苟延残喘消磨婚姻；变态者，无端打击别人，比如嫉妒人家付笛生、任静两口子是假恩爱。这种人，如果遇上大火，不可能舍生忘死去搭救自己的爱人。当我们以种种世故之心亵渎婚姻的时候，当我们阴阳怪气地埋怨已经没有激情再捡起爱的时候，老张头这位农村老汉，让我们重忆了那句最老套也最实在的――爱，是一种平淡若水的日常付出与积累，才可能永恒。有理由相信：老张是深爱他的妻子的，平平淡淡的日常之情，化成了他把手伸向火海那一瞬的无畏。这是一种纯粹的爱，这是一种撼人的勇。
老伴儿，老伴儿，老来有伴儿，好相互取暖啊。没想到花甲之年溘然丧妻，老张只剩一个人的孤苦余年怎么办？眼下迫在眉睫的手术费又怎么办？
老张伸手救爱人，我们也伸手救救老张吧。他为自己的妻子烧成这样，是一种伉俪之爱；而社会救助，是一种互助之爱。这两种爱，都是两相守望的人间挚爱，能交融在一起吗？请让我们一起伸手……

description.hltext_display: Split zamalo sjeo na račun Hajduka zbog ovrhe od 2 milijuna kuna
description.content:
Tako je vodstvo kluba dobilo dopis, odnosno ovršni zahtjev Grada Splita, koji je proslijeđen Zagrebačkoj banci, na iznos od oko dva milijuna kuna zbog neplaćenih komunalnih usluga. Malo je nedostajalo da Grad sjedne na račun i naplati dva milijuna kuna. No, raznim pozivima ovršni zahtjev djelomično je zaustavljen, odnosno Grad je naplatio od Hajduka 200 tisuća kuna.
Stiglo je obećanje da će Grad pustiti malo Poljud na miru. No, priča je zanimljiva jer je Grad vlasnik Hajduka i zato što je najavio promjene u vodstvu kluba. Sve je to oglasio gradonačelnik Kerum, a onda poslao ovrhu. Koja je stigla iz ureda za komunalu koji vodi Pave Zaninović, kandidat za poljudsku fotelju

description.hltext_display: Sazzy Falak to name her baby Rapunzel?
description.content:
– Malaysian VJ/actress Sazzy Falak, who is currently four-months pregnant with actor husband Nazril Idrus, might just name one of her twins (if girl), Rapunzel.
"We recently watched 'Rapunzel: A Tangled Tale' and I absolutely love Rapunzel! She's so cute and funny," said the sweet celebrity who was with her hubby at the recent launching of Robot Sushi's new outlet in One Utama Shopping Centre, Malaysia.
She even teasingly added, "I want to name my daughter Rapunzel one day!"
The couple who wed in 2006 divulged that they will be expecting their first offspring towards the middle of 2011.
Sazzy's pregnancy does not seem to slow her down as the couple are hard at work to release their own book entitled, "Sehati Berdansing" where they share their life's principles in working to be a successful couple, due out March next year.
The celebrity couple was also joined by Malaysian supermodel entrepreneur Amber Chia and actress Chelsia Ng at the launch.
Sazzy and Nazril introduced their own Robot Sushi celebrity roll that they named lovingly as "Sehati Berdansing", which adopted a yin yang concept befitting the lovely duo.

description.hltext_display: Wheelchair Stair Lifts - Improved Mobility Posted By: Jai Gaitonde
description.content:
Wheelchair stair lifts are a great option for the physically challenged as they ensure improved mobility and provide them with safe and comfortable access in their residences as well as in commercial places.
Comfortable Floor to Floor Access
Restricted mobility affects the confidence of physically challenged persons. Wheelchair stair lifts allow the mobility impaired to move through different floors easily. Improved mobility helps them lead an independent, activity-oriented life and boosts their self-confidence. The major advantage of wheelchair stair lifts is that the disabled persons can travel through many floor levels safely and smoothly in a seated position.
Wheelchair stair lifts are available in a variety of models such as inclined platform lifts, portable wheelchair lifts, vertical platform lifts, and so on, to suit different stairway configurations like straight, curved and spiral. These easy-to-operate accessibility options help mobility restricted individuals to conveniently access the indoors and outdoors of residential and commercial spaces, porches, stages or elevated platforms. Power wheelchairs and sports wheelchairs can be configured to suit the needs of adults and children.
Easy- to-use Controls and Features
To ensure physically disabled persons safe and comfortable movement through stairways, all the models of wheelchair stair lifts are designed with easy-to-use features and controls. Some of the important features of the different models of these accessibility devices include:
Large ADA-compliant platform
Constant pressure on-board controls
Non-skid platform
Door interlocks
Safety brakes
Underpan obstruction sensor
Automatic battery recharging system
Most of the devices come with battery back up facilities to work even during power breakdowns.
Purchasing Wheelchair Stair Lifts
When it comes to the purchase of wheelchair stair lifts, it is important to depend on a reputable dealer. They can provide you with premium models from leading manufacturers that are compliant with ADA guidelines. Reliable service providers ensure efficient installation, timely maintenance services and excellent technical support, ensuring durability and minimizing system downtime.
Article Source: http://www.articlesnatch.com
About the Author:
DAY provides a complete range of mobility products in the categories of elevators, wheelchair lifts, dumbwaiters and stair lifts for homeowners, builders, developers and architects.
Tags: wheelchair lifts , wheelchair lift , portable lifts

description.hltext_display: FCC Adopts New Rules To Protect Web Traffic
description.content:
Christopher Furlong/WASHINGTON -- A divided Federal Communications Commission has approved new rules meant to prohibit broadband companies from interfering with Internet traffic flowing to their customers.
The 3-2 vote Tuesday marks a major victory for FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski, who has spent more than a year trying to craft a compromise.
The FCC's three Democrats voted to pass the rules, while the two Republicans opposed them, arguing that they amount to unnecessary regulation. The new rules are likely to face intense scrutiny on Capitol Hill once Republicans take over the House. Meanwhile, public interest groups decried the regulations as too weak, particularly for wireless systems.
Known as "net neutrality," the rules prohibit phone and cable companies from favoring or discriminating against Internet content and services, such as those from rivals.

description.hltext_display: Munster launch O'Connell appeal
description.content: Munster have confirmed they have lodged an appeal against Paul O'Connell's four-week ban. Ireland lock O'Connell was handed the suspension by a European Rugby Cup disciplinary hearing after he was sent off for striking Ospreys back-rower Jonathan Thomas during Munster's 22-16 Heineken Cup victory at Thomond Park on December 12.The ban means the 2009 Lions captain will be available for the Irish province's crucial European trip to Toulon next month, but with the 31-year-old having missed most of the season to date with a groin injury Munster hope to have him available to play before that fixture.A Munster statement read: "Munster Rugby can confirm they have appealed the ERC disciplinary decision handed down to Paul O'Connell at last Thursday's ERC hearing in Dublin."Munster Rugby now wait on the ERC to issue a date for the hearing."Copyright PA Sport 2010, All Rights Reserved

description.hltext_display: Live! Rahul: Next Tamil Nadu CM from Congress
description.content:
At the NDA rally: Arun Jaitley has left the dias. On next is leader of the Opposition in the Lok Sabha, Sushma Swaraj.
14:01 PM And 10 of the year's best cover girls are...:
Time for post lunch break. And time for some eye candy.
Rediff.com's Sukanya Verma picks Bollywood's hottest covergirls -- divas flaunting the latest fashion trends without a single trip-up, month after month. Here is the year's 10 best magazine covers. Take a peekand while you're at ittelluswho your favourite cover girl is.
13:50 PM
As Arun Jaitley lambasts the Congress and the UPA in Delhi, down south in Chennai, kachacha bachcha Rahul Gandhi is addressing a rally.
In yet another attempt to rouse Congress workers in the state, Gandhi said there was much work to be done in Tamil Nadu. He said the party has to work hard to bring the Congress back to power, but he assured party workers that the next chief minister of Tamil Nadu would be from the Congress.
Charm and charisma works, but not always. Bihar...
13:40 PM Jaitley spouts venom at NDA rally, calls for JPC:
The massive two-month long NDA rally led by the BJP has begun in New Delhi at the Ram Leela grounds. Arun Jaitley takes the podium saying much the same the BJP said during the logjammed winter session of Parliament: "Only a JPC can do justice in the 2G scam."
He also accuses the Congress of misleading people for 20 years and says it has been trying to cover-up corruption cases.
13:34 PM
Also read what R Rajagopalan, senior journalist with an amazing ear to the corridors of power,has to say on everything that there is to do with politics.
13:30 PM How important is the Medvedev visit? Read the blog:
Meanwhile, Russian President Dmitry Medvedev is scheduled to visit Mumbai today, where he will go to the IIT.Unlike the US president Barack Obama's visit in November, Medvedev's and every other visiting premier, president (China's WenJiabao) press pales in comparison.
So how important is the Russian visit?
Former diplomat and Rediff.com columnist M Bhadrakumar blogs that Medvedev's visit has met with exuberance from unusual quarters in India who were notorious for their dislike of Indo-Soviet friendship and their pessimism over the prospects of India-Russia ties in the post-Cold War era. To describe the contemporary ties with Russia as a"privileged bond', they have come a long way.
13:19 PM US citizens 'more likely to die on Christmas Day:
In the season of good cheer and bonhomie, here's a huge dampner for Americans.
Researchers at the University of California say US citizens are more likely to die on Christmas Day than any other time of the year.. Analysis of US death certificates between 1979 and 2004 found an extra 42,325 natural deaths in the two weeks starting with Christmas above the usual seasonal winter increase.
Mortality in general increased over the holidays, and deaths in hospitals rose dramatically on Christmas Day and New Year''s Day.
The study found that more people died on hospital wards, or had died before arrival, on the public holidays than on any other days of the year.
13:06 PM Tsunami alert after quake in Japan islands:
Meanwhile, in Japan, scores of villagers on a remote island chain in the Pacific scrambled for higher ground early today after a major 7.4-magnitude offshore quake sparked a tsunami alert.
The seabed tremor struck at 2:19 am local time, jolting people out of bed as loudspeakers blared across the Ogasawara islands and authorities warned of the risk of a two-metre (six-foot) high local tsunami.
The tsunami alert was later downgraded and all warnings were lifted five hours after the quake hit near the islands, some 1,000 kilometres south of Tokyo. No injuries or damage were reported.
13:04 PM 32% Muslim students in UK feel jehad justified:
WikiLeaks is leaking again.
The whistleblower website has revealed the outcome of a 2009 poll in the secret US diplomatic cables, saying that 32 percent of Muslim students in 30 universities across the UK believe killing in the name of religion is justified, while 40 percent want Muslims in the country to be under the Sharia law.
12:31 PM Nithari verdict: Koli guilty of killing servant:
A special Central Bureau of Investigation court today pronounced the guilty verdict for Surinder Koli for the rape and murder of a 12-year-old domestic servant Deepali. The sensational Nithari killings came to light in 2006.
Koli was awarded death sentence by the special court in three of 19 cases filed in connection with the rape and murder of children and a young woman in Nithari.
The brutal killings that shocked the country came to light when their body parts were found in a drain behind Mohinder Singh Pandher's D-31 bungalow in Nithari in Noida, Uttar Pradesh. In the Deepali murder case Pandher and his domestic help Koli are the prime accused.
12:10 PM Dr Reddy's scrip tanks after gas leakage deaths:
Here's why they call the Sensex the Sensitive Index.
The scrip of Dr Reddy's Laboratories today plunged over four per cent in the early trade on BSE, amid reports of gas leakage in the pharma giant's Bollaram facility in Hyderabad.
According to media reports, a gas leakage happened in the Dr Reddy's Hyderabad plant today, in which two employees of the company have lost their lives.
Reacting to the news, shares of Dr Reddy's tanked by 4.13 per cent to a month-low of Rs 1,618 per piece on the Bombay Stock Exchange. The scrip saw a similar fall on the National Stock Exchange, and quoted at Rs 1,616.10, down 4.18 per cent in the morning session.

description.hltext_display: Mannheimer Swartling biträder AB Svensk Exportkredit i Ryssland
How I put the Tee in Tenerife!
description.content:
When I think of Tenerife, I think of ‘Brits abroad' – loutish behaviour from tattooed skinheads in football shirts.
With a wide variety of courses on offer and average temperatures of 23-degrees, Tenerife is fast establishing itself as a world-class golfing destination. The island boasts nine superb courses, all very different and with their own character and flanked by Tenerife's breathtaking mountain and coastal vistas.
I arrived there to play the TaylorMade Burner XD Iron Set before heading down to Tenerife Ladies Pro-Am at Buenavista Golf & Spa, a true golfers' delight. This impressive course enjoys close proximity to the coastline, but watch out for the waterfall and lake which require great precision but lend a fresh feel to this unusual course in the north of the island.
Here, I played with the delightful Flory Parker, winner of the Ladies Holland Open.My Tiger-like attempts to woo the 21-year-old failed, so I headed off to sample the delights of Golf Costa Adeje, a beautiful track which hosted the 2009 Tenerife Ladies Open.
On day three, a boat took us to La Gomera to play Tecina. I was joined by several Dutch guys who were following the Holland – Brazil World Cup game on their radios. You should have heard the racket they made when the final whistle went! Thin, flexible and fast titanium clubfaces deliver higher COR (coefficient of restitution) for faster ball speed and therefore, longer distance.
Tenerife is the perfect place to escape from the stresses of everyday life. Year round sunshine, diverse landscapes, idyllic beaches and charming villages make it an ideal golfing holiday choice. Other than those I played, the island boasts plenty of lovely courses on the backdrop of the Atlantic Ocean.
The 18-hole Amarilla Golf & Country Club, designed by Donald Steel, is one of the island's most spectacular courses if not a little challenging when golfers have to drive the ball right over the waves to the next green on the fifth hole! There's also Golf del Sur – a 27-hole course which played host to the first Tenerife Ladies Open in 2002.
The high standard of the island's courses, plus the overall facilities, have enabled Tenerife to host major international professional tournaments. Since hosting its first major international tournament in 1989, the island has gone on to stage a total of twelve competitions on the PGA European Tour and the Ladies European Tour. Renowned names in the world of golf have won tournaments on Tenerife, including José María Olazábal, David Gilford and Mark James – three Ryder Cup players – and Raquel Carriedo and Elisabeth Esterl – both Solheim Cup players. Other top players that have teed off at Tenerife's golf courses include Sergio García, Miguel Ángel Jiménez, Colin Montgomerie, Sam Torrance, Bernhard Gallacher, Paul McGinley, Vijah Singh and Ian Woosnam.

description.hltext_display: Mannheimer Swartling har biträtt DocMorris Apotek vid tecknande av outsourcingavtal för IT med Logica
description.content:
DocMorris Apotek (Admenta Sverige AB) har tecknat avtal med Logica Sverige AB angående outsourcing av IT-system för deras apoteksverksamhet.
Admenta är ett dotterbolag inom Celesiokoncernen, en av världens ledande aktörer inom hälso-, sjukvårds- och apoteksmarknaden. I dag finns ca 50 DocMorris Apotek runt om i Sverige och kedjan är under expansion på den svenska marknaden.
Admenta har rådgivits av Mannheimer Swartling. Byråns team leddes av Niklas Bogefors, främst assisterad av Julia Brugge.

description.hltext_display: 儿子被警方押回村子指认现场 母亲在后面追着哭(图)
description.content:
晋宁警方打掉3个盗割通信电缆团伙，23名嫌疑人昨天指认现场
儿子回村指认现场 母亲在后面追着哭
才装好不久的电缆，没几天就变成了无芯的空皮管。今年，晋宁地区以盗窃通信电缆中铜芯线获取暴利的犯罪案件呈上升趋势。近日，晋宁县公安局通过巡逻堵卡等多种方式，打掉了3个以盗割通信电缆的犯罪团伙，先后抓获40余名犯罪嫌疑人。昨天，其中的23名嫌疑人指认了现场。
晋宁地区目前正在修建多条道路，四通八达的道路状况给犯罪分子提供了便利条件，他们将黑手延伸到了山区、农村，在建设施工道路附近疯狂盗割通信电缆。从11月15日起，警方组成联合查缉堵卡组，在出入晋宁县四个必经路段宝峰清水河、昆阳余家海、昆阳古城爬齿山和晋城广济设立卡点，对重点车辆、人员进行检查。11月16日至29日，先后打掉3个盗窃团伙，1个盗窃污水处理厂建设工地建材团伙。
3个团伙的成员还有部分是未成年人
方磊、李明、张森等人都是晋宁县上蒜镇人，今年6月份，他们就邀约在一起，干起了偷盗电缆的勾当。看着铜价节节攀升，方磊、李明、张森等又分别召集了村里其他闲散的村民，各自分头“单干”起来。他们采用租微型车、骑摩托车、徒步等方式携带作案工具，窜至学校、村委会等地实施盗割电缆。
11月16日凌晨4点，宝峰清水河卡点的民警堵卡时发现了方磊一伙，抓获嫌犯12名；17日凌晨3点，民警在余家海卡点发现李明等人，李明等人发现民警后，立即开车逃跑。当天下午2点，民警抓获4名主要嫌犯，该团伙其余15名成员陆续落网；11月21日至12月3日，张森团伙的14名成员也分别落入法网。警方统计，3个团伙盗割通信电缆70余起，涉案金额近20万元。
民警介绍，3个团伙的部分成员还未成年，民警对其教育后责令家长严加管教。
面对母亲和半岁的儿子 嫌疑人杨某流下了悔恨的泪水
昨天上午，23名盗窃电缆的嫌疑人在民警押解下分别来到了上蒜镇河泊村和小江渡村指认现场。杨某的母亲得知儿子来到村子里指认现场，不顾身体虚弱，来到现场看儿子。23名嫌疑人穿着一样的囚服，头上戴着头套，杨母看不出谁是自己的儿子。
嫌疑人指认完现场，步行百余米来到警车前。“杨××”，一直跟随在指认队伍后的杨母再也忍不住内心的焦急，大喊儿子的名字。被两名警察押解着的杨某听到母亲的声音，拼命挣扎。杨母跑了过来，一旁的民警赶紧上前拦住老人，不停地安慰老人家。“我只想告诉他，叫他好好改造。”杨母边哭边说。“我会帮你转达，您老不要太激动 ，身体要紧。”民警的话让老人家渐渐停止了哭泣。
除了杨母，杨某刚满半岁的孩子也被家人抱着来到现场，不知什么原因，正熟睡的小家伙来到父亲身边后突然醒了过来，并大声哭了起来。杨某此时再也忍不住，流下了悔恨的眼泪。杨某说，他知道自己所做的事情是犯法的。
23人中，有一人既是嫌疑人也是受害者。他叫张力，专门从李明等人手上收购赃物。今年10月，张力接到李明的电话，称有一批偷来的电缆要卖给他，张力没有想到，和李明等人见面后，李明将他强行拉到车上，带到了一个山头，对张力实施威胁、殴打，抢走了张力的现金3500元和手机一部。
原来，当天李明等人到晋城郊外盗割电缆未果，便商议抢劫收赃人张力。“他不敢报警，否则把他自己也供出来了。”李明拿捏住了张力的“七寸”，于是将黑手伸向了张力。
民警介绍，张力被抢后确实没有及时报警，在李明等人落网后，张力才交代了自己这段很“憋屈”的经历。
目前方磊、李明、张森等人已被刑拘。（文中嫌疑人的名字均为化名）
